About the agency
Network Finance CorporateNetwork Finance, a specialist financial recruitment agency, forms part of Network Recruitment (est. 1987). A talent sourcing partner to several large organizations, Network Finance is a prominent leader in financial recruitment. Network Finance is a trading division within ADvTECH Resourcing (Pty) Ltd, a wholly owned subsidiary of the JSE-listed company ADvTECH Limited.
Network Finance meets client needs through effective sourcing of finance professionals and related scarce skills. The company has well trained project teams that focus on specific specialist finance niches, delivering expert technical market knowledge. Strong relationships and networks have been forged with the right people, in various markets.
Network Finance enjoys strong partnerships with several leading banks, corporate and listed companies. Over 60% of placements constitute repeat business. Effective sourcing strategies, combined with specialist knowledge and a detailed understanding of client needs, ensure successful placements that satisfy both clients and candidates.
Network Finance is supported by a solid infrastructure and extensive national database. Although based in Gauteng, Network Finance is able to assist with both national and international recruitment.
Network Finance is a member of APSO (The Association of Personnel Service Organisations of South Africa) and is ethically bound to adhere to a strict code of ethics, ensuring above average levels of service excellence.

title: Head Of Technology Delivery - SA (SET)
description:
Head Of Technology Delivery - SAAbout the role Lead the product delivery function within the SA Technology group, creating a client-centric culture, fostering innovation and ensuring that Technology is positioned as a distinctive capability for The Company.Work closely with the CTO to deliver the Technology roadmap and support technical strategic and tactical plans and budgets to support business strategies; driving the effective implementation and operation of them within Technology Delivery to agreed timescales so they are profitable with a view to maximising return to shareholders. Further, ensure SA is effectively aligned across regions and globally - an effective THE COMPANY participant.Help position The Company as having a reputation for innovation, market leading levels of client service and the application of leading-edge technology.Form part of the local Leadership Team to manage the day to day running of the function and to work closely with propositions/product teams to understand market requirements and deliver remarkable product that enables us to lead the market.Form part of the global Technology Leadership team to ensure client and The Company outcomes are embedded into the SA technology delivery teams.Leadership
Create and foster a motivational environment that focuses on goals and outcomes for the business and our clientsEncourage and demonstrate positive and productive thinkingIdentify gaps in team skills and work to resolve them in alignment with company requirements with The Company perspectiveProvide people with a purpose to deliver, support and promote organisational and product development goalsPromote and communicate the the company technology vision and strategy, engage with people to increase understanding of organisational priorities and how their work aligns and supports that strategyLead the office environment, ensuring a clean, healthy, fun and safe environment exists for peopleLead the team to focus on clients and the business through the delivery of excellent, purposeful software solutionsIn conjunction with the CTO and global communications teams, work to position and promote the company as a leading technology company, enhancing the profile of the company to attract and retain excellent talent
Stakeholder Management
Work with internal and external stakeholders to provide outstanding technology and serviceCoach, educate and manage stakeholders to ensure the ongoing buy-in and support to achieve efficient and effective technology development capabilitySupport and manage all people within own team. Manage poor performance and reward excellence.Work proactively and effectively with the CTO, architecture and regional technology delivery teams to align practices, principles and create the company scale and leverage for the benefit of our clients and shareholders
Risk Management
Utilise appropriate risk management practices to identify and work within our risk tolerancesDemonstrate a suitable approach to risk. Consider risk at all stages to ensure continuous improvement and change occurs.Work with the team to identify risk management strategiesInform stakeholders and management of risks both within the team and in relation to solutionsEnsure compliance requirements are consistently met.
Planning & Strategy
Develop and deliver appropriate SA technology development strategies to support the changing nature of the business in conjunction with regional leadership to meet local and global client demandsEnsure planning occurs consistently with the product teams and ensure aligned priorities and shared understanding of outcomes and deliverables, both regionally and globallyOrganize and mobilize the necessary resources to ensure continuous and effective technology delivery, can balance delivery speed and efficiency in different scenariosConsistent and accurate planning and risk management on behalf of the teamDemonstrate a broad-based view of issues, events and activities and a perception of their longer-term impact to the business from a technology perspectiveAnticipate changing business and client needs and can realign priorities and resources accordinglyEnsure budgeting is effective and manages outcomes to that budget.
Continuous Improvement
In conjunction with global the company technology teams, consistently identify areas of strategic improvement to improve technology delivery, client engagement or operational efficiencies.Work to support others in key strategic areas within the company to improve technology delivery performance and quality, as well as operational effectiveness of the teamsMaintain awareness of industry changes, new participants in the market, regulatory changes
Delivery
Work to remove barriers in support of teams achieving their delivery objectivesEnsure appropriate work is defined and monitors delivery against those work plans
General Duties
Manage the overall technology expenditure of the SA delivery teamsMonitor delivery outcomes from all SA technology delivery teamsMonitor and manage the risk profile of the SA technology delivery teamsWork with other teams within the company to ensure close and effective collaboration existsSupport management through removal of delivery obstaclesPromoting collaboration at all levels regionally and globally, including across business lines.
Key Relationships 
All internal business leaders and technology teamsPeers in other regionsExternal technology vendors and service providersStrong alignment to CTOStrong alignment to ProductStrong alignment to Business Owners and product teams for appropriate business outcomes, both strategic and commercial
About you 
Demonstrated leadership of an 'agile' workforceHighly strategic and commercialCollaborative by defaultDrives for results, eliminates roadblocksLeads and encourages changeDemonstrated deep technical knowledgeHighly proactiveAbility to work with zero supervision and within a team environmentAbility to work under pressure whilst maintaining team clarity and purpose.Ability to communicate in a clear, concise and unambiguous manner to a variety of audiences.Great at dealing with people, shows empathy but ensures people perform as expectedExcellent time management and organisational skillsExcellent conflict resolution and negotiation skillsAbility to manage multiple workloads and prioritise appropriatelyAbility to manage a large teamA people person who can engage with others at all levels
What you'll bring to the team: 
At least 10 years' experience in a senior role, preferably with experience in a growth technology business.Tertiary qualified in computing or systemsPost-graduate qualifications in computing, business or finance Financial planning industry experience

Professional services
Commerce
IT
The public sector

About the agency
Communicate Specialist ResourceCommunicate Recruitment is a specialist recruitment company with over 3 decades of experience. We Connect Great People in the Engineering, Finance, IT and Supply Chain / Freight industries throughout Africa and South Africa. Our aim is to partner with you and introduce you to exceptional candidates on a permanent, contract or temporary basis.
Communicate Recruitment has offices throughout South Africa and a longstanding network of clients and candidates throughout Southern Africa.
We are a large team of consultants with decades of expe¬rience that provides deep understanding of the recruitment industry and the fields we specialise in.
Our brand is a proud trading division within ADvTECH Resourcing, which is the recruitment arm of ADvTECH Limited.
Masters of Specialisation
When we say that we are ‘specialist’ recruiters, it goes way beyond words.
For us, specialisation means that we have a wealth of knowledge about the niche industries we recruit for. We ¬understand salary structures according to skill levels and career pathing in each specialist niche. We have real connections, established networks, valuable expertise and

Engineering

As Africa comes into its own and South Africa grows its infrastructure, talented engineering candidates are in short supply.
At Communicate, we understand how in demand these resources are in our rapidly developing economy, where engineering skills are vital. Within our sector specific established network and knowledge base we are able to connect employers to talent, and engineers to career opportunities.
Our team has access to highly skilled engineering candidates in civil, structural, mechanical, electrical, electronic, engineering sales, production and trade fields.

Finance

Communicate has become the go-to recruitment team for financial recruitment. Our consultants have a finger on the finance pulse, always attracting top-notch candidates for this important part of the economy.
We have great relationships with our exclusive skilled finance candidates and we are able to place people across all levels and in all categories of the financial industry.
We make it our business to stay up to date with the ever-changing technical and compliance requirements of the industry. With a rock-solid knowledge of the finance landscape, we understand the pressing deadlines that come with being a financial or accounting professional.
We pride ourselves on building lasting relationships – in fact, in many cases our candidates become our clients. We believe that says a lot about the way we work.

Information Technology

An industry that’s constantly reinventing itself needs the support of innovative recruiters who are up to the minute on the latest trends and challenges. That’s where we come in.
Communicates tech-savvy IT Recruitment Consultants know this ever-changing landscape inside out. We’re known to perfectly pair candidate and technology and we have access to specialists ranging from developers to top system architects, consultants in CRM and ERP, project managers and systems engineers.

Supply Chain and Freight 

At Communicate, we look for great people who will drive business forward and enable both the Supply Chain and Freight industries to reshape themselves to the current Southern African trade landscape.
We understand that Supply Chain is the heartbeat of business. This exciting industry offers an array of opportunities in sales, operations and management for experienced candidates. As the golden thread between supply and demand, the Freight industry presents equally exciting employment opportunities that tap into the pulse of our economy.
The Communicate team is able to source top candidates in procurement, production, logistics, freight as well as warehousing and distribution.

title: Business Development Manager
description:
BUSINESS DEVELOPMENT MANAGER - LINBRO PARK, JOHANNESBURG
GENERAL
An established business engaged in the sale and distribution of wholesale foodstuff and the provision of other logistic services on a national scale is looking for an experienced administrative clerk to take care of the administrative function at its Linbro Park branch.
PURPOSE
The position entails optimising the company's revenue stream through the formulation and implementation of strategies and plans to market the company's products and services to the broadest possible range of clients in various industries, in both the private- and public sectors.
DUTIES
Planning & Strategizing
Identify, develop and implement new channels, strategic networks and partnerships.
Researching and analysing client needs, market trends, and trading conditions and identifying possible means of increasing revenue from existing product- and service offering.
Researching and analysing options to add to the existing revenue streams by expanding its market and/or product- and service offering
Collaborating with Ex-Co to set periodic sales targets
Developing company-wide strategies to achieve sales targets
Conduct market and industry research to determine new market trends and opportunities.
Monitoring sales performance ensuring that the sales targets are met.
Formulating and maintaining all policies and procedures that guide the sales function
Sales Activities
Develop and implement sales strategies to meet overall sales objectives.
Coordinating all sales activities to ensure maximum conversion of potential sales
Meeting with existing- and prospective clients and customers in order to determine needs and to provide advice on products and services
Preparing quotations and tenders
Communicating with Procurement Officer regarding pricelists
Devising and implementing sales initiatives and campaigns to increase sales to existing and potential customers
Preparing promotional materials for the purpose of creating awareness of products and services
Visiting branches to determine unique needs of clients in the region
Relationship Management
Engaging with existing clients and customers' in-person to ensure satisfaction with products and services
Continuous improvement of relationships with existing clients.
Communicating with clients and customers regarding changes to prices, services, or products
Dealing with client queries and complaints about products or services
Devising and administering periodic client satisfaction surveys
Human Resource Management
Coordinating and monitoring the activities of a Sales team
Devising and monitoring sales targets for Sales Representatives
Providing training and guidance on best practices to Sales representatives
Calculating and Recording of Commission earned by Sales Representatives for Payroll
Administering discipline and performance management for sales representatives
Reporting
Reporting on sales performance to Ex-Co, including sales figures
Reporting on sales activities (including travel- and meeting logs)
Reporting on performance of sales representatives
Reporting on client feedback
REMUNERATION
Market Related Basic Salary plus Commission
MINIMUM REQUIREMENTS
At least 3 years' Experience in managing or coordinating sales activities and people
5-10 years' Experience in sales of FMCG or wholesale goods
Bachelor's Degree or National Diploma, preferably in Marketing or Sales
Valid RSA driver's licence and willingness to travel inside South Africa
Good working knowledge of MS Office
Excellent interpersonal communication skills
Ability to manage people
CANDIDATE PROFILE
The successful candidate will have the following attributes
Be organised, dynamic and, goal-driven, with acute attention to details.
Have a firm understanding of Wholesale-sales, specifically in FMCG and food service industry.
Be highly flexible, self-driven, can work independently with minimal supervision.
Be patient and resilient to continuously changing market/industry dynamics.
Have a confident and determined approach.
Be able to build strong collaborative relationships both internally and externally.
Motivate self and others to drive sales and make things happen.
Ability to think analytically and solve problem effectively.
Demonstrate high integrity and professionalism.
Being Multi-lingual is beneficial.
To apply, send your CV and a covering letter in strictest confidence, via email to David Mnisi at  (clearly indicate the position for which you are applying).
Closing date: 15 July 2017.
If you have not received a response within four weeks of the closing date, please accept that your application was unsuccessful.

Desired Skills


Planning & Strategizing
Sales Activities
Relationship Management



Human Resource Management
Reporting


Desired Qualification Accreditation


Diploma


About The Employer
An established business engaged in the sale and distribution of wholesale foodstuff and the provision of other logistic services on a national scale is looking for an experienced administrative clerk to take care of the administrative function at its Linbro Park branch.

Employer & Job Benefits


Market Related Basic Salary plus Commission 



Provident fund and Petrol Allowance and/or Petrol Card

About the agency
Communicate Midrand FinanceCommunicate Recruitment is a specialist recruitment company with over 3 decades of experience. We Connect Great People in the Engineering, Finance, IT and Supply Chain / Freight industries throughout Africa and South Africa. Our aim is to partner with you and introduce you to exceptional candidates on a permanent, contract or temporary basis.
Communicate Recruitment has offices throughout South Africa and a longstanding network of clients and candidates throughout Southern Africa.
We are a large team of consultants with decades of experience that provides deep understanding of the recruitment industry and the fields we specialise in.
Our brand is a proud trading division within ADvTECH Resourcing, which is the recruitment arm of ADvTECH Limited.
Masters of Specialisation
When we say that we are ‘specialist’ recruiters, it goes way beyond words.
For us, specialisation means that we have a wealth of knowledge about the niche industries we recruit for. We ¬understand salary structures according to skill levels and career pathing in each specialist niche. We have real connections, established networks, valuable expertise and

Engineering

As Africa comes into its own and South Africa grows its infrastructure, talented engineering candidates are in short supply.
At Communicate, we understand how in demand these resources are in our rapidly developing economy, where engineering skills are vital. Within our sector specific established network and knowledge base we are able to connect employers to talent, and engineers to career opportunities.
Our team has access to highly skilled engineering candidates in civil, structural, mechanical, electrical, electronic, engineering sales, production and trade fields.

Finance

Communicate has become the go-to recruitment team for financial recruitment. Our consultants have a finger on the finance pulse, always attracting top-notch candidates for this important part of the economy.
We have great relationships with our exclusive skilled finance candidates and we are able to place people across all levels and in all categories of the financial industry.
We make it our business to stay up to date with the ever-changing technical and compliance requirements of the industry. With a rock-solid knowledge of the finance landscape, we understand the pressing deadlines that come with being a financial or accounting professional.
We pride ourselves on building lasting relationships – in fact, in many cases our candidates become our clients. We believe that says a lot about the way we work.

Information Technology

An industry that’s constantly reinventing itself needs the support of innovative recruiters who are up to the minute on the latest trends and challenges. That’s where we come in.
Communicates tech-savvy IT Recruitment Consultants know this ever-changing landscape inside out. We’re known to perfectly pair candidate and technology and we have access to specialists ranging from developers to top system architects, consultants in CRM and ERP, project managers and systems engineers.

Supply Chain and Freight 

At Communicate, we look for great people who will drive business forward and enable both the Supply Chain and Freight industries to reshape themselves to the current Southern African trade landscape.
We understand that Supply Chain is the heartbeat of business. This exciting industry offers an array of opportunities in sales, operations and management for experienced candidates. As the golden thread between supply and demand, the Freight industry presents equally exciting employment opportunities that tap into the pulse of our economy.
The Communicate team is able to source top candidates in procurement, production, logistics, freight as well as warehousing and distribution.

title: Sales Team Manager
description:
MMI Holdings job in Country View, Gauteng | CareerJunction













 

 













 



 

 

 





















 















Permanent Senior position
Country View, Gauteng
Undisclosed cost to company




Job 2113474
Posted 15 Jun 2017 by MMI Holdings













About the Position
MMI Holdings Limited (MMI) is a South African based financial services group listed on the South
African stock exchange, the JSE. The core businesses of MMI are long and short-term insurance,
asset management, savings, investment, health care administration and employee benefits. These
product and service solutions are provided to all market segments through operating brands
Metropolitan and Momentum.
Role Purpose
To efficiently manage a team of sales agents within the sales call centre by
driving the daily production and achievement of set targets and providing accurate
daily reporting on individual and team performance
Requirements

Proven track record of delivering on Sales Support targets
Sound knowledge and experience in coaching
Responsibilities and work outputs
Monitoring daily performance of sales agents
Maintaining sales quality standards
Motivating and coaching Agents to achieve and exceed set targets.
Managing overall productivity of the team.
To foster a high-performance sales culture within the department.
To identify and manage team and individual performance to ensure consistent performance
outputs that meet or exceed the defined targets as reflected in the Agents Individual Performance
Contract.
To performance-manage Agents, by initially offering coaching, mentoring and development,
thereafter work performance counseling.
To actively monitor QA scores for Agents and initiate interventions (coaching, training, group call
evaluations) to address under-performance.
To develop and build relationships with the Agents, Manager and other Team Managers in a
manner that is conducive to a high performance, sales culture
To draw Agent performance data (sales, sales quality, productivity, etc), and ensure that the
monthly commission calculations are correct.
To listen to a random selection of calls and provide Agents with on-the-job coaching, mentoring
to address skills and knowledge gaps, and to plan for future development needs.
To hold hourly/daily/ weekly / monthly meetings with individual Agents and the team to discuss
performance and document these sessions.
Responsible for achieving and exceeding set business Sales activation targets.
Identifying staff training and development needs
Compliance, Risk, IR processes, appropriate management reporting
People and Performance Management
Rewards and Recognition
Staff Retention
Employee wellness / engagement
Lead and Mentor subordinates
Conducting quarterly performance reviews.
Coaching, mentoring and motivating staff
Create a Value creation and High performance culture

Competencies required

Deciding and Initiating Action
Leading and Supervising
Adhering to principles and values
Persuading and Influencing
Analysing and Interpreting
Formulating strategies and concepts
Organising and Executing
Coping with Pressure and setbacks
Entrepreneurial and commercial thinking

Experience and Qualifications

Matric and relevant sales qualification
RE Qualification and 120 FAIS credits will be an advantage
Minimum 3 years experience managing a Call Centre Sales Team within the financial and or
retail environment.

Should you not hear from us within 2 weeks of application please note that your application has been unsuccessful.

Desired Skills


Sales Team Manager 


Desired Work Experience


2 to 5 years Team Leader & Supervisor


Desired Qualification Accreditation


Diploma

title: Business Developer
description:
Job Description
Job/Title: Business Developer
Job level: Position of trust and confidentiality
Legal Entity/Department: PalletBiz SADC
Direct reference: Project Man. & Partner, PalletBiz RSA
In-direct references: Commercial Manager, PalletBiz RSA
Back-office (s): Gauteng & Bronkhorstspruit
Competencies/Capabilities:
Basic Competencies/Experience:
o English - written and spoken languages. Other local languages would be an advantage
o Higher relevant education in Economics or Business Administration field
o Relevant management training
o Minimum five years of management experience
o Good experience from Sales, Marketing and Business Development
o Proficient IT-user (min.: Microsoft software systems)
Capabilities:
Highly efficient in personal sales
Experience in developing, implementing and managing sales portfolios
Experience in development of sales concepts and marketing activities
Personal characteristics:
Open and extrovert
Proactive approach to business development
Loyal and thinking "Win/Win"
Good analytical abilities and commercial thinking
Engaged and engaging!
Job mission and vision:

Efficient sales penetration of South Africa, initially focused to Gauteng, Mpumalanga, KZN, Limpopo, North West & Free state.
Effective increase of market share in South Africa - using the production site in Bronkhorstspruit and later other production sites available
Developing a good diversified product mix in South Africa - introducing more products and after-sale products step by step.
Achieving high level utilization and master data accuracy of the PalletBiz sales and marketing systems
Achieving the performance targets and success criteria - as agreed.
Heading or participating in Key Account Teams related to major clients within the scope of PalletBiz Global Sourcing & Sales / PalletBiz RSA.
The 2019 vision is to become among the top 3 leading providers of packaging and handling material in RSA and to have increased the position and awareness significantly in South Africa.

Work place and time:
The work is initially carried out with starting point from home.
The work will require much driving and travelling within XXXX.
Job Success Criteria and Performance Goals:
The job is a high level position with reference to the Man. director and possibly COO of PalletBiz, which requires agreement on non-competition and confidentiality in addition to normal job success criteria.
Standard job success criteria:

Attaining the performance goals as described below
Respecting, living by - and promoting the company values in every aspect of the work - and in all relations with fellow PalletBiz employees, clients as well as suppliers.

Performance goals are reviewed twice a year at the employment reviews - which are disengaged from the remuneration reviews.
Main job content: Sales Development

Through high efficiency of field visits to chart and penetrate the markets agreed.
On a daily basis to register customer and market information in the PalletBiz Customer Relationship Management (CRM) system in accordance with the company policies.
Based on the data gathered about the market territories to plan further sales drives, product introduction drives, etc. - to further growth of the market shares
Responsible for weekly update of the rolling sales forecast in the CRM system
In cooperation with PalletBiz Global Sourcing & Sales & back-office functions to develop effective sales, marketing tools and product marketing concepts. When ready to do so and if agreed with the board of PalletBiz GSS - advocate the PalletBiz Franchise Network.
Participate in marketing activities in cooperation with suppliers
Participate in the continuous improvement of the company IT systems for sales and marketing

Key Performance Indicators & Targets:
By XX 2017:
Visits per day (4 weeks rolling average): 3 (all prospects)
HitRate - Offer to Order (3 months rolling average): 30%
Ordered units per week (4 weeks rolling average): [URL Removed]
Sales Revenue (4 weeks rolling average): DKK [URL Removed]
Gross Contribution: 12%
By XX 2017:
Visits per day (4 weeks rolling average): 4 (2 prospects and 2 accounts)
HitRate - Offer to Order (3 months rolling average): 40%
Ordered units per week (4 weeks rolling average): [URL Removed]
Sales Revenue (4 weeks rolling average): DKK [URL Removed]
Gross Contribution: 15%

Desired Skills


Highly efficient in personal sales
Experience in developing implementing and managing sales portfolios



Experience in development of sales concepts and marketing activities

PalletBiz
Bronkhorstspruit
Octavia Mlaba

title: Store Manager
description:
Minimum Requirements:
 Matric, Minimum 2 years retail store management experience with an outdoor  / sport retail brand, Excellent interpersonal and communication skills , An extroverted, friendly and outgoing nature, Must have the proven ability and experience at driving turnover, controlling expenses and performance managing a team

About The Employer
Adventure, the great outdoors, sport and an active lifestyle epitomise this outdoor and adventure retailer;  and they have an opportunity for a Store Manager to be based in Johannesburg. Duties (will include but not limited to):
 Scheduling and assigning employees; Recruiting, selecting, orienting, and training employees; Coaching, counselling, and disciplining employees; Achieving financial objectives; Building relationships with customers; Managing merchandise levels; Managing sales and promotions; Managing security and risk within the store; Complies with legal and organisational compliance requirements; Takes responsibility for ongoing personal and professional development; Motivates and manages the team to achieve the above.

About the agency
Future CareersFUTURE CAREERS as established in 2005 as a retail specialist recruitment agency.
FUTURE CAREERS vision is based on the increasing need for staffing solutions both short and long term, understanding that quality placements are a necessity to enhance our clients businesses and nurture talent.
FUTURE CAREERS aims to be the most accessible brand within the employment industry, offering a complete package of staffing solutions for both companies and career seekers, using technological advancement through online media to become a predominantly web based business, yet still maintaining the personal relationship with both clients and applicants. We are a dynamic company with a new outlook and fresh ideas and will lead the industry into the FUTURE. To set us apart from our competitors we will re-invent, the difference is our motto.
FUTURE CAREERS is committed to providing unquestionable service and outstanding quality within the recruitment industry. We are driven by people and passionate to help candidates achieve personal success and empower businesses to grow through dynamic placements tailored to their business culture and needs.
FUTURE CAREERS aims to be the most reliable and trusted recruitment agency for both companies and career seekers, by consistent work ethics that are displayed through values of integrity, honesty and through relationships built and founded on the needs of the clients and applicants.
FUTURE CAREERS priority is to understand our clients business and will only refer candidates which fit into the employer's culture as well as meeting their job specific requirements. We will endeavour to spend time with our clients in order to identify and understand the company culture, ideals and values. Relationships with our clients are imperative and an understanding of their business an absolute necessity. We will Endeavour to analyse the current needs and demands of the industry and adjust our business accordingly.
Specialist Retail Recruitment Agency
All levels of procurement up to executive level
Temp Desk
We offer International recruitment

title: Warehouse & Distribution Manager
description:
Manage the operations at the respective distribution centers, ensuring optimum stock management, maximum availability of the tools of the trade; i.e vehicles and sales hardware.  To act as a single point of contact regarding distribution center queries.




 Manage the operations at the respective distribution centers, ensuring optimum stock management, maximum availability of the tools of the trade; i.e vehicles and sales hardware.  To act as a single point of contact regarding distribution center queries.
QUALIFICATIONS
B-degree (Logistics)
3 years exp in a distribution center operations within the FMCG industry
SAP
KEY SUCCESS FACTORS
Ensure 3 PL compliance to standard operating procedures
Stock management
3 PL fleet management
Ensure a safe and serviced working environment
Assist with the execution of the business continuity plan
Facilitate/chair formal monthly meetings 
Drive visibility of all new operational developments
Please note that, if your skills and experience do not match the requirements of this job, we will place your CV on our database and contact you as soon as a suitable position becomes available.  You are also welcome to contact us to discuss other career opportunities in your specialist niche.
Isabel Le Roux

title: New Business Sales Specialist FTTH
description:
Leading Group within the Fibre and Security space are seeking a New Business Account Manager to join their team




 Leading Group within the Security Space are seeking Sales Specialists to join their growing team
You will be responsible for expanding relationships with an existing client base as well as account acquisition and management.  
Key duties and responsibilities will include:  Generate new Business (Includes cold-calling, customer appointments, generating leads , writing proposals, etc.) Solution selling of Services to existing and new customers in targeted FTTH Areas Prospecting and presentations to potential customers Produce detailed quotations/proposals Maintain Customer Relationships Manage the sales from pre-sales to closing of deals Responsible for updating all sales activity and contact information daily/weekly 
Skills, Experience & Qualifications:   Some experience in Security, ISP solutions or IT hardware sales would be beneficial but not essential  Participate in product, process and/or sales training in order to provide effective technical services solutions to customers. Tertiary qualification and/or a relevant diploma will be an advantage Service quality orientated

title: Sourcing
description:
Responsibilities:

Monitor and track cost savings and ensure reporting thereof
Ensure that commodity strategies are communicated, applied and updated
Deliver against the Group Supply Chain Management plans and objectives
Prioritise suppliers for the application of performance improvement processes and resource

Requirements:

BCom in Procurement, Supply Chain Management Economics or Accounting
Minimum 5 years working experience in commodity and project procurement
Knowledge of KING III, PFMA, PPPFA and PAIA
Knowledge of the NEC/ GSC/ JBCC related contracts

Please visit our website ----------------> for further career opportunities.
Kindly note that, if your skills and experience do not match the requirements of this job, we will place your CV on our database and contact you as soon as a suitable position becomes available.   It is not necessary for you to apply for more than one position as your CV will automatically be loaded onto our database where it will be available to all our consultants for future opportunities.
Tlhalefang Matlhakola

title: Fibre Planner - CONTRACT
description:
Fibre Planning, Metro and Long-haul 
Knowledge of Infrastructure Technology, Planning procedures and Project estimates 





 Fibre Planner required for leading Fibre Group based in Randburg. As Fibre Planner you will need to complete estimates and captures Optic Fibre network as per customer requirements.
Key areas of focus will include
Process applications
Conduct feasibility studies
Compile Engineering Specifications
Compile " Bill of Quantities" Sub-outputs
Compile Detailed Estimate Sub-outputs
 
Requirements:
5 Years relevant experience.
3 years’ experience on the following: Auto Cad, MapInfo. Map source and Visio.
Specializing in Fibre Planning, Metro and Long-haul
Knowledge of Infrastructure Technology, Planning procedures and Project estimates

title: Data Analyst
description:
If you’re 3 years in to your analytical career, able to focus on quality and risk, get a kick out of solving problems and forming strong relationships, are adaptable and able to manage change with ease, you may have what it takes to join a global startup. 
You will be responsible for analysing, retrieving, importing, cleaning, transformation and validation of client data with the purpose of providing the company's platform solutions with relevant information.
 
Core Skills:
Business process analysis
Coding C#
SQL Skills, SQL Server and TSQL, Replication, SSIS, SSRS, Power BI, ClickView
BSc Computer Science Degree from a formal University (UNISA, Potchefstroom, Wits) - NON-NEGOTIABLE!
Must have SOLID TRACK RECORD
ONLY SA CITIZENS (NON EE/AA)
If you believe you have the necessary experience, please send your CV to customercare@------

title: Business Consultant
description:
Our client is currently seeking an individual with previous customer account management experience to fill the position of a Business Consultant. This person will be required to engage retailers consistently and act as the primary contact point for all business related issues and opportunities. This person will operate in the Eastern half of the Eastern Cape and represent the organisation in maximising profit margins, to ensure delivery of value to retailers, ensuring compliance to standards, executing image stewardship in line with agreed targets. 
Key Performance Indicators: 

Development of service station business plans in conjunction with retailers
Execution of business plans and monitoring of achievement with corrective action to ensure achievement in line with key performance indicators

Monthly calls in line with agenda
Sales target achievement against sales budget
Optimal resource allocation


Provision of market intelligence to management and point of contact for retailers on operational issues
Dealer Compliance in line with organisational and regulatory requirements

Payment for product in line with policy
Customer Service Agent and image stewardship evaluations
Dealer Satisfaction Index / Relationship Management via Retailer surveys


Dealer support

Training and subject matter expertise on process and standards
Accurate wet stock management
Corrective action in conjunction with maintenance and logistics teams as required



Experience and Qualifications:

Diploma in Retail Management
3-5 years customer account management experience in the fuel / related industry
Certificate in Project Management advantageous
Technical qualification advantageous
Computer literate in Excel, Word, PowerPoint and Outlook
Knowledge of SHEQ and regulatory requirements within the fuel / related industry
Un-endorsed drivers licence
Individuals to be open to extensive travel throughout the Eastern Cape with a demanding schedule

 
Monthly CTC package of between R 35 000 – R 40 000 (dependent on experience and qualifications of the candidate) 
This is inclusive of a medical aid contribution; provident fund contribution and group life cover, as well as fringe benefit allowance for a company vehicle
Guaranteed 13th cheque
Company vehicle, laptop and cellphone to be provided 
 
Please Note: Preference will be given to suitably qualified candidates from designated groups
Extensive travel is a requirement for this position.
 
Applications to be forwarded to ---------------->

title: Head of Finance
description:
Job & Company Description:
One of the world’s top automotive companies is looking for someone with a strong automotive background to join them in the role of Head of Finance. This International Company has been in existence for over half a century and have grown themselves into a leading brand. The successful candidate will be responsible for the following:
 
Effective membership of Exco team
Strategic leadership for each area of the business service units, project planning
Development of service unit strategies and overseeing of budgets and plans
Ensuring required resourcing and structure for service units
Effective development of team members
Transactional and compliance activities
Review of consolidations, budget and performing full financial function
 
If you are looking for a career to grow on your existing automotive experience, apply today for this role.
 
Job Experience & Skills Required:
CA(SA)
5 to 7 years’ experience
 
If you are interested in this opportunity, please apply directly.  For more finance jobs, please visit ---------------->.
 
If you have not had any response in two weeks, please consider the vacancy application unsuccessful. Your profile will be kept on our database for any other suitable roles / positions.
 
We also invite you to contact us to discuss your next career move in finance!
 
For more information contact:
Rochelle Jansen on 012 -----
Specialist Consultant CA(SA) and General Finance

description:

Our organisation is looking for a Senior BA, preferably with banking or at least financial experience.

 The Role: 
Our organisation is looking for a Senior BA, preferably with banking or at least financial experience.
The ideal person will need to work alone.  You will need to unpack the system, report and calculation dependencies that our client has on Midbase and provide detailed specs around this.
You will be expected to support this innovation with creative problem solving skills and hard work. 
Skills  Experience: 
4+ Yearsrsquo; Experience
BSc Degree or equivalent qualification  Business Analysis
Essential
-  Data analysis experience essential.
-  Data reports experience with data mining knowledge.

title: C# Net Developer
description:
If you completed your BSc IT degree and went on to spend a solid 5+ years coding up a C# and SQL Server storm, making use of your aptitude for mathematics and knowledge of .NET Frameworks, you might be the developer we need.
Core Skills:
Business processes analysis
Coding C#
Development and integration with Web Services and Message queues
Experience with major cloud environments such as Microsoft Azure
SQL Skills, SQL Server and TSQL, Replication, SSIS, SSRS, Power BI
SAP Hana, Apache Hadoop knowledge beneficial
Excellent IT and programming skills, particularly Microsoft C# and Microsoft SQL.
Excellent knowledge of the .NET Frameworks.
Proficient in using Microsoft Visual Studio
BSc Computer Science Degree from a formal University (UNISA, Potchefstroom, Wits) - NON-NEGOTIABLE!
Must have SOLID TRACK RECORD
ONLY SA CITIZENS (NON EE/AA)

title: Director of Finance - Africa
description:
Qualification:
CA(SA) non-negotiable
 
Skills & Experience:
Post Qualified Accountant – 7 years’ experience
Senior Management experience – 5 years’ experience
Excellent Leadership skills
Excellent Communication Skills
International Reporting
Deadline Driven
Accurate
 
Job Description:
Experience coming out of one of the following industries: International Publishing; Distribution (export and import); Creative Media involving IP ownership and royalties and Education
Supporting teamwork
Delivering against goals and deadlines in a timely manner
Leading and motivating teams and individuals
Management of SAP ERP System
Statutory reporting and returns across multiple jurisdictions
Excellent people management skills
Transactional Finance involvement
Reporting directly to the Divisional Finance Director based in the United Kingdom

title: Senior Net Web Developer
description:
Key client is looking for a Senior .Net Web Developer with 7+ years’ experience, developed a skillset that includes Angular website development, Typescript, .Net Frameworks and HTML5. If you are willing to embrace new frontiers and get on well with others who, like you, have an aptitude for mathematics, you may just possess the magic we’re looking for.
Core Skills:
Angular, MVC, C#, ASP, AJAX, JavaScript, HTML5, WEBAPI
Mathematical aptitude and strong problem-solving skills
Excellent IT and programming skills, particularly Microsoft C# and Microsoft SQL
Excellent knowledge of the .NET Frameworks
Proficient in using Microsoft Visual Studio.
Accuracy and attention to detail
Teamwork skills and the ability to collaborate with other team members
Self-development skills to keep-up-to-date with fast-changing trends
Professional approach to time, costs and deadlines
Willingness to take on additional responsibility to ensure team success and quality solutions.
Ability to multitask across different projects
Good working knowledge of Microsoft Azure
Good working knowledge of Agile development practices
BSc Computer Science Degree from a formal University (UNISA, Potchefstroom, Wits) - NON-NEGOTIABLE!
Must have SOLID TRACK RECORD
ONLY SA CITIZENS (NON EE/AA)
If you believe you have the necessary experience, please send your CV to customercare@------

title: Statutory Accountant
description:
Qualifications and Experience:
 

Newly Qualified CA or 5 years’ experience within the Insurance Industry.
Strong technical accounting skills.
Analytical thinker / problem solver.
Attention to detail.
Strong organisation skills.
Strong IT skills and knowledge of substantial insurer IT platforms as regards to financial / product / transactional domains.

 
Key responsibilities/ Performance areas include:
 

Ownership of CRIH group consolidation and preparation and analytical review of the monthly management reports.
Responsible for the CICL management accounts and analytical review thereof.
Responsible for the statutory reporting for CICL and CIRH group.
Preparation of AD-HOC financial reporting projects.
Assistance with correlation of information and reporting as required by regulatory bodies and senior management.
Drafting of annual financial statements, yearend packs and review of year end audit files.
Assist with the internal and external audit processes.
Responsible for the tax computation and returns.

title: Operations Manager
description:
To manage the region's operations, supporting pre-sales operations.  This will include responsibility for the regional specific sites with specific responsibilities to ensure the effective and efficient running of these sites.




 To manage the region's operations, supporting pre-sales operations.  This will include responsibility for the regional specific sites with specific responsibilities to ensure the effective and efficient running of these sites
QUALIFICATIONS
B-degree
5 yrs trade marketing and distribution management
Distribution management experience within FMCG
Contract management
KEY FACTORS
Governance of SLA agreements
Comprehensive monthly reporting
Monthly operations meetings
Sharing new business developments
Continuous improvement to the supply chain efficiencies and effectiveness
Effective stock control
Stock accountability through process and procedures
Adherence to customs & excise rules and regulations
Please note that, if your skills and experience do not match the requirements of ths job, we will place your CV on our database and contact you as soon as a suitable position becomes available.  You are also welcome to contact us to discuss other career opportunities in your specialist niche.
Isabel Le Roux

title: Commercial Manager
description:
They will be responsible for 4 direct reports and approximately 100 indirect reports. Gain unprecedented grounding in a rapidly changing and exciting environment.
 
Qualification:
CA (SA) preferred
CIMA / MBA / ACCA
 
Skills & Experience: 
3-6 years working experience in a Manufacturing, Product environment
Navision ERP Systems
Strong Excel and Computer skills
Exposure to Costing
Good Commercial acumen
Exceptional people management skills
Excellent presentation and communication skills
 
Job Description:
Operational finance experience essential (not Head Office accounting)
Implementing and developing improved financial policies, systems, procedures and internal controls.
Supporting and leading the financial functions and decisions of the business and the Board of Directors.
Negotiating Company contracts with suppliers.
Preparing annual consolidated financial statements.
Overseeing monthly management accounting and drafting monthly commentary.
Managing and planning annual budgeting process and monthly variance reporting.
Managing the logistics function including distribution and procurement.
Responsible for Mergers and Acquisitions processes.
Controlling and managing all IT Systems and functions within the Company.
Risk and Corporate Governance management.
Preparing forecasts and scenario planning.
Planning and managing the year-end process and liaising with auditors.
Responsible for two sites, one in Cape Town and one in Johannesburg. 
Travel to Johannesburg required once every two-three months.
Make a name for yourself and become this leading name’s asset.
 
 
Let us assist you with your career. Connect with us on www.communicate.co.za and Register your CV to create a profile, view Finance jobs and apply.
 
If you have not had any response in two weeks, please consider your application unsuccessful. Your profile will be kept on our database and we will connect with you with any other suitable roles or positions.
We also invite you to contact us to discuss other exciting career opportunities in our niche area!
For more information please call, NICKY HARRISON on 021 -----, quoting the Ref: CTF006925.

title: Financial Controller
description:
Job & Company Description:
An industry giant within logistics with a global footprint in over 50 countries has an exciting opportunity available for a Financial Controller in their Johannesburg offices.
 
The successful incumbent must have 5 – 7 years experience and must come from a similar background. They must have hands on management experience and must be able to identify opportunities and develop solutions.
 
The duties of this role include but are not limited too: Reviewing of financial figures, preparing and organizing year end figures prepare  board meeting presentations on a quarterly basis, ensure compliance with group accounting policies and preparation of budget sheet
 
Job Experience & Skills Required:

CA(SA) or CIMA strategic level
5 – 7 years experience
Logistics and Supply Chain experience (Advantageous)
Advanced Excel knowledge
Management Experience
SAP

 
If you are interested in this opportunity, please apply directly.  For more finance jobs, please visit ---------------->
 
If you have not had any response in two weeks, please consider the vacancy application unsuccessful. Your profile will be kept on our database for any other suitable roles / positions.
 
For more information contact:
Nicole Samuels             
Specialist Consultant – Chartered Accountants & General Finance

title: Head of Group Rewards
description:
Qualification:
Relevant Post Graduate Diploma or Degree
Commerce Degree
A Tax qualification will be a bonus
 
Skills & Experience: 
8-10 years’ experience working within a reward function and over 10 years’ experience working in a corporate environment
Strong Project Management experience
Financial Services Industry experience desirable
Deep understanding of the local and global regulatory reward frameworks
Solid working knowledge of variable pay schemes, particularly LTI schemes
Analytical ability and demonstrable modelling through development of financial models and interpretation of information
Advanced Power Point and Excel computer skills
Change facilitation
Stress Tolerance
 
Job Description:
Monitoring the company’s rewards and benefits practice against market trends.
Keeping Exco, the Board and various divisions informed of relevant developments in order to ensure that the business is able to attract, retain and appropriately reward most talented teams and individuals.
Make suggestions for improvement to better align reward activities to overall reward strategy.
Bringing a challenging, innovative and progressive approach.
Building supportive relationships with the Remuneration Advisors in different divisions of the Group.
 
 
Let us assist you with your career. Connect with us on www.------ and Register your CV to create a profile, view Finance jobs and apply.
 
If you have not had any response in two weeks, please consider your application unsuccessful. Your profile will be kept on our database and we will connect with you with any other suitable roles or positions.
We also invite you to contact us to discuss other exciting career opportunities in our niche area!
For more information please call, NICKY HARRISON on 021 -----, quoting the Ref: CTF006913.

title: Audit Senior - Cape Town
description:
Job Requirements;
Supervision of staff & work
Planning of staff to assignments
Preparation & Review of Financial Statements and supporting documents files performed by trainees
Monitoring & managing efficiency of staff members
Liaison between staff and partners
Assist with Audits on ad hoc basis
Assist with taxation issues on ad hoc basis
Preparation of budgetsand proposals for clients
Handling planning queries and changes
Assisting with the PR / ANA process
General HR admin including leave authorisations
Managing assignment audit list
Ad hoc duties
Productivity & WIP management
Minimum Requirements;

Previous management experience essential
SAICA articles - non negotiable
2 years post articles experience in similar role
Caseware / Greatsoft experience - essential
working knowledge of Microsoft Packages - important requirement
Knowledge of IFRS, IFRS for SME accounting standards
Ability to adapt to situations
Initiative
Work well in a team environment
Work well under pressure
Good communication & presentation skills
Knowledge of SAICA regulations
Work well under pressure

Please note that only shortlisted candidates will be contacted. Should you not have heard back within a two-week period, please assume that your application was unsuccessful. All job postings are in accordance with our Client's BEE requirements.

Financial manager ca(sa)
Johannesburg, South Africa
 Salary: 650000 Annually
                Recruiter: Advtech Main Account
                Job Ref: NWF000735/YCl
                Financial Manager CA(SA)
R 650 000 Ã¢Â€Â“ R 800 000 CTC per annum

Are you an experienced and performance driven Financial Manager? Do you have Manufacturing industry knowledge?  My client is looking for a Financial Manager to be hands on involved in the operations of the business.




 Financial Manager CA(SA)
R ----- – R ----- CTC per annum
 
Are you an experienced and performance driven Financial Manager? Do you have Manufacturing industry knowledge?  My client is looking for a Financial Manager to be hands on involved in the operations of the business.  With their focus being on service delivery you will be hands on involved in the day to day business. The position reports directly to the Financial Director.
 
Job & Company Description:
 
Based in Gauteng this company is seen as an industry leader, and focuses on growing their employees in terms of skill and knowledge. You will be managing a team of 15 direct reports. Key performance areas include management and analysis of financial performance.
 
Job Experience & Skills Required:
 
CA(SA) with 2 – 4 year’s post article commercial experience.
Hands on involved in the day to day operations of the business
People management experience required
 
My client is looking for you to start ASAP, so apply now to avoid losing out on this exhilarating opportunity.
 
If you are interested in this opportunity, please apply directly.  For more finance jobs, please visit ---------------->. 
If you have not had any response in two weeks, please consider the vacancy application unsuccessful. Your profile will be kept on our database for any other suitable roles / positions.
 
We also invite you to contact us to discuss your next career move in finance!
 
For more information contact:
Yvona Cloete on -----
Specialist Consultant: Chartered Accountants

title: Accountant
description:
Requirements:

B. Com Honors or a minimum of B.com Accounting.
A minimum of 3-5 years’ relevant experience.
Audit experience will be advantageous.
Extensive knowledge in MS Office as well as Accounting software.

Responsibilities:

Ensure that accurate and complete general ledgers are maintained.
Ensure that general ledger accounts are reconciled on a monthly basis and that reconciling items are cleared timeously.
Review bank reconciliations on a monthly basis.


Monthly reconciliation and confirmation of intercompany loan accounts if applicable.
Preparation of E-filling for the end of each month.
The processing of tenant deposit refunds and appropriations.
Calculation of collection commissions per the next pay roll.
Ensuring that all accounts are reconciled.
Updating of monthly schedules.
Provision of accounting and administrative assistance as and when required.


Assist property managers with finance related issues relating to the property portfolio under management.
Discuss monthly accruals with property managers and ensure that the necessary amendments are done to accurately reflect the financial status of the buildings.
Timeously prepare preliminary financial statements and advise property managers when ready.

 
If you are looking for the opportunity to become part of a hard working team and have the necessary skills and requirements, then apply and send us your CV now!
 
Please apply directly, by clicking on the apply button or visit www.communicate.co.za for more exciting Finance jobs.  If you have not had any response in two weeks, please consider your application unsuccessful. Your profile will be kept on our database for any other suitable roles / positions.  We also invite you to contact us to discuss other exciting finance career opportunities in our niche area!
For more information, please contact on: -----.
Recruitment Consultant: Jaymal Nagar or email: ---------------->

Job Description:
Ability to work under pressure and meet deadlines. Excellent Administrative skills. Liaising with municipalities and professional teams. Conduct Feasibility Studies. Assist with Financial Reporting. Minimum 2 years’ experience in the Property industry.

We also invite you to contact us to discuss other exciting career opportunities in our niche area!

title: Finance Business Analyst
description:
Qualification:
CA (SA) and/or BCom
Relevant Financial qualification
 
Skills & Experience: 
Minimum of 3 – 5 years’ experience in:
System Testing
Financial Accounting
Processing of documentation
Training of employees
Should have sound knowledge in IT
Retail experience would be an advantage
Strategic thinker
Ability to make business decisions
 
Job Description:
Effectively design end-to-end business process
Actively interact provide insightful input to the finance operation plans
Interacting with the systems analyst to ensure business requirements are communicated
Take responsibility the development of test scripts that is in line with the business scenarios
Hands on supporting of the users until the stabilization of stems and processes
Manage the development, testing and designing of enterprise business process that affects the finance
Take control over the reporting and feedback of issues and risks
Ensure training material is compiled and effectively delivered
Work actively with stakeholders to ensure effective communication
 
 
Let us assist you with your career. Connect with us on www.communicate.co.za and Register your CV to create a profile, view Finance jobs and apply.
 
If you have not had any response in two weeks, please consider your application unsuccessful. Your profile will be kept on our database and we will connect with you with any other suitable roles or positions.
We also invite you to contact us to discuss other exciting career opportunities in our niche area!
For more information please call, NICKY HARRISON on 021 -----, quoting the Ref: CTF006907.






 
 
This job is now closed. You can apply for other jobs by uploading your CV.

title: Industrial Engineer
description:
Responsibilities:

Identify, communicate business risks and present recommendations for improvements and solutions
Undertake statistical analysis of all current supply chain processes
Investigate, analyse and evaluate the impact of suppliers in production
Analyse business unit spending (incl. capital expenditure) on the process of delivering solutions
Continually work on improving current processes and implementation of innovative changes.

Requirements: 

BEng Industrial Engineering qualification
At least 6 years’ experience within heavy engineering
Good understanding and knowledge of supply chain principles and processes
Strong Project and management skills
Six sigma certified non negotiable

Please note that, if your skills and experience do not match the requirements of this job, we will place your CV on our database and contact you as soon as a suitable position becomes available.   It is not necessary for you to apply for more than one position as your CV will automatically be loaded onto our database where it will be available to all our consultants for future opportunities.
 
Mpho Lebitsa
Researcher

title: Creditors Clerk
description:
This position requires the ideal candidates to have experience in accounts payable as well as a bit of wage processing however paying of suppliers would be the main function of this position.
Matric is a minimum requirement for this position but candidates with a qualifiction in Finance would be highly advantageous.
Creditors Clerk would be paying around 100 suppliers monthly and the bookvalues could range up to R10 million per month. Sundry accounts included.
Requirements:
- Matric is a minimum requirement
- Fluent in both English and Afrikaans
- Processing wages for up to 130 staff members (VIP PAYROLL)
- 3 to 5 years experince fulfilling the full accounts payable function from processing invoices, loading the bank, reconciliantions, allocations
- Experience working on Pastel would be advantageous however the company works on a system similar to Pastel. Strong Excel skills would be advantageous
- Candidates must be able to work in a high volumes processing environment and must be able to work under pressure - remember this is a Distribution/ Retail concern so similar industry experience would be preferred.
If you meet the minimum requirements for this position, please email your CV to kavita@smithgarb .co.za or call Kavita on ----- for more information.
If you are looking for a position in Creditors/ Accounts Payable, please feel free to email your CV to ----------------> or call me on ----- if you like - I specialise in financial recruitment and would like to try and assist you with your job search. ~ Thank you






 
 
This job is now closed. You can apply for other jobs by uploading your CV.

title: System Support Consultant (Namibia)
description:
Responsibilities
Line Support: Assist customers with all queries and support, Debtors follow up, updating of incident lists and administer bank related dispute queries
Administration: Processing of application in line with policies and procedures, maintaining and updating of customers information and documentation, transaction data, company insurance and testing of new development
Other: Updating statistics and reports, compiling of management reports, external training to customers on use of products, internal training of product to staff
Risk Management: Contact and follow up on outstanding fees of the high risk and the customer support outstanding process, genera risk monitoring relating to payment system in respect of customers and transactions 
Requirements
Financial/Administration Experience
IT support Experience
Customer Service Support Experience
Relevant Payment System Experience will be Advantage
Matric + Other Customer Support Training will be Advantage
Pastel Experience
Excel/Access Experience will be a Definite Advantage
 
Please send CV to ----------------: Subject System Support Consultant Namibia
Your CV must have photo on!
 
Salary N$ 20 000 Basic 
Benefit: Medical Aid + Pension + Travel Allowance

title: Draughtsperson
description:
Roles & Responsibilities

Document small power and lighting installations
Document earthing installations
Draughting of cable routes, cable trays and associated infrastructure

o Receive, verify and collate as-built racking and earthing informationo Inspect installed racking for compliance with design drawingso Produce as-built racking and earthing drawings for Record in AutoCADo Assist in the production of handover documents in AutoCAD, PDF and Excel format

Assist the Client and his sub-contractors as necessary to achieve clarity and constructability of the design

REquirements:

Matric is essential
Formal CAD training is essential
3 years’ experience in engineering draughting
Membership with the South Africa Institute of Draughting will be advantageous

title: Financial Adviser
description:
Our client, Sanlam, has been a prominent part of the South African business landscape. It is a life insurance company that developed over time into a diversified financial services business. The business group provides financial solutions to individual and institutional clients across all market segments through its business clusters. They have discovered a set of social, economic, political and environmental imperatives that require their skillful response. For them, sustainable business practice means recognizing both their broader responsibilities as an organisation in society and new opportunities arise from this thinking. 
Job description 
The role is to meet the evolving needs of their clients. This is achieved by: 
	Forming professional relationships with the client
	Considering the clients financial and personal situation in order to construct a financial plan and managing the plan in partnership with the client. 
Maintain client portfolio by establishing, developing and maintaining business relationships with prospective customers to generate new business. Setting up in-person visits and presentations, following up telephonically where necessary. Conduct professional Financial Needs Analysis to make needs based on recommendation that could lead to a sale. 
Growth and profitability
	To achieve monthly and annual sales
	To build a long-term professional profitable practice
	Compile monthly growth plans on existing business
	Achieve new business sales targets in line with sales plans
	Provide after sales targets to ensure that the new business vests
	Identify opportunities for up/cross selling and write additional business
Client liaison
	Regular networking- identifying opportunities and implement marketing and promotional activities. 
	Build relationships through regular contact
	Client communication- keeps clients informed of the developments in the industry and market
	Keeps abreast of applications, technical services, market conditions, competitive activities, advertising and promotional trends through reading and consulting with marketing and technical service areas 
Requirements
	25 or older
	Valid SA ID
	Drivers Licence (essential)
	Own car and laptop (essential)
	Minimum of a Matric
	Tertiary qualification Adv. (Diploma/Degree)
	RE certificate (advantage)
	120 FAIS Credits (advantage)
	Clear Credit record
	Clear Criminal record
	Minimum of 1 year Sales consultant in insurance experience
Remuneration 
	R11 000 Training Allowance for the first 2 month
	Up to 100%  broker commission
	 Vesting Incentive – monthly bonus is paid based on monthly production (received in the first 24 months)

title: Great position availible
description:
Do you love handling difficult objections?Do you love that rush of closing a client?The perfect opportunity awaits you!!You can determine what you want to earn, we offer you a small basic for some security and on top of that a totally uncapped commissi...




Job Details
Employer: UDM International 

Do you love handling difficult objections?Do you love that rush of closing a client?The perfect opportunity awaits you!!You can determine what you want to earn, we offer you a small basic for some security and on top of that a totally uncapped commission structure!That means no limit!! Looking for a job where you will actually get paid for all your hard work?Want to pay some debt in a minimum of time?Want to buy a car or a house in a year? UDM international has established itself in the sales industry and believe people work with people.You will do NO cold calling. All leads are provided, already per-qualified. Leads are based off referrals from existing clients and these referrals have been contacted with information about our products and services and have agreed to receive your call. Your job is simply to get in touch with these given leads, close the deal, and determine your own salary.You will do NO field work. All sales are conducted on site – so no more driving from client to client and hoping and praying.. Your working hours are from 8:30 until 4:00 from Monday to Thursday and 8:30 till 15:30 on Fridays. As your leads are provided, you will NOT take work home. Work hard, play hard.No claw backs, and commission is uncapped.Training earning Potential:R2 500-R8 000 per WeekIn our sales position you will never do any cold calling.You will be provided with pre-qualified leads that are based of referrals from existing clients.All sales are conducted on site, so no more driving from client to client. You will never take work home.At UDM International you will finally get paid for all your hard work and determine your own income.Our commission is uncapped so your income is not limited and we don’t have any claw backs.Average income for all permanent agents= R31 000.00 p/mAverage income for top 20%=R62 000.00 p/m We keep our sales environment exciting with incentives during the month to keep our sales people motivated and at the top of their game.Permanent sales agents can choose working hours:Option 1:Monday-Thursday           07:30-15:00Friday    07:30-14:30 Option 2:Monday- Thursday          08:30-16:00Friday    08:30-15:30



Candidate Requirements

To qualify for the position you requireMatricClear criminal recordNo Judgements No Debt review.Nice to have but not required:Passion for sales and experienceDegreeSporty background






This position reports to: UDM International

title: Learning & Development Consultant

title: Safari - German Travel Consultant | Maun - Botswana (or CAPE TOWN)
description:
Botswana is our home and the Okavango is our backyard. We understand the animal migration patterns, the ever-changing flood levels in the delta and, if you want to know what the weather is like, we can look outside our window and tell you if it is raining.Our Client is a well-known African Safari Camp based in Maun – Botswana their motto is breathing African Safaris they believe they can change a wheel; drive a boat; tow a stranded 4x4 from thick sand whilst planning a romantic getaway and making a butterfly costume for the school play.Our client is looking for a dynamic fluent Senior German Travel Consultant to manage and facilitate the full operations from itineraries to liaising with suppliers.    



Candidate Requirements

Requirements: Work experience in fluently speaking and writing appropriate German in a business and tourism context, having done translations into English Work experience in remote tourism/safari business in Southern Africa with a particular emphasis on Botswana. Diploma or Degree in Tourism, Hospitality, Business or related with a tourism focus Work experience in remote tourism/safari business in Southern Africa with a particular emphasis on Botswana. Passion for the safari experience A minimum of 5 - 10 years work experience in reservations consultancy (not hotel reservations but putting travel itineraries together, doing quotes, making bookings, finalizing details etc) Thorough understanding of international travelers, their needs and cultural expectations of foreign travel International travel exposure Highly professional including being well presented and well spoken Proven high level administration and organizational skills with the ability to work under pressure and to tight deadlines Strong numerical skills Computer literacy, using Outlook, Excel Preferably some experience with a reservations system and/or with an ability to quickly learn and master TourPlan reservations system Driver’s license Remuneration: ZAR 15 000.00 - ZAR 20 000.00 - Negotiable

title: Maintenance Technician - Body Shop
description:
Requirements: 

Have a National Nated Diploma / National Diploma/ BTech in Electrical/ Mechatronics minimum. 
Have a minimum of  2 – 3 years experience in vehicle manufacturing maintenance and/or technical environment
Siemens PLC and robot training would be a distinct advantage
Be able to read E-Plan Electrical & Pneumatic drawings
Have a good attendance record
Have strong analytical, diagnostic capabilities and problem solving ability
Be willing to work shifts, overtime, weekends, public holidays, plant shut down, whenever necessary and/or required
Be willing to be on standby arrangements 

Duties: 

Repair faulty equipment and parts, i.e. welding guns, servo-pneumatic valves, transmission modules, tucker guns, sealer equipment to ensure availability of spare parts and equipment (spare part management).
Resolve robotic electronic communication faults by adjusting the robotic program (makros) to prevent reoccurring robot communication faults and ensure uninterrupted production process.
Analyse, fault find, repair and optimize sealer, toxing, welding, laser, bolting and rivet joining technology equipment failure to ensure achievement of quality requirements and efficient production process.
Analyse PLC programs to resolve errors and determine root causes of Interbus or Profinet network errors, determine corrective actions to continue with the Production process and ensure uninterrupted Production run.
Fault find, set-up and program SEW drives by using the appropriate diagnostics software/tools such as Movitools, MotionStudio to ensure uninterrupted Production run.
Modify, update and improve diagnostic software on HMI to identify the faulty equipment to facilitate speedy resolution to production stoppages.
Analyse and investigate severe or reoccurring Production stoppages to determine the real root cause of the stoppage and determine the appropriate preventative action and counter measures to ensure that the reoccurring of the fault are eliminated and/or prevented.
Act as support and assist the maintenance shift Supervisor to co-ordinate and control the maintenance team activities to ensure OPR target achieve.
Contact equipment suppliers and technology experts to enquire solutions to complex equipment problems and failures to ensure pending or reoccurring faults are eliminated or prevented.
Document Production stoppages, severe breakdowns, problem sheet, Knowledge Management System, TPM Sheets and PM schedules to ensure all maintenance activities are documented, distributed and knowledge is retained, made available and utilized to prevent future stoppages or breakdowns.
Analyse, adjust and optimize spot weld parameters and positioning to ensure achievement of required quality standards and a smooth production process. (cycle time improvement and optimization of PLC programming).
Conduct root cause analysis of all breakdowns immediately after completing the breakdown, by analyzing the situation, causes, countermeasures and actions, ensuring that all is recorded and reported on required control sheets and documents.
Ensure that the robot Safety circuit is in good working order and that all the required condition that meets the safety standards is installed.
Download robot and PLC program backups to ensure quick recovery of the facilities in the event of a loss of data.

title: HR Administrator Ã¢Â€Â“ HALF DAY (Cape Town)
description:
You will be in possession of an HR qualification (preferably a degree) and have proven experience in working within a similar context within a professional team.
You will need to display high energy levels, exceptional ability to communicate across different departments of the business and work to strict timelines with high attention to detail.
Strong PC skills (particularly on Office products)
Experience in Financial Services, particularly investments would be a huge advantage 
Flexible and determined nature
 
Kindly note that by submitting your application for this career opportunity you agree that Guardian Recruiting may use your application for the purpose of the recruitment and selection of the said position and this information may be shared with the relevant stakeholders in the business.
Please note that only shortlisted candidates will be contacted.
Should you not have heard back within a two-week period, please assume that your application was unsuccessful.
