title: Import Costing Controller
description:
Import Costing Controller





 Import Costing Controller - Finance,City Deep,R18 000 CTC - R29 000 CTC dependent on experience
Clerice van Schalkwyk:----------------
Manufacturer and Supplier of Mining and Industrial Rubber products is seeking a candidate with the following abilities with a strong Financial background
Minimum Requirements
Tertiary qualifications / prior related work experienceComputer literacy – Excel proficiency and previous experience in Pastel advantageousStrong administration and organisation skillsAttention to detailThe ability to work in a team and independentlyIn a calm, confident manner to handle potentially uncomfortable conversations.Sound decision-making and business judgementExcellent verbal and communication skills – (advanced level in English)Ability to learn and adapt on the jobAbility to work under pressure and to meet deadlines
Key Responsibilities:
Facilitate the full foreign logistical function – fromo Recording and documenting orders placed,o forward cover analysis,o continual monitoring of shipment arrival dates,o prepare bank payments and required documentation,o provide payment notification to suppliers,o to prepare the costing of shipments,o capturing of Goods received notes,o capturing of Suppliers Invoices in the various divisionso capturing of foreign exchange profits or losseso reconciling the foreign suppliers creditors account• Identifying and rectify issues at an early stage.• Co-ordinate and liaise with the various departments and shippers / transporters• Ensuring accuracy and correct execution of enquiries• Accurately and timely completion of various reports – including merchanting transactions• Maintaining and ensuring complete administration files and supporting documentation

title: Accountant
description:
Job & Company Description:
This unique manufacturing industry leader is looking to get the competitive edge in their market, by adding an exceptional accountant to their team. They are a brand known for their excellence, quality standards and lack of limitations for growth within a personal and professional capacity. They focus on delivering sustainable business practices, but also they are driven by innovation and modernization of processes and products.
 
You will be tasked to take on the full financial function, which includes duties such as:

Journals
General ledgers
Reconciliations
Annual financial statements
Reporting

If you are a confident and strong communicator and you are in the market to make a fantastic career move to a pioneer company, then it is time to apply today!
Job Experience & Skills Required:
Qualifications:

Completed BCom degree
A completed BCom Honours degree is beneficial

Experience:

Completed SAICA/SAIPA articles
1 to 3 years ‘relevant industry experience

If you are interested in this opportunity, please apply directly.  For more finance jobs, please visit ---------------->
 
If you have not had any response in two weeks, please consider the vacancy application unsuccessful. Your profile will be kept on our database for any other suitable roles / positions.

title: Senior Network Administrator
description:
Job & Company Description:
The primary responsibility is to provide the technical expertise needed to support day-to-day operations. This includes leading efforts to design, maintain and audit our rapidly growing network topology that must meet the needs of a challenging set of development, operations and business requirements. A Senior Network Administrator will be expected to demonstrate innovative approaches to solving the unique challenges encountered at a rapidly expanding risk management company and be able to safely guard our networks. You should have a very strong understanding of core networking concepts, experience instrumenting and monitoring network devices along with knowledge of automating network configuration management. The Senior Network Administrator will also be required to provide technical guidance and support to the Network Administration Team.
Job Experience & Skills Required:

IT Diploma or MCSE
8 years Network management experience
Managing IT technical support functions within a structured service management framework, like ITIL.
A detailed knowledge of a wide range of ICT products, systems and services supporting the delivering of a Technical Quality Assurance function.
Managing and directing staff delivering ICT research projects to time, cost and quality.
Extensive knowledge of desktop, server and network hardware, systems and services.
Expert practical experience of the application of ICT technologies to solve business problems.
Previous experience with handling sensitive personal and commercial data issues.
Implementing technical standards for the ICT infrastructure
Desktop and Data Centre hardware and software
Fixed and mobile networking
Email and messaging services
Telecommunications services, data and voice
DMZ and firewall services
Providing senior networking expertise to the IT Operations team.
Ensuring 24/7 availability of services and infrastructure in our production environment
Responding to after-hoursIT emergencies, lead the mitigation and resolution processes.
VMware Implementation and  Administration
Active Directory
Understanding and installation of certificates
Networking
Network Storage Management and performance tuning
Implementation of hardware and software
Software and Hardware asset management, e.g. on Software VMware and Microsoft
Backups with offsite replication
SCCM
Exchange Administration

If you are interested in this opportunity, please apply directly. 
For more IT jobs, please visit ---------------->
If you have not had any response in two weeks, please consider the vacancy application unsuccessful. Your profile will be kept on our database for any other suitable roles / positions.
For more information contact:
Mari-Louise van den Berg on 012 -----
Specialist IT Recruitment Consultant

title: Reporting Analyst
description:
Job & Company Description:
This exceptional and individualist company is looking for a reporting analyst to bring in a fresh eye for performance and also bring out the best from this market dominating company through new challenges and opportunities that come across their road. They are a company with a running legacy that is going from strength to strength.
 
As reporting analyst you will be tasked to complete the full financial function, which includes:

Reporting
Management packs
Reconciliations
Forecasting and budgeting
Internal controls

This company is looking for a diverse, adaptable and dynamic individual. If you are looking to get the elevated edge above your peers by joining a performance driven and company going from strength to strength now is the time to apply today!
 
Job Experience & Skills Required:
Qualifications:

BCom Honours degree
Completed articles
CIMA accreditation is preferred

Experience:

4 to 6 years relevant experience in the commercial sector

If you are interested in this opportunity, please apply directly.  For more finance jobs, please visit ---------------->
 
If you have not had any response in two weeks, please consider the vacancy application unsuccessful. Your profile will be kept on our database for any other suitable roles / positions.
 
For more information contact:
Raelene Rautenbach  Senior Specialist Consultant: General Finance 012------

MS Excel and 3-5 years creditors experience.

title: Specialist Artisan ( instrumentation)
description:
Our client, a leading company within FMCG industry is seeking a Specialist Artisan (Instrumentation) for Epping.
 
You will have the following experience and attributes;


Dismantled, fitted and assembled and calibrated field instrumentation


Translate implemented, optimize functional specifications into philosophy


Performed planned, maintenance on control system and Scada/ PLC equipment


Fitted, inspected, tested, repaired and maintained to standard control system and Scada/PLC equipment


Problem solving and route cause analyses


Ensure optimizing and continuous improvement of processing using control systems


Minimum requirements:


 5 years relevant experience within the manufacturing environment


Relevant Technical Trade (N5) with Electronics and instrumentation subjects


 
Only serious candidates meeting the minimum requirements to apply.

title: Site Agent
description:
Minimum Requirements:

5 years’ experience as a Site Agent

Minimum Required Duties (But not limited to):

Civil projects on bridges and roads
Concrete experience
Complete Quality Assurance checklists
SHEQ Assurance, compliance & implementation
Co-ordinate sub-contracts activities
Attending management meetings

title: Junior Application Engineers - internship
description:
Minimum requirements for the role:

Tertiary qualification in Chemical Engineering or Metallurgy or Chemistry is essential.
The company will consider a Graduate who they can train up into the role or someone with 1 - 2 years’ experience within the industry.
Person must either reside or either be willing to relocate to Secunda.

The successful candidate will be responsible for:

Generating technical proposals and managing projects from start to finish.
Recognising new business opportunities and promoting products at existing customers for new applications in the market.
Customers’ plant and client sites visits, site audits and site surveys, providing technical service and troubleshooting to existing customers.
Performing chemical dosage evaluations and troubleshooting on site.
Performing onsite analysis and making recommendations on equipment.
Ensuring safe working conditions and chemical handling on site at all times.
Compiling reports for clients on service work conducted.
Servicing applications for cooling processes, boilers and reverse osmosis membranes etc.
Building strong relationships with customers.

Salary package is highly negotiable based on experience gained.

title: Financial Accountant
description:
Requirements:

B.com Accounting degree.
Completed articles.
1-3 years post article experience.
Knowledge of IFRS, TAX, VAT act knowledge of FSB regulation skills.
Case ware, ACCPAC and advanced knowledge of excel.

Responsibilities:

Responsible for complete accurate and timely accounting records on a monthly basis.
Responsible for preparation of monthly and annual financial statements for management and auditing.
Responsible for effective daily cash management of the company.
Preparation and submission of monthly, quarterly and annual statutory returns.
Responsible for the preparation of a month end file with reconciliations and documentation to support the trial balance.
Ensuring compliance with internal and external deadlines set by business and regulating bodies.
To manage and coordinate the daily tasks of junior and supervisory staff to deliver accurate and timely financial records.
To establish and maintain professional relationships with internal and external business partners on a daily basis.

 
If you are looking for the opportunity to grow your career and have the requirements that we are looking for, don’t waste any more time and send us your CV now!
 
Please apply directly to  or visit www.communicate.co.za for more exciting Finance jobs.  If you have not had any response in two weeks, please consider your application unsuccessful. Your profile will be kept on our database for any other suitable roles / positions.  We also invite you to contact us to discuss other exciting finance career opportunities in our niche area!

Workshop / quality controller - centurion
Centurion, South Africa
 Salary: 14000 
                Recruiter: Absolut Career Personnel
                Job Ref: PTA004250/DP
                We need a strong Quality Controller with working experience in a Motor Dealership




 Workshop / Quality Controller – Centurion
R15 000 + benefits.  Std 10.  Must have working experience as a Quality Controller from within a Motor Dealership.  Automate experience a must.  Please mail your CV to ---------------->

title: Junior Application Engineers - internship
description:
Minimum requirements for the role:

Tertiary qualification in Chemical Engineering or Metallurgy or Chemistry is essential.
The company will consider a Graduate who they can train up into the role or someone with 1 - 2 years’ experience within the industry.
Person must either reside or either be willing to relocate to Secunda.

The successful candidate will be responsible for:

Generating technical proposals and managing projects from start to finish.
Recognising new business opportunities and promoting products at existing customers for new applications in the market.
Customers’ plant and client sites visits, site audits and site surveys, providing technical service and troubleshooting to existing customers.
Performing chemical dosage evaluations and troubleshooting on site.
Performing onsite analysis and making recommendations on equipment.
Ensuring safe working conditions and chemical handling on site at all times.
Compiling reports for clients on service work conducted.
Servicing applications for cooling processes, boilers and reverse osmosis membranes etc.
Building strong relationships with customers.

Salary package is highly negotiable based on experience gained.

title: Management Accountant
description:
Job & Company Description:
With the growth of this organisation can be contributed to the holding company in China, this collaboration speaks volumes to the growing interest from global Chinese Industry in unlocking the true Africa potential. This role will require experience in conducting stock audits, budgeting, cost control principles, and preparation of various financial reports and financial analysis of individual branch and department operations. This role will challenge you as well as enlighten you. You need to have the ability to analyse financial data and prepare financial reports. Timing is everything so donmt delay in applying to this as soon as possible.
 
Job Experience & Skills Required:
Bcom in Financial Accounting
Experience in the austomotive industry
Knowledge of GAAP or IFRS
Experience on SAP or with any motor industry computer package (Kerridge, Automate, etc.)
 
If you are interested in this opportunity, please apply directly.  For more finance jobs, please visit ---------------->
 
If you have not had any response in two weeks, please consider the vacancy application unsuccessful. Your profile will be kept on our database for any other suitable roles / positions.
 
For more information contact:
Sunette Roccon on 012 -----
Senior Specialist Consultant: General Finance and Chartered Accountant

title: Cost Accountant
description: Job & Company Description: A global leader within the manufacturing sector is looking for an ambitious and adaptive individual to join them in the role of Cost Accountant. They currently have operations in over 100 countries worldwide and have some of the most recognised brands. The successful candidate will be responsible for: Preparation of the BOM analysis Identify any issues on product costing Analyse price variances to ensure standard costing Improvement initiatives for BOM analysis Accura…

title: Cash Book Clerk
description:
KEY RESPONSIBILITIES:
 

Responsible for the effective control of cashbook and the reconciliation of cashbook to the bank statement.
Responsible for obtaining the daily downloading of bank statements into Excel spreadsheet.
Responsible for the preparation and processing of daily EFT and cheque payments.
Responsible for the processing of monthly creditors payments according to a payment schedule.
Preparation and distribution of interdivisional debit notes for the on charging of expenses.
Reconciliation of monthly private calls for all employees.
Maintain BEE schedule spend analysis for monthly cashbook spend.
Maintain accurate filing records and defacing of used cheques.
Perform ad hoc assignments

QUALIFICATIONS, EXPERIENCE and KNOWLEDGE:

Grade 12.
Minimum 4 years experience as a cashbook clerk.
PC literate (i.e. Syspro, Excel & Word).
Excellent time management and problem solving skills.

title: TRAINING MANAGER
description:
Project house require an Assessor/ Moderator/ Training Manager for an artisan training Centre. Artisans are trained for various companies and in-service training ensures that they obtain Trade Tests as per requirements
TRAINING MANAGER: ARTISAN(Apprenticeship) CENTER
Gauteng and Mpumalanga
Manager required for a Training Center.
Will be responsible to do general management of all the training Processes.
Manager will be on Management level and have a good knowledge in Functional training, Education and NQF standards, “job grading systems”, Engineering training and Development. Training of apprentices to artisan level to meet targets set through the MERSETA, CHIETA and MQA
 
Qualification

N6/ National Diploma in Engineering
Additional HR or Management Courses
Inhouse courses in NQF standards

Experience 

3 years on a Management Role in such a center.
Must have previous experience in training of artisans and processes as well as budgets, HR and Labour management.

Responsibilities:

Manage training strategy,
Marketing of the center
Analyzing and identifying training needs
Set up, manage, control and implement of training budget
Coaching and mentoring of all trainers and other staff
Manage skills program, learnerships, apprenticeships and technician training
Direct contact with MERSETA, EWSETA, CHIETA and MQA
Project management and general Management of the training of apprentices to artisan level to meet targets set
Manage all trainers that train artisans through the CHIETA, MERSETA and MQA
Ensure that accreditation requirements are met as set by CHIETA, MERSETA and MQA
Contract management on more than one project at a time
Manage Finances for clients on various projects
Co-ordinate training and monitoring quality of training.
Manage all communication/work with the MERSET, MQA and CHIETA

*Apply via this website or our own webpage: ------
Should we not contact you within 7 days, please consider your application as unsuccessful.  Your resume will be saved on our database for future purposes. 

ONLY SA CITIZENS NEEDS TO APPLY (No permanent residents or non SA)

title: Site Agent
description:

National Diploma

 
Minimum Required Experience and requirements:

Skills & Abilities
Project management
Analysis, Strategy
Communication Skills
CAD

Management and coordination of

Develop using programs such as Python, HTML5, JavaScript and other scripting languages such as Perl, VBScript is a plus.

 
 
Experience & Requirements

2-4 years’ experience designing and programming against common web API Standard (REST, SOAP)
Ability to transform database content into information-rich presentation
Graduate  in computer Science or a talented programmer

title: Parts Specialist (Finance Professional)
description:
Job & Company Description:
A leading international company in the automotive industry is looking for an analytical, strategic individual with a strong finance acumen to join them in the role of Parts Specialist. The successful individual will be responc9ible for the following:
 
Sales trends in order to identify opportunities to increase Parts Sales
Retail price comparisons
Tracking of Parts sales
Assisting Regional Parts Manager
Identifying Parts to be put on special
Drive sales
 
If you are looking for an opportunity that you can grow a career and make a company home, apply today for this opportunity.
 
Job Experience & Skills Required:
Finance Tertiary Qualification
3 to 4 years’ experience in a similar role
 
If you are interested in this opportunity, please apply directly.  For more finance jobs, please visit ---------------->.
 
If you have not had any response in two weeks, please consider the vacancy application unsuccessful. Your profile will be kept on our database for any other suitable roles / positions.
 
We also invite you to contact us to discuss your next career move in finance!
 
For more information contact:
Rochelle Jansen on 012 -----
Specialist Consultant CA(SA) and General Finance

title: Helpdesk Operator
description:
Note: All interviews are conducted at our offices in Cape Town. Candidates are required to attend interviews at client’s offices as and when requested. Call Centre Staffing and their Clients will not cover any travel costs to attend interviews in Cape Town. Any relocation fees and associated costs to accept position in Cape Town is for your own cost.
Minimum requirements:
1. Linux experience
2. Microsoft Office proficiency
3. CRM software experience
4. Matric
This is a junior role and is a perfect opportunity for a young bright individual with a passion for IT to get a foot into the corporate world! You’ll need extensive computer experience.
You’ll learn how to log, assign and update support queries to a team of consultants.  You will need to have excellent attention to detail as you’ll be responsible for passing on answers to some very technical questions.You’ll need to be able to hit the ground running as we support over 70 global brands around the world.This is a permanent role in Cape Town and the successful candidate will be required to work shiftsResponsibilities:Remotely support an in house Media Resource Management PortalAbility to support various browsers, IE & FirefoxTroubleshoot user profile issues causing errorsLiaise with users regarding logged cases via email & telephoneRegistering users onto portalResetting passwords according to strict client criteriaMake use of a knowledge base to get answers quicklyExecution of various client 1st line tasksPersonal Skills:Needs excellent attention to detail and the ability to learn new technologies quicklyMust have a demonstrated ability to communicate well verbally and in writingOther RequirementsRespondent must have a Matric certificateOwn VehicleMicrosoft Word 2003/2010Microsoft Excel 2003/2010Microsoft Outlook 2003/2010Internet Explorer 8.0 & FirefoxMicrosoft Dymanics CRM or similar call centre softwareVarious PBX solutionsLinux experience
Must be able to work 24 hour shifts

title: Cost Accountant
description:
The key purpose of the position will be to maintain master data, product costing and the bill of materials. In addition, raw material cost must be analysed and insightful commentary provided on the variances for the bill of materials against prior period and plan.
The position will require of the individual to perform the following but are not limited to:

Preparation of the Bill of Material (BOM) analysis (month and year to date)
Problem solves any discrepancies on master data. Work with regions, Commercial department and Master data teams to resolve discrepancies noted.
Identify and communicate any issues on product costing related to value chains
Analyse price variances to ensure accurate standard costing in SAP. 
Identify and execute process improvement initiatives for BOM analysis, product costing, raw material analysis etc.
Ownership of and accountability for the accuracy of all raw material master data
Work with Technical and Commercial department on the costing of new products.
Prepare the budget product costing models
Prepare the BOM budgets for plant and company.
Preparation of variance analysis against budgets and provide insightful commentary.
Perform annual price planning in SAP.
Attendance of stock counts and ensure compliance to hard close and year end procedures

 
 
Job Experience & Skills Required:

Minimum Bcom Accounting degree
Completed Articles
SAP and Excel experience will be beneficial

 
If you are interested in this opportunity, please apply directly.  For more finance jobs, please visit ---------------->.
 
If you have not had any response in two weeks, please consider the vacancy application unsuccessful. Your profile will be kept on our database for any other suitable roles / positions.
 
We also invite you to contact us to discuss your next career move in finance!
 
For more information, contact:
Nadine Van Aswegen
Researcher

title: Accountant
description:
Job & Company Description:
My client an accounting firm within an industry leading conglomerate seeks a Specialist Accountant.  The incumbent will be responsible for the following, but not limited to, full function bookkeeping, creditors, debtors, payroll, management accounts and audit packs.  Will have about 20 – 30 clients, must be able to work independently and thrive under pressure.  You will be incentivised by procuring active clients.
 
Job Experience & Skills Required:
Completed BCom degree in Accounting or relevant accouting field
2 – 3 years experience within a full function accounting role
Pastel experience
Microsoft Excel advanced
 
If you are interested in this opportunity, please apply directly.  For more finance jobs, please visit ---------------->
 
If you have not had any response in two weeks, please consider the vacancy application unsuccessful. Your profile will be kept on our database for any other suitable roles / positions.
 
For more information contact:
Mandy de Beer on 012 -----
Specialist Consultant: Chartered Accountants and General Finance

title: ICT Support Engineer
description:
REQUIREMENTS:

Familiar with ITIL3 Best Practices for managing Information technology.
MCSE, SCCM, Office 365
I.T Security Awareness
 Configuration Database and Item Management
Basic SQL Database administration
VIP - Payroll
N+ Networking Skills
General I.T Project Management.
Accpac Knowledge in all modules in Sage 300
Familiar with various programming languages will be highly beneficial such as, SQL Query, VBA, VB, VB.NET, ASP, PHP, HTML
Good back-end knowledge of how Accounting, Ecommerce and Logistical systems operate and good knowledge of integration services such as SQL DTS packages and Web services

title: EXPORT & LOGISTICS COORDINATIOR
description:
Worcester-based wine company currently has a vacancy for an experienced Export & Logistics Coordinator / Controller.
 
The suitable candidate will carry out and coordinate various logistics / export administration tasks.
 
Responsibilities: 

Bottling / Labelling coordination
Sourcing, ordering and stock management of all Dry Goods needed for bottling and labeling
Generating all necessary export documents for orders
Liaise with production regarding stock, packaging requirements & preparation of orders
Invoicing of debtors – Bulk and Bottle
SAWIS / customs and excise returns
Processing sales commissions
Other administrative tasks associated with exports and logistics

 
Compliance with the following criteria is required: 

Minimum 2 years’ experience in logistics / exports in the wine industry
Experience of Export Administration, the SAWIS certification system, Wine on Line is absolutely necessary
Ability to work under pressure and to meet deadlines 
Attention to detail and accurate record keeping skills
Excellent spoken and written command of English and Afrikaans

 
If your background matches the requirements and you would like to apply or receive more information, please:

click on the "Apply" button or
apply online at ----------------> or
forward a comprehensive CV to ---------------- with “EXPORT / LOGISTICS” in the subject line. 

 
Thank you for taking the time to explore this opportunity!

title: Cost and Management Accountant
description:
Job & Company Description:
My client is a medium sized NGO firm based in the north of Johannesburg and they are looking to take on a BCom qualified Cost and Management Accountant to provide thorough support to executive and operational staff members. The incumbent will take responsibility of, but is not limited to, maintaining and implementing documentation systems, manage the preparation of company budgets across all departments, assist in strategic decision making as well as assisting with the general financial administration of the financials. The individual will need to have a passion for people and a need to be available to travel to rural areas within the Johannesburg area.
 
Job Experience & Skills Required:

BCom Cost and Management Accounting is non – negotiable
Studying towards CIMA is an added advantage
Minimum of 5 years’ working experience in a similar role
Must have own transport
Proven track record of costing experience
Excellent interpersonal and communications skills

 
If you are interested in this opportunity, please apply directly.  For more finance jobs, please visit ---------------->
 
If you have not had any response in two weeks, please consider the vacancy application unsuccessful. Your profile will be kept on our database for any other suitable roles / positions.
 
For more information contact:
Kimberly Van Der Walt
Specialist Recruiter: General Finance and Chartered Accountants

title: Data Scientist
description:
Data Scientist

Based in Sandton

R750 000 ctc




 
Data Scientist
Based in Sandton
R750 000 ctc
 

Data architecture
Analytics infrastructure architecture
Data sourcing
Data modelling
Interactive data exploration and data-driven story-telling
Machine Learning / Predictive Modelling / Data Mining
Model productionisation from analysis to action
Data quality assurance
Data sensitivity and security


Engagement with business to understand data sources, business models and value drivers
Collaboration with business to deliver innovative data driven applications
Communicate process, results and limitations to business

 
Education & Qualification
 

Ph.D. or Master’s Degree in operations research, applied statistics, applied mathematics, physics, data mining, machine learning or a related quantitative discipline
Expert in analyzing large, complex, multi-dimensional datasets with a variety of tools.
Deep understanding of statistical and predictive modeling concepts, machine-learning approaches, clustering and classification techniques, and recommendation and optimization algorithms
Accomplished in the use of statistical analysis environments such as R, scikit-learn, MLlib, MATLAB, SPSS or SAS
Sound knowledge of business principles
Familiar with tools that encourage reproducibility and collaboration; Jupyter, Zeppelin, RStudio, git
Experience with enterprise BI; QlikView, Lumira, Tableau, Zoomdata, Cognos, SAP BW, SSRS, …
Experience with enterprise ETL; SSIS, SAP DS, IBM DataStage, Pentaho, …
Development experience in order of preference: Python, C/C++, Java
Advanced Linux user.
Microsoft Office; Word/Excel/Powerpoint/Outlook as well as modern collaboration tools (JIRA, splunk, Yammer, Confluence …)
3+ Years Business Analysis Experience


Fluent with both relational algebra and MapReduce logic.

title: Buyer - FMCG
description:
Minimum Required Skills and Responsibilities:

Previous Buying Experience
Pastel Experience advantageous
Good oral and written communication skills;
Strong analytical skills and Commercial awareness
Tact and diplomacy
Meet with staff and vendors to discuss defective or unacceptable goods or services and determine corrective action
Procurement off all raw and packaging material, locally and International
Conduct research to ascertain the best products and suppliers in terms of best value, delivery schedules and quality
Liaise between suppliers, manufacturers, relevant internal departments and customers
Build and maintain good relationships with new and existing suppliers
Forecast price trends and their impact on future activities
Conduct weekly / monthly inventory counts and stock takes, ensuring variances are investigated and resolved
develop a purchasing strategy

We specialize in placing top individuals in your industry.  Call a specialist at HI-TECH today for a confidential discussion about your next career move.  
CALL US FIRST!! Contact Tumi on JHB -----. Or visit our website Hi-Tech.co.za to see more hot jobs, and upload your CV. Look forward to hearing from you.
If you have not had any response in two weeks, please consider the vacancy application unsuccessful. Your profile will be kept on our database for any other suitable roles / positions

title: Senior Financial Manager CA(SA)
description:
Senior Financial Manager CA SA job in Gauteng | CareerJunction













 

 













 



 

 

 





















 















Permanent Intermediate position
Gauteng
R800,000 - R950,000 pa cost to company




Job 2111012 | Ref NWF000707YCl
Posted 08 Jun 2017 by Network Finance Corporate













About the Position

title: Team Leader SA
description:
We are seeking someone at management level to lead team of Engineers providing technology implementation and support to the financial services sector
Manage 5-6 Engineers
It is understood that the field of Unified Trading is highly specialised in SA so Client would consider someone who has led engineering teams supporting

to the financial services sector ideally (but not essential)
Voice networks
Cisco Core (ie Routers, Switches, Networking)
SIP (Trunking)
IP Voice / VOIP

Purpose Of Role:
The role holder is responsible for providing effective support of projects and operational support tasks, dealing with all relevant issues under the guidance of the manager. He/she will provide support for a number of technologies, including network, Unified Trading product suite, and 3rd party equipment that is supplied and maintained. The role holder will provide assistance in meeting business objectives, solving business problems, and furthering business success by applying industry, applications, and technical knowledge through the definition of high level solutions on projects or the development of operational processes and procedures.
The role holder should leverage the experience of the relevant wide professional communities to discharge these responsibilities, thus ensuring knowledge sharing extends beyond the functional boundary of the role. The role holder may also play a key part in the wide professional communities.
The individual should have a fair understanding of the banking and financial trading environment, voice technology, and customer support.
Key Responsibilities:

To provide analytical and innovative input to projects/operational support tasks and maintain service levels at key customers.
Resource management (team manager)
Assists transformation strategy for a network or technology discipline in own area of expertise.
Onsite customer support for key customers on Unified Trading Session managers, Cisco Call manager, UCCX, OEM Voice recorders in region, Weston digital and Proteus system
Would normally lead on a site related deliverable of a small/medium scale project or implement smaller less complex projects to achieve required business benefits and manage to budget, timescales and quality.
Could be responsible for direct managing of escalations and high level faults.
To contribute to the development and implementation of site specific requirements, policies and procedures.
To ensure operational procedures are in place, maintained and followed as appropriate.
To input to cost/timescale solutions/options and manage expectations as appropriate with customer or Business Unit/LoB teams and may have responsibility for setting up work packages.
Will involve liaising with internal, external and third party suppliers.
To use the relevant wide professional community framework to raise their skills and those of their team to the recommended PC standards.

Qualifications:

May have a degree qualification (engineering/science) or has served a technical apprenticeship and/or obtained NVQ and/or further education technical qualifications (i.e. HND).
Qualified to be and possibly member of a professional engineering/science institution and working towards chartered engineer accreditation.
Relevant professional experience.
Management qualification will be a bonus

Unfortunately, due to the high volume of applications typically received, we are not able to revert to every respondent unless there is interest in your profile.
Should you not hear from us within 14 days then please consider your application unsuccessful - we thank you for your understanding in this regard
Only SA Applicants Need Apply!

Desired Skills


Cisco Core 



IP Voice / VOIP

About the agency
Greater Than TalentGreater Than Talent (a.k.a “GTT”)
GTT is a fresh & energetic company, with a team of professional and skilled Recruiters - who have experience in both internal and external recruitment. Our company was established approximately two years ago with the intention to be an extension of the Awethu Project’s Talent Department, and responsible for all their internal recruitment. Thereafter, we also became responsible for the recruitment within Awethu’s new ventures, as the Awethu Project has established various ventures with entrepreneurs who share the Awethu values. Due to this expansion, GTT has continued to blossom, and we have increased our skills and database across various industries.
We currently have 5 experienced Recruiters, who have all previously worked at large, JSE-listed blue-chip companies. The team is based at Constitution Hill, Braamfontein. GTT’s reach is wide and far spread, as the team’s networking ability is phenomenal. We are all quite well connected, and therefore do not rely solely on the mediums and career portals available to most recruitment agencies in SA.
With our combined experience in the recruitment industry of 40 years plus, we can confidently recruit for skills ranging from junior, semi-skilled, skilled to executive level. Hence I can safely say that our recruitment methodology extends beyond just the normal steps of the recruitment cycle. As a value-add, we also offer our clients the opportunity to screen shortlisted candidates utilising the PI (Predictive Index) and PLI (Predictive Learning Index) assessments, as we believe in assisting you to make the right hire… first time around!
WHY?
Greater Than Talent finds “Top-shelf Talent” who are motivated to contribute to the success of businesses in South Africa to build an economy that reflects our diversity and uniqueness.
WHAT?
We are a Level 2 EME, but armed with greater than 40 years of talent and recruitment experience, sound technology and slick processes.
How?
Greater Than Talent has “feet on the street” Consultants in the thick of emerging talent. We source, screen, select, supply and support motivated contributors to our exclusive clientele with fair trade ideals.
So why should your company want to do business with Greater Than Talent?
1) Our focus is PEOPLE – we aim to assist with job creation and a sound economy
2) Costs - our fees are reasonable and below market standards
3) BBBEE – your scorecard – Enterprise and Social Development / Preferred Procurement points will increase. We are a 30% Black-woman owned business.
4) Our Approach with all TALENT SOURCING – Define Great, Assess Great, Execute Great
5) Processes and Technology – state of the art and innovative
6) Forty eight (48) hour turnaround time
7) “Feet on the street consultants” – networking opportunities
8) “Standing on the shoulders of giants” - our history with Awethu and its ventures.

title: Agile Lean and DevOps Specialist - Sandton - EE Role
description:
Job Description
Promote collaboration and ensure consistent application of Agile, Lean and DevOps best practices. Provide subject matter expertise to aid the organisation in understanding, using, and internalising Agile, Lean and DevOps values and practices. Create and support a sustainable business Agile, Lean and DevOps transformation by changing both process and culture. Establish an operating model to ensure adoption of the Agile, Lean and DevOps approach.
Responsibilities:

Support the Organisation's Technology Process and Business Analysis team in driving the implementation of Agile, Lean and DevOps principles and practices across the Group Technology portfolio.
Assist in driving the Enterprise Agile, Lean and DevOps transformation for the Organisation.
Removing impediments or guiding the team to remove impediments by finding the right personnel to remove the impediment.
Building a trusting and safe environment where problems can be raised without fear of blame, retribution, or being judged, with an emphasis of healing and problem solving.
Facilitating getting the work done without coercion, assigning, or dictating the work.
Facilitating discussion, decision making, and conflict resolution.
Assisting with internal and external communication, improving transparency, and radiating information.
Define change management practices, plan change deployment, administer change and implement solution for communicating new and changed policies.
Provide guidance and support to improved initiatives and ensure best practice is applied.
Preparing reports (progress/managerial) - report to relevant stakeholders and manage the cost and time constraints of process improvements.
Providing all support to the team using a servant leadership style whenever possible, and leading by example.

Min requirements

Practical Agile, Lean and DevOps experience
Proven track record of involvement across the Continuous Delivery lifecycle.
Knowledge of Robotic Process Automation (RPA) practices
Knowledge of other agile approaches: SAFe, XP, Kanban, DSDM, TSP, Crystal, FDD, etc.
Knowledge and experience with widely successful Agile techniques: e.g. User Stories, ATDD, TDD, Continuous Integration, Continuous Testing, Pairing, Automated Testing, Agile Games
Experience applying a wide variety of well documented patterns and techniques for filling in the intentional gaps left in the Scrum approach (example: numerous Burndown techniques, numerous Retrospective formats, handling bugs, etc.)
Excellent consulting, communication and mentoring skills
Previous experience as a team lead
Process Engineering methods and techniques like Lean, 6 Sigma, Outside In, CMM, Theory of Constraints, Root cause analysis, etc.
Deep understanding of common Lean, Agile and DevOps practices, service-oriented environments and better other development best practices.
Understand fundamentals of iterative development
Understand other processes and methodologies and can speak intelligently about them and leverage other techniques to provide value to a team/enterprise
Understand basic fundamentals of software development and IT operations processes and procedures
Understand the basic fundamentals of Process re-engineering
Understand the value of commitments to delivery made by a development team
Understand incremental delivery and the value of metrics
Understand backlog tracking, burndown metrics, velocity, and task definition

Qualifications:

Business, IT or Engineering degree
Relevant Agile certifications (Agile Project Management registered practitioner, Scrum, Product Owner, Agile team facilitation)
ITIL Intermediate qualification

About the employer
Coricraft GroupCoricraft is South Africa’s leading cash Furniture Retailer. For more than 20 years, Coricraft has been the easy choice for exceptional value on top-quality furniture. From just one store in Cape Town, the Group has grown to a chain of over 115 stores in South Africa Namibia and Botswana.
The Coricraft Group is currently in a growth phase and has as bought over Volpes, The Linen Company as well as the Dial a Bed brand in 2014. These acquisition fits with the Group’s strategy to lead the cash value furniture space by offering customers value and an enjoyable shopping experience.
The new Hybrid Stores that incorporates both the Coricraft and Volpes Brand present an ideal platform to promote Coricrafts’ furniture and Volpes’ home linen.
The Coricraft Group manufacture all their coaches locally in two factories in Johannesburg and Cape Town respectively. The Volpes merchandise is manufactured in factory in Port Elizabeth. Beyond this large manufacturing presence lies a sophisticated retail infrastructure, with Coricraft stores across all South Africa’s major towns and cities. For customers, this means there is always a Coricraft nearby.
The Coricraft Group’s staff compliment is well over 2000 employees consisting out of Factory, Retail and Corporate staff. The Group intends to continue investing in its people, stores and marketing to entrench its leadership position as well as ensure that all customers, can benefit from the service levels for which the group’s existing brands are known.

title: IT Operations Manager
description:
The Operations Manager is empowered to manage all levels of technical service and support to the client Group. In addition, to being managerially empowered, the Operations Manager is accountable and responsible for the technical operational delivery of service to the client Group.
Working Environment
The client operates in an Outsourced environment where key Business Partners provide all IT services. Due to the long-term nature of these partnerships a good working relationship must be maintained with all service providers. As The client is situated over 17 sites throughout South Africa and Africa.
Scope & Nature of Position

The scope for delivery of service and support covers the client Head Office and associated offices, all South African based sugar estates and the sugar estates in Malawi, Tanzania Swaziland, Zambia and Mozambique. Furthermore, the scope will cater for all changes to the above-mentioned locations.
Management of the client's IT Infrastructure consisting of personal computers, thin clients, printers, office applications & systems, Servers/Windows Terminal Servers, local and wide area network technology.
Provision of quality of service management, mentoring and career guidance for all on-site staff.
Effective communication in both a technical and business related capacity to the client GIT, all Admin Managers and sub-ordinates
Manage all staff on the client contract including staff movements, appointments, leave scheduling, KPI's career planning and basic HR needs.

Skills

Strong communication, negotiation and inter-personal skills are essential
Good technical and management skills
Ability to deal with a wide variety of people from computer users to senior management, and 3rd Party Vendors.
Teamwork is important
Commitment and dedication to customer service is essential
The abilities to handle stress, manage conflict are paramount
Ability to keep abreast of IT technological and market trends
Ability to take responsibility, perform well under pressure and pay attention to detail

Role and Responsibilities

Understand, own and be accountable for the SLA "Service Level Agreement" deliverables
Management and analysis of the SLA process in terms of call statistics and reports
Ensure the appropriate and correct resources are deployed to meet the SLA commitments
Manage the on-site skill and knowledge level in terms of training and development
Take responsibility for the DRP "Disaster Recovery Plan" for the client Group
Effective management of spares and loan equipment for both new and legacy equipment
Produce and present the service report to GIT at a monthly review meeting
Conduct regular Head Office and mill visits to ensure service continuity, quality of service and customer satisfaction
Control and manage the asset database
General management of code of conduct and modus operandi
Ensure the mills and Head Office complies with the client's audit and group standards
Liaise with the client's other business partners and 3rd party suppliers to ensure the infrastructure is protected
Represent and manage involvement in all IT projects
Maintain a Win-Win approach and assist GIT to implement their Operations Strategy


Desired Skills


MCSE
Networking



infrastructure


Desired Qualification Accreditation


Degree

The AAA School of Advertising is the official higher education institution for the South African advertising industry, with campuses in Johannesburg and Cape Town.

About the Position
Sales Manager
A large, well established importer, distributor and wholesaler company is seeking a Sales Manager to join their team based in Port Elizabeth.
Duties

Develop a sales strategy to achieve organizational sales goals and revenues
Set individual sales targets with sales team
Delegate responsibility for customer accounts to sales personnel
Co-ordinate sales action plans for individual salespeople
Oversee the activities and performance of the sales team
Ensure sales team have the necessary resources to perform properly
Monitor the achievement of sales objectives by the sales team
Liaise with other company functions to ensure achievement of sales objectives
Evaluate performance of sales staff
Provide feedback, support and coaching to the sales team
Plan and direct sales team training
Track, collate and interpret sales figures
Forecast annual, quarterly and monthly sales revenue
Generate timely sales reports
Develop pricing schedules and rates
Formulate sales policies and procedures
Maintain inventory control
Conduct market research and competitor and customer analysis
Analyze data to identify sales opportunities
Develop promotional ideas and material
Attend trade meetings and industry conventions
Cultivate effective business relationships with executive decision makers in key accounts
Resolve customer complaints regarding sales and service

Requirements:

Business degree or related professional qualification
Experience in all aspects of planning and implementing sales strategy
Technical sales skills
Proven experience in customer relationship management
Knowledge of market research
Experience in managing and directing a sales team
Relevant product and industry knowledge
Experience with relevant software applications

Interested and qualified candidates may forward CV's to

Management

About the agency
Prostaff HoldingsWHO WE ARE:
Established in 1992, the Prostaff Holdings Group is entrusted by many successful companies and skilled candidates to provide complete recruitment solutions and highly effective human resource services specialising within the areas of Scientific, Food and Personal Care, Medical / Pharmaceutical, Engineering, Mining, Civil and Building, FMCG, Financial and Management. Our specialised consultants are passionate about fulfilling dreams and aspirations and growing and developing individuals successfully within the industry. Our recruiting knowledge spans 20 years and we pride ourselves in successful long term relationships built with both clients and applicants alike.
WHAT WE OFFER:
We partner with our client and candidates:
• Spending time to understand their businesses and their aspirations
• Identifying the culture of each company and the ideal working situation for each candidate
• Bringing them together to provide their greatest asset - people
• We assist client companies not only with their staffing requirements, but also with strategic planning and market research

• We meet all our candidates face to face assisting and advising them with regards to building a career and succeeding
• We offer our applicants guidance, meeting their requirements and matching them with the ideal employer
HOW WE ACHIEVE THIS:
We ensure an efficient, ethical and professional service to our clients and candidates, with an assurance of confidentiality, having assisted in progressing many successful careers which we pride ourselves on.

About the agency
Executive ChoiceExecutive Recruitment
We find excellent qualified and experienced candidates for your executive roles from our extensive network and database.
Time frame
Within a week of accepting a brief we identify interested candidates, and within two weeks we interview candidates and are ready to propose a selection to you.
Understanding the brief, and specific requirements of the candidate
While we understand that time is important in finding candidates for crucial roles, we value some time with you upfront to understand the context of the role and the personal characteristics and personality of a likely candidate. From this discussion and your brief we identify the competencies required of the role. We also value your insights on the probable career history of a successful candidate, and their probable cost to company.
Advertising
Depending on the role it may be useful to advertise. We will discuss the option with you.
Identifying possible candidates
We have very capable desktop research capabilities and an extensive network to complement our extensive current database which we will search to identify suitable candidates for your role.
Selection of high potential Candidates
Mindcor will screen identified relevant and high potential candidates in a competency based interview, and a selection of these candidates will be presented to you for review.
Client interviews
If you would find it useful, we will brief candidates and schedule interviews for you. We can assist with competency based interview content for your interviewing team.
Checks
In alignment with your requirements we will conduct competency based references, credit, police and qualification checks on a selected candidate or candidates
Fees and terms
The Executive Choice fee is based on the candidate’s guaranteed first year cost to company earnings, inclusive of all guaranteed and sign-on bonuses, and is payable on acceptance of offer by the candidate. We guarantee the candidate against resignation or incapability for up to six months from the candidate taking up the role, and will either replace the candidate at no charge or provide a credit for half the placement fee to be applied against other briefs.
We commit to find the right executive candidate to enable our clients to further their objectives, and to find challenging opportunities for our candidates in line with their life, career and job objectives

description:

title: Process Analyst
description:
Main Purpose :
To design and implement finance processes with a contained business impact within business projects or as part of finance continuous improvement project, ensuring that finance's objectives, in particular, control objectives are achieved.
Key Responsibilities :

Providing input into the finance operating plans
Providing input into finance policies, principles and procedures
Work shopping with relevant stakeholders to understand and communicate finance's business requirement across multiple departments/divisions
Create end to end finance Business processes with documentation
Responsible for developing business requirement specifications
Working with the systems analyst to communicate the business requirement and ongoing interaction to ensure that any development meets the business need
Design, develop, testing of enterprise wide business processes impacting finance
Analysing process changes, risks and impacts and facilitating communication thereof
Developing test scripts in line with business scenarios
Conducting thorough system and integration testing
Helping in ensuring that the environment is setup for business change
Compiling training material and delivery thereof
Responsible for status reporting, feedback on issues and risks
Responsible for supporting the business during implementation
Supporting the users until processes and systems have stabilized

Relevant Financial qualification
BCom or recently qualified CA(SA)
Financial accounting
Project experience
Process and systems documentation experience
Training experience
Retail industry experience
Financial accounting experience
Process documentation experience



System testing experience
System implementation experience
Sound general IT knowledge
Personal Effectiveness
Leading Transformation
Delivering High Performance
Having a Merchant Mindset
Making Insightful Business Decisions

About the employer
Woolworths Pty (Ltd)Known to generations of South Africans as ‘Woolies’, Woolworths is the only retailer of its kind in South Africa, offering fashion, food, beauty and homeware under its own brand name, as well as some carefully selected, well-known premium brands. We also offer a range of financial services in partnership with Absa Bank.
The first Woolworths store opened its doors in Cape Town in October 1931. Since then, we’ve been building on our reputation for superior quality, exciting innovation and excellent value. We now have over 400 stores across South Africa, Africa and the Middle East, and our influence extends to Australasia through Woolworths Holdings, our parent company.
We’ve always been keen to attract and retain the best retail professionals, and were among the first local retailers to offer our employees a pension fund, medical aid and maternity leave. Our generous maternity benefits are frequently used as a benchmark for other organisations. Other benefits include discounts, educational assistance, disability benefits, death cover including a memorial educational fund and funeral cover.
We also believe that exceptional effort deserves to be rewarded. You might receive an ‘on the spot’ award for going above and beyond the call of duty, or be nominated for a Difference Award for making an extraordinary contribution to the business.
For us, it’s vital that our team achieves work / life balance which is why we provide an extensive nationwide wellness support service that addresses every aspect of employee wellbeing (physical, social, mental and psychosocial).
The world is ever changing, and while we’ve grown, evolved and adapted to the changing world, the Woolworths brand has remained true to its core values of quality and style, service, integrity, value, energy, innovation and sustainability.
Whether in our stores, our head office or our supply chain, the world of Woolies is an exciting, dynamic and challenging one that offers wonderful opportunities and tremendous scope for growth for employees at all levels.

title: Financial Accountant CA(SA)
description:
Are you a talented and motivated newly qualified chartered accountant?  Have you completed your articles?
 
If so, there is a wonderful opportunity available in one of South Africa's leading organizations for you. This company is listed on the JSE, and is currently in the top two companies in the world in their niche manufacturing industry.
 
Duties include:

Implementing controls
Completing tax schedules on a monthly basis
Variance analysis on actual versus budget on balance sheet line items on a monthly basis
Journal entry releases for all balance sheet related journal entries
Maintenance of balance sheet general ledger accounts
Monthly balance sheet reconciliations
Intercompany management

 
Qualifications and Experience required

CA (SA)
Completed articles

 
If you are interested in this opportunity, please apply directly.  For more finance jobs, please visit ---------------->
 
If you have not had any response in two weeks, please consider the vacancy application unsuccessful. Your profile will be kept on our database for any other suitable roles / positions.
 
For more information, contact:
Eshana Sewraj-Ramshat
Specialist Consultant

description:

title: C++ Developer
description:
Job & Company Description:
This longstanding company is seeking a dynamic C++ Developer that will be responsible to design, creation, testing and documentation of new and amended programs form supplied specification in accordance with agreed standards.  Develops applications by settings expectations and feature priorities throughout development life cycle, determining design methodologies and tool sets, completing programming using languages and software products, designing and conducting tests.  Looking for someone that takes a logical, analytical approach to problem solving and pays close attention to detail.
Job Experience & Skills Required:

Matric,
BSc (Computer Science or Information Systems)
1 - 3 years’ application development experience in C++,
application design, development, deployment, monitoring and maintenance,
Experience in cloud computing hosting and infrastructure, preferred Azure,
Experience in mobile development (Native & Hybrird),
Experience in content management systems, preferred Umbraco,
Experience in JavaScript based web applications, preferred AngularJS,
Additional Development language experience would be beneficial:

-          Modern website designs and best practises,
-          C#,
-          .Net framework
-          ASP.Net MVC,
-          IIS 7,
-          MS SQL 2012,
-          HTML 5,
-          JavaScript,
-          CSS,
-          JQuery,
-          Web Services (WCF and/or SOAP).
If you have not had any response in two weeks, please consider the vacancy application unsuccessful. Your profile will be kept on our database for any other suitable roles / positions.
For more information contact:
Mari-Louise van den Berg on 012 -----
Specialist IT Recruitment Consultant

title: Internal Sales Administrator
description:
Education and Minimum Requirements:

Grade 12
3 years’ experience in a similar assignment
3 years’ experience in sales administration
An appropriate Office Administration, Sales & Administration qualification
Have a good knowledge and understanding of product descriptions.
Work with SAP, excel, word, power point and internet
Know and understand the variety of products/application in our offering, market & customer base

Competencies

Accuracy and quality in preparing and presenting files, orders and reports.
Be a strong team player, have a positive, can do attitude to assist with problems.
Have excellent interpersonal, communication and commercial skills
Be able to handle conflict
Assist with order entry forecast on a monthly and yearly basis as required.
Compile tenders, load orders, administer T&C’s, completion of Vendor documents

Responsibilities 

To load SAP sales orders in accordance with the CSS Sales Order Process.  
Ensure that all RFQ's are recorded on SAP and acknowledged to the clients
Ensure that the RFQ files are opened containing all relevant documentation before tendering proceeds
Ensure that tenders are submitted on time according to set KPI's and documented in SAP.
Ensure that all decline to quote letters are submitted to clients where relevant
Ensure that all CSS purchase orders are recorded/scanned in SAP and order acknowledgements submitted to clients after handover to projects with lead-time confirmed accordingly.
Ensure administrative procedures are adhered to according to the RFQ process
Accuracy to be maintained relating to the RFQ and order processing
Compile and submit daily and monthly RFQ and KPI reports and assist with general office duties as required
Completion of customer surveys on line

Please visit our website at ---------------->  for more details and to register your C.V.

title: EE HR Officer
description:
Minimum Qualifications and Experience Required:-

Completed Degree or Diploma with a Specialisation in HR Management or Organisational Psychology or Labour Law.
At least 5 years practical HR and IR experience in an unionised environment.
At least 2 years' experience in the Freight and/or Logistics industry would be highly advantageous.
VIP Premier and ESS experience essential.
Proven track record in employee discipline, preformance management and CCMA representation.
Computer literate on MS Office.
Previous experience as a company SDF and EE Manager.
Previous co-ordination and facilitation of EE and Training Committees.
Working knowledge of BBBEE legislation and reporting.
Self starter who is able to work independently and still be a team player.
Able to work with staff at all levels and influence effectively.
Proven knowledge of all relevant legislation, e.g. EEA, BCEA, LRA, SDA, COIDA, OHSA, BBBEE Codes, UIF.
Strong emotional intelligence and resilience.
Excellent time management, planning and execution skills.
Able to build credible relationships with key stakeholders including the trade union and SETA.
Flexible with regards to working hours.
Able to travel on a national basis when required.
Drivers' license and own transport.

 
Responsibilities:-

Analyse training needs in conjunction with Departmental Managers and plan training, including onboarding.
Implement initiatives to promote equality and diversity as part of the company culture.
Interpret and advise on employment legislation and ensure compliance therewith.Develop HR planning strategies with Line Managers.
Personnel administration IRO employment contracts and addendums, job descriptions, performance reviews, employee benefits, etc.
Facilitate recruitment procedures, i.e. job specs, advertisements, shortlisting, interviews and selection processes.
Implement appropriate HR systems and ensure efficient HR admin and record-keeping, including training, EE and BBBEE.
Advise on human capital planning and sourcing in the region.
Provide HR support and advise to Line Managers, ensuring that they have accurate and timeous information to make informed and effective decisions.
Oversee and ensure the implementation of and compliance with the company's HR policies, procedures and processes.
Ad hoc HR projects and initiatives.







 
 
This job is now closed. You can apply for other jobs by uploading your CV.

description:

BSc / B Eng.
Member of SAICE:

Project Design Engineer : Various free state substation
Access roads and Stormwater systems design
Compile Final design Package
Site investigation

Participation in design and execution strategy meetings

We specialize in placing top individuals in your industry.  Call a specialist at HI-TECH today for a confidential discussion about your next career move.

title: Electrician - FMCG
description:
Minimum Requirements:

Must have a Grade 12
Qualification Electrician
Red seal qualification
4-5 years’ experience within FMCG
Knowledge of Poultry equipment will be advantageous
Good communication skills(written and verbal)
Problem solving and good interpersonal skills
Ability to work under pressure
Independent self-starter with sense of urgency
Be prepare to work outside normal working hours
Team player
Computer literacy

Minimum Required Duties Include but not limited to the following:

Ensure all electrical staff are trained
Supported in all applicable areas to ensure all related aspects are carried out in an effective and disciplined fashion
General electrical maintenance
Site preparations
Maintain all electrical switch gear, motors, lights, and equipment during site preparations on chicken houses
Ensure health and safety requirements are adhered to
Carry out instructions of all new electrical projects assigned by the maintenance foreman
Maintenance of machinery and equipment

description:
Booking-support operations:
-Consult with the appointment booking system's new customers.
- Introduction of customers to the appointment booking system.

-Responding to support emails.
- First-time set up of branches in bookingtime.
-Bookingtime customer database management.
-Support with potential technical problems.
-Transfare of corportate clients/ key accounts.
-Act as a hub between customer and techncal department.
-Filter improvement suggestions and, if applicable, forward them to the relevant department.

title: Senior Financial Accountant
description:
Job & Company Description:
Become part of the automotive sector which is responsible for 7% of South Africa’ GDP by joining this specialist within a Senior Accountant role. The company is experiencing an incredible growth phase and has been expanding and diversifying since its inception in 1994. Duties and responsibilities will include supervising the finance department, import cost calculations, compiling and analysing financial information, monitoring budget, interact with internal and external audits as well and preparation of management accounts.
 
Job Experience & Skills Required:
Completed BCom Finance degree
Min 4 – 6 years’ experience within a Financial Accountant role
Experience within the Automotive / Manufacturing industry – non negotiable
SAP exposure
 
If you are interested in this opportunity, please apply directly.  For more finance jobs, please visit ---------------->.
 
If you have not had any response in two weeks, please consider the vacancy application unsuccessful. Your profile will be kept on our database for any other suitable roles / positions.
 
We also invite you to contact us to discuss your next career move in finance!
For more information contact:
Bianka Gohl on 012 -----
Senior Specialist Consultant: General Finance and Chartered Accountants

title: Credit Administrator
description:
Credit Administrator
R----- per annum - R----- per annum
Cape Town
 
My client operating within the insurance industry is currently looking for an Credit Administrator to join their company. The successful encumbant will need to administer and reconcile book in keeping with the finance departments defined processes and the organisation’s commitment and broader strategy. 
The potential candidate will need to have a degree and or diploma in accountancy and experience with reconciling creditors book on a weekly or monthly basis as required and ensure creditors reports and information is complete and timely as may be required for further accounting processes.

title: Personal Lines Underwriter
description:
Personal Lines Underwriter
R----- per annum - R----- per annum
Cape Town
 
My client operating within the insurance industry is currently looking for an Personal Lines Underwriter to join their company. Take appropriate action to minimise cancellations, ensure new business targets are met, ensure retention targets are met, ensure and contribute to minimisation of general expenses, ensure that all stakeholder (e.g. clients, AE’s, insurers) communication is accurate, timeous, professional and relevant.
The successful encumbant will need to have a completed RE5, FAIS qualification/credits, minimum of 3 years’ experience as a short term insurance personal lines underwriter.
 
Should you be interested in the vacancy, please apply on our website, www.------ or call Katleho on -----.

title: Group Accountant
description:
Job & Company Description:
Eager to join a heavy hitter within the industrial manufacturing space then this Group Accountant role could be just the one. The company is looking to add an eager and inquisitive newly qualifies CA (SA) to their team to grow and mentor. The company has various international sites in which it operates and will offer a tremendous learning curb and exciting future prospects.
 
Job Experience & Skills Required:
Newly Qualified CA (SA)
Articles signed off by a reputable firm
Exposure to clients within the manufacturing / industrial / mining sectors essential
Consolidation experience
Eager and willingness to learn
 
If you are interested in this opportunity, please apply directly.  For more finance jobs, please visit ---------------->.
 
If you have not had any response in two weeks, please consider the vacancy application unsuccessful. Your profile will be kept on our database for any other suitable roles / positions.
 
We also invite you to contact us to discuss your next career move in finance!
For more information contact:
Bianka Gohl on 012 -----
Senior Specialist Consultant: General Finance and Chartered Accountants






 
 
This job is now closed. You can apply for other jobs by uploading your CV.

title: Junior Electronic Engineer
description:
Qualification:
BSc/BEng in Electronic/Mechatronic Engineering
 
Skills & Experience: 
Design of CCTV and electronic access control
Client liaison 
Site meetings
Manage full project life cycle
Prepare Bill of materials
Prepare contractor and tender documents
Project surveys and report writing
Prepare brief project estimates
0-2 Years’ experience in Building Services Electronic Design
 
Job Description:
Duties are detailed electronic design, site meetings, client liaison, managing contractors, as well as all project documentation and report writing. This role will require you to eventually be able to manage the full project life cycle. Must be an individual who is willing to learn and grow within the organization. 
Please visit our website, ----------------> to submit your CV directly or to view other Engineering jobs. 
If you have not had any response in two weeks, please consider your application unsuccessful. Your profile will be kept on our database for any other suitable roles / positions.
 
 
We also invite you to contact us to discuss other exciting career opportunities in our niche area!
For more information please call, Claudia Worship on 021 -----, quoting the Ref: CTE016642

title: Sales Administrator- Paulshof/Sunninghill
description:
Minimum requirements for the role:

Minimum 1 – 2 years’ experience in customer service or internal sales is essential.
Computer Literacy is essential with Strong Excel skills – spreadsheets and formulas.
Previous experience using PASTEL is advantageous.
Must be a team player.
Must have the ability to multi-task.

The successful candidate will be responsible for:

Ensuring all deliveries are correctly signed for and received into the warehouse.
Assisting with receiving and distribution of samples.
Data input of stock and orders on pastel and Excel.
Assisting with the distribution of stock to customers.
Carrying out monthly stock counts and report stock variances.
Processing Sales Orders, Delivery Notes and Invoices on Pastel.
Coordinate sales efforts to maximize business opportunities.
Assist and support sales personnel in expanding customer base.
Maintaining the customer database.
Ensuring compliance of corporate policies and procedures.

Salary package is highly negotiable depending on experience gained

title: Store Manager
description:
Starting out as a Trainee Manager, you will be trained to Full Store Manager within 1 year
Larger Retail Store Experience:

Be able to work long/flexible hours in a fast paced environment,
Assist challenging customers
Deal with challenging IR environment

Areas of work would include but are not limited to,
Security aspects of the branch,
Display and merchandising management,
General housekeeping floor and back office,
Quality checks and stock rotation,
Monitor wastage and shrinkage damages,
Quality control and check pricing,
All administration procedures,
Maintain up to date information and documentation,
Co-ordinate and implement sales promotions,
Deal with customer queries and requests in a businesslike manner,
Control and maintain budgets and take action when required,
Consistently analyse profitability and action when necessary,
Optimisation of stock levels, efficient ordering system and control of returns,
Internal communication with staff and making sure that high standards are maintained.
Musts,
Looking for development,
Have drive,
Be decisive,
Customer focused,
Structured work ethic,
Excellent communication,
Be able to build relationships with internal and external customers,
An eye for detail,
Leadership and confident.
Driver’s License and own vehicle essential
Lucrative salary dependent on working experience and level of management R10 000 to R30 000 with benefits – basic, incentive if branch makes target, shares and 13th cheque, company car (Store Manager), fuel (Store Manager)

title: Internal Auditor
description:
Internal Auditor
R----- per annum - R----- per annum
JHB West
 
My client operating within the health industry is currently looking for an Internal Auditor to join their company. The company is looking for someone young and vibrant. The successful encumbant will be responsible for maintenance, development and implementation of the company’s accounting systems, policies and procedures, to support the company’s financial objectives through effective collection, processing, recording, reconciliation and reporting of financial data, verifying the validity, completeness and accuracy of source documentation. 
The successful candidate will need to have a degree with in accounting and or auditing. Have knowledge and experience with sage pastel and excel pivot tables.
If you are interested in this vacancy, please go onto our website, www.------ or call Katleho on -----.

title: Accounts Payable Clerk
description:
Accounts Payable Clerk
JHB West
R----- per annum - R----- per annum
 
Mt client operating within the health industry is currently recruiting for an Accounts Payable Clerk to join their company. The succesful encumbant will be responsible for providing financial, administrative, and clerical support, including processing and monitoring payments and expenditures.
You will need to have knowledge of accounts payable, and maintaining general ledgers, knowledge of pastel evolution. You will also need to have a Accounting Degree and Diploma.

title: Yard Manager
description:
Minimum Requirements:

Grade 12
Good knowledge of general construction practice
Knowledge of hardware will be an advantage
Minimum 3 year’s experience in production, logistics and people management
Experience in stock layout and efficiencies
Experience in planning and set up of yard layout
Driver’s license and own transport
Fully Bilingual any other language an advantage
Computer literate

 
Responsibilities:
 

Self-starter
Manage Health and Safety together with the Branch Coordinator
Stock control
Maintaining discipline and motivational presence using company procedures and standards
Meet report deadlines
Report all issues to management
Good communication skills
Strong leadership and management skills
Ability to work under pressure and meet deadlines
Good health
