title: Data Capturer
description:
In recent years the work of the unit has expanded beyond the original focus of mother-to-child transmission of HIV, to include treatment trials in adults and children, prevention research, psychosocial research and policy development. In addition the Unit has developed an HIV vaccine clinical trials unit (HVCTU) and started with HIV Vaccine Trials back in 2001.
The unit is recognised nationally and internationally as a leader in the field of research and policy in the area of mother-to-child transmission of HIV. It has also developed a reputation as a leading African research unit for clinical trials in adult and children with HIV, with one of the largest cohorts of adults enrolled in HIV pharmaceutical treatment trials in the developing world.
Location


Soweto, Johannesburg


Required Minimum Education and Training

Matric
Junior Degree
Certification or qualification in a data related field
Computer literacy using MS Excel and MS Access
At least 1 years’ experience in data capturing
At least 2 years’ experience working in clinical trials
The ability to work in a complex and demanding environment
Must possess strong organizational skills
Must be detail orientated
Must be able to work as a member of a team
It is expected that s/he will apply consistent adherence to intentional research and GCP practices

Key Performance

To accurately enter Survey / Study data and maintain documentation as per the standard operating procedures
Accurate entry of Survey / Study data in a timely manner
Maintain documentation as per standard operating procedures
Participate in ongoing Data management training
Maintain safe and secure storage of all electronic data and case report forms
Maintain client confidentiality
Ensure that GCP guidelines are followed
Ensure the security and confidential of this sensitive data

TO APPLY:
Applicants should email a cover letter and full CV to ---------------- or visit AJ PERSONNEL's website www.------ and apply online. A cover letter describing the applicant's interest in the position is required.
 
PHRU will only respond to short listed candidates. Candidates who have not been contacted within two weeks of the closing date can consider their applications unsuccessful. In accordance with our Employment Equity goals and plan, preference will be given to suitable applicants from designated groups as defined in the Employment Equity Act 55 of 1998 and subsequent amendments thereto.
Only apply if you meet all the requirements.
Please note that AJ Personnel is only responsible for the response handling on behalf of PHRU at the Wits Health Consortium

Dealership accountant
Johannesburg, South Africa
 Salary: R400 000 CTC Annually
                Recruiter: Pro Tem
                Job Ref: PT001064/SC
                Dealership Accountant - Please click on the link to apply: http://protem.co.za/dealership-accountant/ 

Support and Develop operational implementations and plans, enhance service delivery and reach performance targets





 Dealership Accountant
 
Minimum Qualification: 
 
•     Bcom Accounting Degree 
 
 Minimum Work Experience:
 
•     3 -5 years experience as an accountant  
Full financial and reporting function for all dealerships assigned to you.
Creating, calculating and processing monthly journals 
GL Allocations 
Complete expense analysis 

Ensuring that the debtors’ and creditors are carrying out their responsibilities and meeting their deadlines
Ensuring that the cashbook’s are carrying out their responsibilities and meeting their deadlines
Ensuring that the Bookkeeper’s are carrying out their responsibilities and meeting their deadlines
Ensuuring that Salaries and HR submissions are correct and within the               deadlines
Carrying out Dealer visits and applying the check lists 
Giving feedback of all issues to the GM and FM
Ensuring that all checks and balances are in place as required. (Daily, Weekly, Monthly)
The regional accountant is responsible for finance and admin in the hub and the dealers they service 
Technical Competencies  
•          Financial Accounting
•          Financial Acumen
•          Financial and Accounting Control
•          Research and Information Gathering
•          Technical Learning
•          Trust and Integrity

title: Maintenance Technician - Body Shop (Temp 12 Months)
description:
Requirements:: 

Have a National Nated Diploma / National Diploma/ BTech in Electrical/ Mechatronics minimum. 
Have a minimum of  2 – 3 years experience in vehicle manufacturing maintenance and/or technical environment
Siemens PLC and robot training would be a distinct advantage
Be able to read E-Plan Electrical & Pneumatic drawings
Have a good attendance record
Have strong analytical, diagnostic capabilities and problem solving ability
Be willing to work shifts, overtime, weekends, public holidays, plant shut down, whenever necessary and/or required
Be willing to be on standby arrangements 

Duties: 

Repair faulty equipment and parts, i.e. welding guns, servo-pneumatic valves, transmission modules, tucker guns, sealer equipment to ensure availability of spare parts and equipment (spare part management).
Resolve robotic electronic communication faults by adjusting the robotic program (makros) to prevent reoccurring robot communication faults and ensure uninterrupted production process.
Analyse, fault find, repair and optimize sealer, toxing, welding, laser, bolting and rivet joining technology equipment failure to ensure achievement of quality requirements and efficient production process.
Analyse PLC programs to resolve errors and determine root causes of Interbus or Profinet network errors, determine corrective actions to continue with the Production process and ensure uninterrupted Production run.
Fault find, set-up and program SEW drives by using the appropriate diagnostics software/tools such as Movitools, MotionStudio to ensure uninterrupted Production run.
Modify, update and improve diagnostic software on HMI to identify the faulty equipment to facilitate speedy resolution to production stoppages.
Analyse and investigate severe or reoccurring Production stoppages to determine the real root cause of the stoppage and determine the appropriate preventative action and counter measures to ensure that the reoccurring of the fault are eliminated and/or prevented.
Act as support and assist the maintenance shift Supervisor to co-ordinate and control the maintenance team activities to ensure OPR target achieve.
Contact equipment suppliers and technology experts to enquire solutions to complex equipment problems and failures to ensure pending or reoccurring faults are eliminated or prevented.
Document Production stoppages, severe breakdowns, problem sheet, Knowledge Management System, TPM Sheets and PM schedules to ensure all maintenance activities are documented, distributed and knowledge is retained, made available and utilized to prevent future stoppages or breakdowns.
Analyse, adjust and optimize spot weld parameters and positioning to ensure achievement of required quality standards and a smooth production process. (cycle time improvement and optimization of PLC programming).
Conduct root cause analysis of all breakdowns immediately after completing the breakdown, by analyzing the situation, causes, countermeasures and actions, ensuring that all is recorded and reported on required control sheets and documents.
Ensure that the robot Safety circuit is in good working order and that all the required condition that meets the safety standards is installed.
Download robot and PLC program backups to ensure quick recovery of the facilities in the event of a loss of data







 
 
This job is now closed. You can apply for other jobs by uploading your CV.

title: Financial Accountant
description:
This reputable concern within the telecommunications industry is looking for a finance professional to join their team as a Financial Accountant. The successful candidate will be responsible for the full finance function as well as managing a team. Experience within the telecommunications industry is a requirement. If you are ready for the next step in your career and meet the below requirements, apply now!
Duties:

Vat reconciliations & submissions
Sales analysis & reporting
Stock on hand reconciliations
Inter-company loan reconciliations and interest calculations
All monthly journal postings including relevant high level revenue calculations and IFRS adjustments

 
Qualifications & Experience:

Completed B.Com Accounting degree
Completed SAICA articles (non-negotiable)
3 – 4 years’ post article experience (within the telecommunications industry)

Skills:

Advanced excel knowledge

title: Programme/Account Manager
description:
Serve as the primary contact, provide customer service and build the business relationship between CWT and a designated portfolio of global and national clients providing project management, strategic leadership and direction in order to retain, expand and develop the travel programme within assigned client portfolio.
Provide sustainable cost benefits for the client base, optimise the travel programme, drive the adoption of global CWT tools and retention of contracts by meeting client expectations on agreed deliverables.
Client portfolio may include accounts with strategic and complex requirements.
May work on complex issues where analysis of situations or data requires an in-depth evaluation of variable factors.
Exercise judgment in selecting methods, techniques and evaluation criteria for obtaining results. 
 
Minimum of 5 years’ experience as a Programme/Account Manager.  Business analytical consulting skills required.  Tertiary qualification preferred.
/          Knows and understands software packages required to perform own job function (particularly Excel and PowerPoint).
/          Business principles and practice.
/          Customer Care principles.
/          Accounting principles/administration.
/          Travel industry and products.
/          Critical thinking, negotiation and problem solving skills.

title: Senior Systems Consultant SAP Finance
description:
Take charge of the functional design, development, releases and maintenance of the SAP Financial systems and related business processes.  Work hand in hand with the business stakeholders to understand their requirements and provide technology solutions.  Most important, you must have previously successfully configured the Financial SAP module!
You need at least a degree in a technology related field with 5 years SAP configuration or development experience are necessary and your high level of independence and previous business knowledge is crucial to succeed in this role.
To apply - click link http://bit.ly/2s971EQ

title: Consolidations Accountant
description:
Job & Company Description:
Form part of a company with a giant African footprint. This company also operates within a highly competitive market, therefore constantly delivering on technical expertise is a given factor. The organisation seeks to achieve a healthy, happy environment, where there employees can grow and fulfil lifelong career paths. Therefore there are multiple initiates and programs put in place, as well as enabling continuous improvement. The role would be titled as a consolidations and tax accountant, therefore it would be someone with excessive consolidations and tax experience.
 
Duties:

Tax, VAT compliance
Cost accounting
Consolidations
Reviewing financial statements
Ad-hoc duties
Bank reconciliations

 
 
Job Experience & Skills Required:
 
Qualifications: 
Qualified CA (SA)
 
Experience:
Minimum 3-5 years commercial experience
 
Industry:
Experience within manufacturing or retail industries preferred
 
If you are interested in this opportunity, please apply directly.  For more finance jobs, please visit ---------------->
If you have not had any response in two weeks, please consider the vacancy application unsuccessful. Your profile will be kept on our database for any other suitable roles / positions.
 
For more information contact:
Caylan van Niekerk
Specialist Consultant

title: Senior Group Director
description:
SENIOR GROUP DIRECTOR positions available with well-known high end retail group in Saudi Arabia.  The group is one of the biggest growth markets identified for Retail, hence the business is very keen on finding strong Operators who can drive forward the brand store operations across the group region and also have a Strategic eye for the business. Job location: Saudi ArabiaThe roles could be based in any province of Saudi Arabia (Central Province - Riyadh, Eastern Province- Dammam or Western Province- Jeddah) depending on where each brand have their maximum stores placed.The technical job description:As a Senior Operations Manager within the group you will be accountable for company profit and the development of the Store Operations team whilst working closely with Marketing and Visual Merchandising teams.  Actively contributing to development and business initiatives relevant to the brand division you will take specific ownership for the successful opening of new stores within on the leading retail brands. For this role we are looking for more than just an Operator. Your highly developed stakeholder and brand engagement will see you lead a team of functional and regional management acting in an expert capacity. You will have the relevant knowledge and experience gained within big name organisations and the leadership ability to make a real impression within this large scale international opportunity. Your proven ability to build, develop and implement successful business plans whilst putting the customer at your focal point will provide you with a solid foundation for this role. As will your strong operations skills and ability to mentor, build and develop highly effective teams. Additionally, this role will see you focusing on the following; •	Accountability for Profit & Loss statements •	Maintaining host brand/franchise reputation •	Stock & Inventory Management •	Managing multi-unit retail brands •	Analyzing, re-forecasting and reporting on the financial performance. The role reports directly to the Business Director.Salary offered up to 40,000 SAR (Saudi Riyals) per month for the Senior Group Director position and additionally also offer the following benefits;- Medical Insurance  - Annual Air ticket - Relocation Allowance - 50% Bonus Incentive - Joining ticket and work visa Males & Females must have a university degree to obtain visa criteria and should be above 30 years of age.Should you wish to apply for the Senior Group Director | Saudi Arabia | Retail Group position please send through detailed CV together with a recent photo of yourself.Only shortlist candidates who are willing to relocate to KSA and have done thorough research and understand the living principles of this market will be considered.

title: Chief of Party
description:
OverviewInternational Business & Technical Consultants, Inc. (IBTCI), a U.S. based international development consulting company established in 1987, has worked in over one hundred countries and implemented over two hundred projects.  IBTCI serves government agencies, private sector companies, and several donor agencies.  IBTCI specializes in Monitoring & Evaluation (M&E) across many sectors including, but not limited to, conflict and crisis, democracy and governance, economic growth, education, environment, and global health. Job Title: Chief of Party                                Department/Location: South Africa                        Reports To: Project Director                                       Type: Regular Full-Time IBTCI is currently seeking a Chief of Party (South African national or permanent resident holder) to coordinate the USAID/South Africa Monitoring, Evaluation and Learning Project. This activity will provide technical assistance to the USAID/South Africaâs Health Office, implementing partners, local partners and most importantly USAID and the government of South Africa on critical findings of HIV/AIDS programmatic implementation and learning. It is a 5-year project and the position is contingent upon a successful award.Responsibilities:Responsible for providing management support and technical oversight of the project;Coordinates and collaborates with donor clients, implementing partners, and stakeholders;Provide overall leadership and strategic direction for the activity;Adhere to USAID, IBTCI and local rules, regulations, and standard operating procedures (including USAID FAR and AIDAR);Deliver high-quality outputs in accordance with an agreed-upon work plan and timeframe;Manage a staff of senior experts; andManage financial and administrative resources.Qualifications:Demonstrated experience working in International Development, Public Health and conducting evaluations in developing countries, particularly in South Africa or Southern Africa;At least 15 years of experience in managing and/or implementing complex international development programs and projects funded by USAID (work plan preparation and implementation, logistics, budget preparation and tracking, staffing, reporting and meeting deliverables);Strong leadership and management skills;Demonstrated skills in effectively negotiating with host governments, regional institutions, donors, including UN agencies and USAID, national governments, local organizations, and other partners and stakeholders;Familiarity with managing PEPFAR funding and PEPFAR funded projects is highly desired;Experience in capacity-building strategies and approaches;Familiarity with USAIDâs ADS policy, standards, guidance, and protocols;Ability to successfully manage and contribute to the professional growth of staff in a multi-cultural setting;Technical skills in research and evaluation preferred; andFluency in speaking, reading, and writing English is required.Education: Graduate degree in public health, management, economics, international relations, or other relevant fields Supervisory Responsibility: The COP will supervise the technical and administrative staff under this project. Travel: International travel is required.Apply for this job onlineEmail this job to a friendShare on your newsfeedWorking Conditions: Work is performed in a typical corporate office environment.Physical Requirements: Ability to lift up to twenty-five pounds.No phone calls, please. Applications will be acknowledged, but only final candidates for particular activities will be contacted.We are an equal opportunity employer. Prospective employees will receive consideration without discrimination of race, creed, religion, gender, national origin, sexual orientation, disability, or veteran status. We are an E-verify employer.
                






Fax your CV to 0864812201

title: BUSINESS UNIT MANAGER
description:
A vacancy for a Business Unit Manager has opened in a Kya Sands, Johannesburg- based multinational company which specializes in research and development as well as manufacturing and production of high performance professional cleaning products.Position ObjectiveTo ultimately ensure the company’s success and profitability through sales, business development, operational management, and financial management.Duties•	Relationship management of key business stakeholders and vendor partners;•	Management of vendor contracts to ensure business continuity;•	Ensure that the Business Unit products provide the highest levels of performance and effectiveness within the target markets;•	Accountable for ensuring stock levels are efficiently planned and managed;•	Ensure that the supply chain fully meets the business needs;•	Responsibility to establish a full electronic documentation library that contains product information, case studies, and customer information.Qualifications (Preference for Entry)•	Bachelor’s Degree (Honours) in Bio-Chemistry;•	Business management degree or diploma would be an added advantage;Experience•	Experience in the services industry (hospitality, hygiene, cleaning and retail environment);•	5-10 years’ relevant business experience;•	Extensive Biotechnology knowledge;Requirements within the Position•	Provides business leadership and management for the company;•	Thought leadership regarding business opportunities;•	Drives profitability and sustainability;•	Grows the business;•	Sustain and retain clients;







Fax your CV to 0864975601

title: Analyst
description:
Responsibilities:

Continuous improvement, solution implementation and project management
Implementing and developing LEAN Six Sigma solutions within a warehouse, managing and using system problem investigation
Analysing systems and areas identified for development
Investigating the root cause of the problem and work with system owners, controllers and maintenance team to resolve problem

 
Requirements:

BEng (Industrial Engineering) / BCom (Applied Mathematics / Operations Research / Quantitative Analytics)
3 - 5 year working experience within an Industrial Engineering / Continuous Improvement role in the Logistics industry
Software / System experience
Good excel skills

 
Please note that, if your skill and experience do not match the requirements of this job, we will place your CV on our database and contact you as soon as a suitable position becomes available. It is not necessary to apply for more than one position as your CV will automatically be loaded onto our database where it will be available to all consultants for future opportunities.
 
Simphiwe Nhlangulela
Specialist Researcher

title: Bookkeeper
description:
Minimum Qualification:

National Diploma or studying towards a degree

 
Minimum Requirements:

3 -5 years experience
Kerridge software experience is a non-negotiable

 
Duties and Responsibilities: 
 •Month End Journals - Communicating with relevant parties and working out accruals for relevant month end and processing the journals. • Ensure timeous communication with internal & external suppliers for figures for    month end accruals.  • Processing Standard and General Journals timeously  • All Bank reconciliations must be completed daily  • Ensure that all documents for tax and carbon is signed and received from the relevant people.  • Fixed Assets to be processed. Make sure you have all invoices and capex forms for all assets processed.  • All month end reconciliations • unprocessed payable reconciliation  • Purchase price variance reconciliation  • Maintain purchase orders and Accounts Payable records – daily – follow up on orders not receipted. • Work in progress accruals 
 
 
Join this leading company by applying now!!!

title: Mechanical Design Engineer
description:
Job & Company Description:
My client is looking for a Mechanical Design Engineer to join their growing team. You will be required to implement lean engineering principles, complete mining and machine designing, and design modifications. Are you looking for an opportunity where you can showcase your designing skills and be a self-starter in the industry? Contact me today!
 
Job Experience & Skills Required:
BSc or BEng in Mechanical Engineering (Not negotiable)
Between 4-6 years’ experience in engineering design and machine applications
Must have experience working in a mining company
Excellent knowledge in CAD designing
Own vehicle and valid driver’s license
 
If you are interested in this opportunity, please apply directly.  For more engineering jobs, please visit ---------------->
 
If you have not had any response in two weeks, please consider the vacancy application unsuccessful. Your profile will be kept on our database for any other suitable roles / positions.
 
For more information, contact:
Bianca van Heerden
Specialist Consultant

Johannesburg, South Africa
 Salary:  
                Recruiter: Sentinel Staffing Solutions 
                Job Ref: CET003053/MO
                Warehouse Controller

A Company in Isando is looking for a Warehouse Controller

 Warehouse Controller

A Company in Isando is looking for a Warehouse Controller 
 This role entails managing the workflow of goods in and out of the warehouse whilst keeping accurate records of all goods movement; ensuring professional packing and handling of goods and their overall security. 


JOB DESCRIPTION:
- Provide clear communication between the warehouse, office staff and suppliers/couriers/transporters
- Supervise and lead the warehouse team.
- Administer collections and deliveries in a professional manner
- Keep accurate records of all warehouse transactions – deliveries, courier movements, stock storage and movements
- Ensure correct procedure is adhered to until the items are dispatched
- Manage the packing, sorting and labelling of boxes for easy dispatching
- Stock control & accountability – keep record of deliveries and dispatch and the safe storage of all stock
- Quality control, inspect goods received and verify quality and accuracy against purchase orders
- Facilitate stock orders, stock takes, storage, picking and packing
- Logistics – assist with collections and deliveries, co-ordinate deliveries with the customer
- Logistics – count-off delivered materials on site with customer/representative to ensure accurate hand-over.
- Keep the warehouse in good order – tidy, organised and clean at all times


Requirements:
-       Minimum 5 years’ relevant work experience
-       Code 8 or 10 drivers license
-       Excellent communication skills
-       Supervisor experience
-       MS office & excellent computer skills
-       SAP experience
-       Logistics & warehouse experience
-       Stock control experience
-       Attention to detail
-       A structured approach to work

Salary: R20 000 - R25 000
 
To apply for this position send your CV to ---------------- or apply via online portal

title: Inventory Manager
description:
An Inventory Manager position has become available. If you have extensive Warehouse Management system experience with at least 10 years’ warehouse/distribution centre work experience, this may be the ideal opportunity for you.
 
 
Qualification:
Matric: non negotiable
Degree: BCom. Supply Chain Management
 
 
 
Experience:
Minimum 10 years Warehouse/Distribution Centre work experience with 5 years being stock management and 5 years within people management. 
 
 
 
Skills Required:
Manage safety of the warehouse
Meet and exceed productivity standards
Warehouse Management System work and implementation
Control daily stock accuracy
Product shelf management
Non-conforming product management
Ensure that in-transit sites are reconciled and cleared within 48 hours
Control the movement of stock between the local and export locations
Stock Count Management
 
 
Let us assist you with your career. Connect with us on ----------------> and Register your CV to create a profile, view Supply Chain, Freight & Logistics jobs and apply.
If you have not had any response in two weeks, please consider your application unsuccessful. Your profile will be kept on our database and we will connect with you with any other suitable roles or positions.
We also invite you to contact us to discuss other exciting career opportunities in our niche area!
For more information please call, Consultants name on 031 -----, quoting the Ref: CC000850/TE

title: Senior Financial Analyst (Contract)
description:
Job & Company Description:
A well known organisation who is involved in the marketing of massive cleaning brands in South Africa as well as globally; is looking for a Senior Financial Analyst. Head quartered in the US, they employ over 13 000 people globally. The purpose of this role is to partner with the Export Director and Sales Teams within the organisation to drive Net Sales growth and maximize Net Pricing. Therefore this role really requires someone with the ability to really influence across the organisation as well as implement and enforce internal controls. This person will be responsible for accurately forecasting and delivering on growth objectives, corporate projects and driving simplification initiatives. This is a business partner role, so even as a contract position, this is going to give your CV that competitive edge in the market to really secure an amazing permanent role.
 
Job Experience & Skills Required:
Bcom in Finance (Honours advantageous)
Part-qualified/Qualified CIMA/ACCA an advantage
Minimum of 5-7 years’ experience in FMCG/Retail sales and marketing with at least 3 years specifically within sales support.
Experience in supporting export sales into Africa
 
If you are interested in this opportunity, please apply directly.  For more finance jobs, please visit ---------------->
 
If you have not had any response in two weeks, please consider the vacancy application unsuccessful. Your profile will be kept on our database for any other suitable roles / positions.
 
For more information contact:
Tamryn Harris on 012 -----
  Specialist Consultant: General Finance






 
 
This job is now closed. You can apply for other jobs by uploading your CV.

title: Supply Chain Planner
description:
Responsibilities:

Responsible for planning, scheduling and developing project management tools in support of an organization’s operations
Preparing an unconstrained short term demand plan and overall looking at the market intelligence to come up with a well formulated long term and short term supply plan
Work closely with factory, production, sales and logistics staff
Liaise with raw materials suppliers, to ensure plans are aligned with demand and supply

Requirements: 

BCom (Supply Chain / Logistics / Business Management)
SAP APO systems experience is very advantageous
Minimum of 4 years’ experience in a Supply Planner role

 
Please note that, if your skills and experience do not match the requirements of this job, we will place your CV on our database and contact you as soon as a suitable position becomes available.   It is not necessary for you to apply for more than one position as your CV will automatically be loaded onto our database where it will be available to all our consultants for future opportunities.
 
Simphiwe Nhlangulela
Specialist Researcher

title: Intermediate C# NET Developer
description:
Description:

Collaborate with team members in all phases of the SDLC including requirements gathering, analysis, design, testing, and implementation.


Write business requirements from end-user input and execute requirements into software systems.
Assist in defining software development project plans
Design, run, and monitor performance tests on new and existing programs
Provide end user training and maintain user documentation.
Plan, design, develop, implement, and maintain moderately complex databases which are both internal and client facing

Education: 

Tertiary qualification in Computer Science or Information Technology

Skills:

Minimum 3 years’ experience developing in C#
Full SDLC
C# .NET ,WPF, WCF ASP .NET, MVC, SQL Server, Angular JS, JavaScript, CSS, Bootstrap

title: Sales Manager
description:
They are experts in global supply chain management, customs clearing, freight forwarding, air and sea freight logistics. This role requires an analytical thinker, an adaptable and confident individual who is able to communicate effectively.
The perfect candidate can be an all-rounder and a self-starter. Their Durban branch currently holds no Branch Manager and therefore your sales and operations experience coupled with proven track record would secure this position start developing a team underneath you. A stable track record will be your passport to success apply now and don’t miss out.
 
 
Qualification:
Matric: non negotiable
Degree: BCom. or equivalent qualifications
 
 
Experience:
Minimum 3 years’ business development experience with a proven sales track record and dangerous goods experience will be an advantage.
 
Skills Required:
Excellent negotiation and presentation skills
Confident personality
Customer service and orientation
Sound Inco term knowledge
 
 
Let us assist you with your career. Connect with us on ----------------> and Register your CV to create a profile, view Supply Chain, Freight & Logistics jobs and apply.
If you have not had any response in two weeks, please consider your application unsuccessful. Your profile will be kept on our database and we will connect with you with any other suitable roles or positions.
We also invite you to contact us to discuss other exciting career opportunities in our niche area!
For more information please call, Fathima on 031 -----, quoting the Ref: CC001514/FS.

title: DEALERSHIP ACCOUNTANT
description:
Minimum Qualification:

Bcom Accounting Degree

 
Minimum Requirements:

3 -5 years experience as an accountant
Autoline software will be advantageous

 
Duties and Responsibilities: 

Full financial and reporting function for all dealerships assigned to you.
Full month-end function and meeting month end deadlines:
Reversal of previous provisions
Creating, calculating and processing monthly journals
GL Allocations
Create and compile all reconciliations for each balance sheet account using the mandated formats.
Printing of month end reports
Insure all supporting documents are attached to recons
Complete stock age report
Complete and submit unrealized profit report
Complete expense analysis
Ensure that month end deadlines are met
Complete and submit add info
Ensuring that the debtors’ are carrying out their responsibilities and meeting their deadlines
Ensuring that the creditors’ are carrying out their responsibilities and meeting their deadlines
Ensuring that the cashbook’s are carrying out their responsibilities and meeting their deadlines
Ensuring that the Bookkeeper’s are carrying out their responsibilities and meeting their deadlines
Ensuring that Salaries and HR submissions are correct and within the deadlines
Carrying out Dealer visits and applying the check lists
Ensuring that all irregularities are reported to the correct managers and escalated should this fail to bring the required results
Authorsing payments
Authorising Payroll submissions
Ensuring that reporting is done on time
Asset counts
Ensuring that all dealers adhere to the policy and procedures
Responsible to safe guard the company’s interests and assets at all time
Responsible to always act in the best interest of the business
Responsible for the smooth running of the dealerships admin and finance processes and ensure that the company’s policies are applied correctly in all departments
Responsible for the accuracy of information supplied and the meeting of all deadlines
Ensuring that internal and external audits run smoothly and all related issues are corrected at dealerships and the hub
Giving feedback of all issues to the GM and FM
Ensuring that all checks and balances are in place as required. (Daily, Weekly, Monthly)
The regional accountant is responsible for finance and admin in the hub and the dealers they service

 
 
  Join this leading company by applying now!!!
 
Please apply directly, by clicking on the apply button or visit www.communicate.co.za for more exciting Finance jobs.  If you have not had any response in two weeks, please consider your application unsuccessful. Your profile will be kept on our database for any other suitable roles / positions.  We also invite you to contact us to discuss other exciting finance career opportunities in our niche area!
For more information, contact please contact us on -----/ -----
Recruitment Consultant: Nomfundo Dlamini or email: ---------------->

title: IT Auditor-ACR
description:
Job & Company Description:
A multinational company in the financial industry has an opportunity for a determined individual to join their already successful team as a Specialist IT Auditor. Previous experience within the financial service industry will be an advantage. A proven track record of in depth Application Control and IT General Control review skills.
Job Experience & Skills Required:

Minimal BCom IT Management/Informatics/Information Systems or BSc IT/ Computer Science
Honours Degree Advantageous.
Experience in IT Application Control Reviews and ITGC.
Qualified CISA (Certified Information Systems Auditor)
Minimal 2 -3 years relevant experience.
Preferable experience from one of the Big 4 Audit Firms.

If you are interested in this opportunity, please apply directly.  For more finance jobs, please visit ---------------->.
If you have not had any response in two weeks, please consider the vacancy application unsuccessful. Your profile will be kept on our database for any other suitable roles / positions.
We also invite you to contact us to discuss your next career move in finance!
For more information contact:
Brendon Du Plessis on 012 -----

title: Recruitment Consultant
description:
Big Shark recruitment
                Job Ref: JHB001396/JJ
                Are you passionate about IT Recruitment and would love the freedom to work remotely and be productive in the spaces that make you feel most comfortable? Would you like to join a team of super achievers with the most generous commission structure in the market and an opportunity to work with some amazing customers?  




 Big Shark Recruitment is a niche IT Recruitment Agency we are looking for an ambitious, driven and creative Consultants to join our team.
Why Big Shark Recruitment...

Be 100% autonomous and work when and where you feel most productive.
Be completely accountable for results and write your own pay cheque.
Work with a solid customer base with new job specs coming through daily.
Consistent training and development in recruitment and your chosen vertical to help you earn more when you learn more.
Work according to your strengths whether they be BD or resourcing.

Characteristics of Our Culture
We are a team of extroverted, passionate and compassionate individuals. We believe in excellent communication and an open door policy. Personal motivation and absolute personal responsibility to achieve their goals. Self disciplined with the ability to work independently. We are dedicated problem solvers and eternal optimists. We accept and love everyone as they are.
What We Look For in Applicants...

Grade 12.
Minimum of 2 years experience in IT recruitment.
A successful track record in reaching and exceeding monthly targets.
A strong network in the IT market.
A social presence with customer and candidate engagement.
An in depth knowledge of technical IT job specs and technology.
A self motivated individual with the ability to produce results independently.

Job Description...

Managing all aspects of the Recruitment Process.
New business development in your specific vertical.
Build and maintain relations with customers and candidates.
Source candidates using various methods eg. job boards, social network engagement, boolean strings, headhunting.
Take accountability and responsibility for making consistent placements within your vertical.







 
 
This job is now closed. You can apply for other jobs by uploading your CV.

title: Assistent Evalueerder (Assistant Evaluator)
description:
SFF, 'n filiaal van STEMS Fruit, is betrokke by die verbouing en evaluasie van verskillende steenvrugkommoditeite.  Die produsente uitvoerorganisasie bied tans 'n loopbaangeleentheid aan 'n Assistent Evalueerder in Ceres.
 
Die posbekleër sal rapporteer aan die hoof Evalueerder en sal hom bystaan met die:

monitering en evaluasie van nuwe variëteite
vaslegging van data 
bestuur van proefpersele wat insluit - oes, snoei en boordsanitasie
interaksie met produsente en telers
aanbied van weeklikse proë.

 
Die ideale persoon het 'n passie vir die vrugtebedryf en die vermoë om nuwe variëteite objektief te evalueer.  'n Tersiêre kwalifikasie in Hortologie / Pomologie sal die aansoek versterk, maar word nie vereis nie.
 
Verdere vereistes:

1 tot 2 jaar ervaring in ‘n tegniese hoedanigheid 
rekenaar- en administratiewe vaardighede
goeie interpersoonlike verhoudinge
effektiewe tydsbestuur
uitstekende kommunikasie- vaardighede (Afr en Eng) 
kode B bestuurslisensie. 

 
Indien jy belangstel in die posisie doen gerus aanlyn aansoek by www.------/vacancies of e-pos ‘n volledige CV aan ----------------
 
Indien jy aan die keuringsvereistes voldoen, sal ons jou binne twee weke van jou aansoek kontak.

title: Junior Sales Representative
description:
Minimum requirements for the role: 

Minimum matric.
Previous sales experience is essential, calling on food manufacturers or related.
Excellent communication, interpersonal and presentation skills.
Must be fast paced, results and sales driven.
Ability to build and foster client relationships.
Computer literacy is essential with good working knowledge of Microsoft packages.

The successful candidate will be responsible for:

Managing senior key accounts within the food manufacturing industries, developing and implementing key account plans and strategies to ensure sales targets and objectives are on target.
Ensuring that annual sales targets and objectives are achieved for financial year.
Monitoring market developments in order to identify and assess potential new   customers and opportunities, developing marketing and business strategies.
Establishing and maintaining strong business relationships.
Implementing volumes and pricing objectives established with key account customers.
Building up market and competition knowledge by analysing market trends.
Managing and delivering on technical queries with regards to existing and new products.
Effectively implementing price increases and maintaining monthly / quarterly price lists to customers.

Salary package highly negotiable depending on experience gained.

description:
An innovative shrink management solutions ...




 An innovative shrink management solutions company that provides anti-shoplifting solutions and other products is looking for a vibrant Frontline Administrator to work with a great team to streamline processes in the office and assist staff.  
 
Duties:
 
·         Administrative tasks
·         Quotation preparations
·         Log service calls
·         Welcome clients
·         Answer, screen and forward incoming phone calls
·         Drivers’ schedule
·         Petrol and tracker monthly reports

·         Matric
·         1 year’s work experience in a similar position
·         Computer literate (MS Word, MS Excel and MS PowerPoint)
·         Pastel experience (advantage)
·         Commit experience (advantage)
 
Basic salary: R9 000 pm with Company benefits

description:

National Diploma in Payroll Administration or Human Resources.

Rewards and remuneration.

Systems administration.

HR administration.
HR reports (weekly and monthly).

description:

 Qualifications & Skills: BCom  / BCom Hons and completed SAIPA articles At least 3 – 4 year experience within the same industry and similar role Buildsmart - Beneficial Excellent leadership skills Analytically strong

title: Operations Controller / PA salary R18k - R23k
description:
A company that deals with Electrical, Construction and Engineering is looking to hire a Personal Assistant to start immediately.
Overview of key responsibilities
-...




 A company that deals with Electrical, Construction and Engineering is looking to hire a Personal Assistant to start immediately.
Overview of key responsibilities
-          Administrative and communication support to Ops Director (PA role)
-          Supporting project planning, coordination and reporting
-          Controlling project administration including timesheets, vehicle reports, material and equipment
-          Analysis of project profitability, projections and completed on time projects
-          General operational support functions
Required experience and skills                                     
-          Experience with senior administrative responsibilities
-          Proven track record of executive personal assistant functions and experience
-          Operational coordination and communication experience
-          Excellent communication skills
-          Matric and post matric qualification will be beneficial

title: New Business Sales Executive
description:
An expanding freight and logistics company, is looking for an influential and driven New Business Executive to join their dynamic team. The incumbent must have excellent communication skills, quality interpersonal skills and at least 3 years' sales experience in freight industry. The position reports directly to the National Sales Manager. You need strong proven stable track record in sales and strong experience in boardroom presentations at executive level. Proven ability to build strong and lasting customer relations. Take your career to the next level with this multinational company, apply now.
 
Qualification:
Matric: non negotiable
Degree: BCom. or equivalent qualifications
 
 
Experience:
Minimum 3 years’ business development experience with a proven sales track record and dangerous goods experience will be an advantage.
 
Skills Required:
Excellent negotiation and presentation skills
Confident personality
Customer service and orientation
Sound Inco term knowledge
 
 
Let us assist you with your career. Connect with us on ----------------> and Register your CV to create a profile, view Supply Chain, Freight & Logistics jobs and apply.
If you have not had any response in two weeks, please consider your application unsuccessful. Your profile will be kept on our database and we will connect with you with any other suitable roles or positions.
We also invite you to contact us to discuss other exciting career opportunities in our niche area!

title: Electrician (East London)
description:
Minimum requirements
NQF 3 qualification / Trade test min Electrician (Pre-requisite)2. 3-5 years Motor Industry Manufacturing experience.3. Working knowledge in hydraulics and pneumatics, Electrical and Mechanical repairs, general Engineering and machining.4. Ability to perform various types of welds i.e. arc, gas and manual.5. Basic Health & Safety knowledge OHS ACT6. Ability to read and understand technical drawings and electrical drawings.7. Effective time management skills.8. Good working knowledge of single phase and 3 phase electrical equipment as well as VSD Drives9. Ability to build and repair electrical circuits (Pre-requisite)10. Good Programming skills on Siemens S7 (Advantageous)11. Good Fault Finding Skills a (Pre-requisite)12. Knowledge of production process, CO2 welding, Spot Welding, Automation on Jigs & Fixtures.13. Good communication skills.14. Good PC Skills all-rounder (Networking is Advantageous)15. Good Working Knowledge of Robots, Robotic Welding Cells & Laser Cells

title: Factory Manager
description:
Qualification:
NDip / N6 / N4 in Electrical Engineering
Trade Tested (advantageous)
 
Skills & Experience: 
Supervisory experience
Design of electrical control panels
Maintenance of plant and the factory machines
Experience in switchgear design and manufacturing (advantageous)
Client liaison
Minimum 3-5 years’ experience in a Supervisory role
 
Job Description:
Duties will include the overseeing of factory workers and the entire manufacturing process. Other duties will be the design of electrical control panels and the testing of these panels. Weekly production planning and carrying out quality control.
 
 
Let us assist you with your career. Connect with us on www.communicate.co.za and Register your CV to create a profile, view Electrical Engineering, Mechanical Engineering, Electronic Engineering jobs and apply.
 
If you have not had any response in two weeks, please consider your application unsuccessful. Your profile will be kept on our database and we will connect with you with any other suitable roles or positions.
We also invite you to contact us to discuss other exciting career opportunities in our niche area!
For more information please call, JANI KRIEL on 021 -----, quoting the Ref: CTE016681.

title: Debtors Administrator (Invoicing)
description:
IT Services concern, has a contract immediately available for a Debtors Administrator (Invoicing).  Completed Matric, with minimum 3-5 years related experience essential within a projects / billings environment.  ERP system experience ideal.




 IT Services concern, has a contract immediately available for a Debtors Administrator (Invoicing).  Completed Matric, with minimum 3-5 years related experience essential within a projects / billings environment.  ERP system experience ideal.  Be responsible for opening of new projects / closing of complete projects; liaising with BU Administrators to ensure that all timesheets are received on time; follow-up on outstanding timesheets / expenses; timesheet approvals; raising proforma invoices / credit notes and make amendments where necessary before finalizing the invoices; run final invoices, posting of same; allocate credit notes to invoices; copy and file invoices and timesheets; scan invoices to the Credit Control database; print monthly reports; raise invoices from manual invoice requests; match support to invoice requests; database maintenance and sub-ledger reconciliations.  Email  your cv to ---------------->.






 
 
This job is now closed. You can apply for other jobs by uploading your CV.

title: Professional Receptionist
description:
Our client a national and well established property development company seeks a dynamic and professional receptionist for their brand new office.
JOB REQUIREMENTS



 Our client a national and well established property development company seeks a dynamic and professional receptionist for their brand new office.
JOB REQUIREMENTS
-          Matric certificate
-          Clear criminal and ITC record
-          Valid driver’s licence required
-          Relevant experience as a receptionist within a professional environment
-          Strong reception and admin experience
-          Word and Excel experience
-          Deadline driven and ability to work well under pressure
-          Good telephone skills and manner
-          Ability to learn and apply new skills quickly and efficiently and to work on multiple tasks
DUTIES
-          Reporting to Office Manager on a daily basis
-          Deal with all matters at reception, answering of all calls within the given time frame
-          Responsible for dealing with voicemails, VC calls, boardrooms efficiently and timeously
 

R10 000 BASIC + PROVIDENT FUND AND MEDICAL AID

title: Demand and Supply Manager
description:
A JSE listed  client within the manufacturing space  is looking for a Demand and Supply Manager who is seasoned . The purpose of the role is to develop, review and execute all supply plans to meet service and inventory objectives. 






 A JSE listed  client within the manufacturing space  is looking for a Demand and Supply Manager who is seasoned . The purpose of the role is to develop, review and execute all supply plans to meet service and inventory objectives.
 
 
Responsibilities: 

Integration of supply plans with operational plans
People management and development
Lead the supply planning reviews
Conduct supply planning for medium to long term

 
Requirements:  

B Com Supply Chain /Logistics
3-5 years experience in Supply Planning
Good Communication
Knowledge of Inventory control and Production Planning

 
Please visit our website ----------------> for further career opportunities.
 
Kindly note that, if your skills and experience do not match the requirements of this job, we will place your CV on our database and contact you as soon as a suitable position becomes available.   It is not necessary for you to apply for more than one position as your CV will automatically be loaded onto our database where it will be available to all our consultants for future opportunities.
 
Angela Nkele
 
Senior Recruitment Consultant

title: Imports Clerk
description:
Education and Minimum Requirements:

Minimum Matric/Grade 12 or equivalent
Min 3 to 5 years’ experience in a similar position
Thorough understanding of the logistics/shipping processes
Excellent business communication skills
Proficient in MS Office
Ability to work under pressure

Competencies 

Honest and hardworking
Passionate about getting things done right, first time, every time
Ability to work efficiently, on own or as part of a team, in a highly pressurised environment
Meticulous attention to detail
Flexible in terms of working hours (overtime and weekend work when required)
Safety conscious
Subscribe to the principle of a place for everything and everything in its place
Good sense of urgency

Responsibilities 

Assist Shipping Logistics Manager
Create purchase orders
Monitor shipments and maintain an up to date shipping calendar
Liaise with clearing agents and generate relevant documentation
Check all clearing agent’s invoices
Complete costing sheets for each individual container
Liaise with internal/external parties
Provide assistance with other activities as and when required
Protect the integrity of the company at all times

Please visit our website at ---------------->  for more details and to register your C.V.

title: Lease Administrator
description:
Education and Minimum Requirements:

Minimum Matric / Grade 12 or equivalent
Legal Secretarial Qualification
3 to 5 years’ experience in a related property management environment
Good understanding of Legal Leases
Assertive – be solutions driven
Sound business judgment
Computer literate
Ability to handle multiple tasks concurrently, effectively and accurately
Ability to adhere to timetables and meet deadlines
Ability to follow up to ensure all necessary tasks have been completed
Ability to interact with all levels of staff and clients

Competencies 

Analysis and problem solving
Attention to detail
Commercial orientation
High degree of Integrity
Interpersonal Sensitivity
Results/Performance Orientated

Responsibilities 

Financial Administration
Lease Administration
Adhoc Duties
Working relationship with area staff and management
Capture all information relating to all lease agreements promptly and accurately on the property system:
Lease renewals
Increases in rentals
Operating costs
Termination dates
Capture monthly recoveries timeously
Ensure all write-off, reversals, admin fee and tenant deposits are captured accurately and in accordance with the company policies
Reconcile between lease data and tenants, building and financial information as and when required
Income & Operating costs:
Are correctly charged and accounted for
Adjustments are effected where appropriate
Ensure that where the tenant is required to pay for expenditure incurred by the landlord, that the proper documentation is completed and that the amounts are recovered in accordance with the lease agreement (this includes vacated tenants)

title: Store Manager(ROSEBANK)
description:
Requirements:

Matric/ Grade 12 certificate
2 - 4 Years successful retail management experience
Managerial skills (Excellent leadership, apply company SOP; Strong planning; train, develop and motivate staff)
Financial understanding of retail profit factors
Understanding stock control to minimize potential stock losses.
Computer literate (Microsoft Office, Excel, POS)
Proven record for sales and loss control, staff training skills
Excellent customer relations skills 

Duties (including but not limited to):

Ensure company policies and procedures are adhered to(SOP)
Must have financial understanding of retail profit factors
Controlling the expenses of the branch
Effective stock control
Well-spoken, friendly, people’s person
Dispute resolution
Manage, train and develop staff
Opening and closing store 

The candidate must reside in ROSEBANK or surrounding area. 
Please take note: if you have not been contacted within 14 days, please consider your application unsuccessful.

title: Assistant Manager (MIDRAND)
description:
Requirements

Matric or matric equivalent
Ability to work retail hours
Experience in managing a large team

 
 Duties:

Manage store team to increase sales
Recruit, train and develop a highly motivated sales team
Analyze store performance and make commercial decisions
Calculate all financial figures to optimize store performance
Solve problems that affect the store service, efficiency and productivity
Plan and execute store operations
Manage stock levels and make key decisions about stock control
Actively support and communicate with managers and colleagues to support the reduction of stock loss within the store
Maintain awareness of market trends and monitor what local competitors do
Ensure the company image is kept up to date according to international standards
Implementing plans and changes according to national and international standards
Encourage all staff to deliver visual excellence

 
 
Applicant must reside in MIDRAND or surrounding area.
 
Please take note: if you have not been contacted within 14 days, please consider your application unsuccessful.

description:

Contribute to the definition and design of innovative sourcing strategies that will enable the establishment of a diverse pool of talent to meet the evolving needs to the business workforce plan
On a regular basis, proactively explore all channels and processes to build diverse pools of talent Implement creative direct to market talent capturing solutions for the Business

Manager post interview responses and feedback to candidates
Manage the engagement between candidates, hiring managers, HR Business Partners (HRBP's) from first point of contact until the on-boarding process through continuous feedback to business and candidates
Provide hiring managers with continuous feedback on candidate progress throughout the recruitment process
Up skill, educate and train hiring managers regarding end to end recruitment processes, tools and assessment methods.

Diploma/ Degree in Human Resources or related discipline or NQF equivalent
Minimum of 3 years full service recruiting experience
Fluent in English AND Portuguese
Experience in recruiting in Africa would be ideal

Deep understanding of talent acquisition

title: ACL- Business Development Executive
description:
Division/Department
GRC
 Reporting to:
Sales Manager
Main Purpose of the Position:
Identifying sales opportunities for prospective customers through a thorough understanding of their business needs within the GRC (governance, risk and compliance) space. Presenting and selling the ACL product offering to meet current and future needs and ensure awareness of the solution capabilities is created. Manage a patch with annual targets for software licenses, implementation services and associated training.
Key Deliverables and Weighting:
Generate and seek out new business through cold-calling, and attend appointments set up by the Internal Account Manager, or through partners.Gain industry knowledge that can be used to educate and create awareness within customer environments.Prepare business cases, proposals, presentations, and sales contracts.Utilize strategic sales methodologies to ensure that appointments and new business opportunities convert to new business software sales.Prepare a variety of sales status reports including activities, follow-up, closings, and adherence to targets. Ensure that the CRM system is updated with opportunities and other necessary information.Develop and maintain excellent product knowledge and sell the benefits of all the products.
Management Level and Details of the Management Component of this role:
N/A
Technical Knowledge, Skills and Abilities:
Excellent solution software sales knowledge and ability.Proven track-record in over-achieving challenging targets in a solution software sales role.Exceptional presentation skills.
Behavioral / Soft Competencies, Skills and Abilities:
Target-driven, dynamic and confidentExcellent interpersonal and relationship-building skillsProven ability to meet deadlines and thrive under pressureProven ability to multi-task and work across different projects
Education and Qualification
Essential requirements: Completed MatricDesirable Requirements: Completed Business Degree / similar is highly preferable
Details of Experience
Essential requirements: At least 3 years proven experience in a solution software sales role, where targets were achieved consistently (must be in this role currently).
Computer Skills and Knowledge
Experience in CRM systems (Salesforce.com an advantage).Good computer literacy and the ability to use Microsoft Office.
Working Environment & Travel
Exceptionally busy, team-orientated environment. This role will require some travel nationally. Driver’s license and own transport is essential.
Working hours
8:30am – 17:00pm, overtime will be required.
What will make the incumbent successful in this role?The candidate must have strong interpersonal skills, be self-motivated and a collaborative team player. You should have an inherent desire to succeed and exceed the goals and targets you and the business have set.Equity StatementThe company is committed to employment equity in our recruitment process. It is the company policy to promote within where ever possible. Therefore priority will be given to our internal applicants if this enables them to achieve our Equity goals.

About the Position
MMI Holdings Limited (MMI) is a South African based financial services group listed on the South African stock exchange, the JSE. The core businesses of MMI are long and short-term insurance, asset management, savings, investment, health care administration, and employee benefits. These product and service solutions are provided to all market segments through operating brands Metropolitan and Momentum.
Introduction
We currently have a Specialist Manager position in the Shared Services area of Legacy Solutions based at our head office in Centurion.
Role Purpose
Manage and lead an agile/cross functional team of specialists to deliver on agreed objectives.
Requirements - Matric - Relevant Degree - Bachelor of commerce degree preferred - Up to 5 years relevant experience
Responsibilities and work outputs
Internal Collaboration
- Effective and consistent service delivery and support to all internal clients
-Operational Efficiency
- Identifying and implementing operational efficiencies
Reporting
- Compiling and submitting quarterly and annual reports in respect of people, internal process, projects and or customers

About the employer
Indwe Risk ServicesIndwe Risk Services (Pty) Ltd is a leading personal, business and specialist risk and insurance advisory business. Indwe came into existence in 2006 – the product of a merger between Thebe Risk Services and Prestasi Brokers, both of which had a formidable history in insurance.
Thebe Risk Services was established in 1903 as Hoskens Insurance and in 1992 became the insurance arm of Thebe Investment Corporation. Prestasi Brokers was established in 1972 and soon gained a reputation for its innovative short-term insurance offerings, becoming a fully empowered organisation in 2001.
When these two insurance leaders joined forces, they took the name Indwe, which is the isiXhosa and isiZulu name for South Africa's national bird, the Blue Crane. Since establishing our new identity, we’ve continued to build on the strengths of our heritage.
In 2016, Indwe announced a new shareholding deal where African Rainbow Capital acquired a majority shareholding of Indwe, with 25% shareholding belonging to Sanlam and Santam retaining 24%. This joint venture has enhanced Indwe’s profile and has provided opportunities for expansion.
While our shareholding has changed, what has not is our commitment to our clients. We provide all our clients with excellent service, innovative products and timeless values that are borne from decades of experience.

About the employer
KD MarketingCompany History
Khomotso Direct Marketing (Pty)Ltd is a marketing and sales company established in 2012. KD Marketing had being providing its services to some of the major brands in South Africa, and established a firm and strong reputation in the marketing and sales industry. Our current clients are looking at growing their reach in the country and so providing us with the opportunity to expand as well.
What we do
Khomotso Direct Marketing (Pty)Ltd is a marketing and sales company specializing in customer acquisition through direct face to face marketing in stores and events. We offer the best customer services that suit ourclient’s needs.
Mission statement
Our company mission statement incorporates the following key elements:
To consistently supply products and services of the highest possible quality.
To focus our richest resources on expansion and growth.
To maintain our existing clients through ongoing marketing and encouraging referrals to new and existing customers through our quality service, product and price.
To constantly invest in individual development and company growth.
We achieve these objectives through the following:
Development of our client base and the constant research of new sources of business.
Exceeding expectations as far as quality of product is concerned.
Increasing perception concerning value for money.
Efficient use and management of all company resources and equipment.
Maintaining a high level of personal development motivated by an environment that encourages and rewards responsibility and original ideas.
We then apply our 3 stage marketing process:
DEFINE THE STRATEGY
DEVELOP THE MATERIAL
DELIVER THE RESULT
KD Marketing is looking to open five new locations within next 12 months:
Pretoria  Gauteng
Durban North  KZN
Bloemfontein  FS
East London  Eastern Cape Claremont  Western Cape
Working hand in hand with our suppliers, KD Marketinghave room in our existing locations and future locations for exciting new divisions.
These new divisions not only provide more opportunity for individual promotion but increase personal and corporate profits.
In order to achieve our desired expansion KD Marketing is looking to recruit candidates with the following characteristics:
• Self motivation
• Goal orientated
• Career minded
• Unbelievable desire to be the best in their chosen field
The contribution of our supplier and the organization is vital to achieving these company goals.

CA(SA) – non-negotiable
 
Skills & Experience: 
At least 5 years’ experience in a strategic and operational role as either Finance Business Partner / Commercial Manager / Group FM / Head of Finance / Finance Exec or similar
A proven track-record of the following:
Strong financial acumen
Strong business acumen
FMCG experience – highly preferred
Experience in facilitating Board and Exco presentations
Input in contractual agreements and compliance
Advanced Excel skills
Presentation skills
Ability to translate numbers into graphs
Knowledge of developing cost models
Strong planning and organizational skills
Comfortable working in a constantly changing environment
Change management
A project manager and creative thinker
Self-starter and co-ordinator
Enthusiastic, driven, a need to achieve
Pro-active and confident
Strong inter-personal skills and high EQ
Ability to influence strategic decision-makers including shareholders’ decision-making through relevant financial analysis
 
Job Description:
This position will include, but not be limited to, the following:
Review of monthly financial results
Preparing monthly variance analysis of the financial results
Challenging costs through understanding of cost drivers
Assisting with the preparation of forecasts and budgets and assisting the year-end process
Preparation of finance reports
Presenting to board highlighting opportunities and risk
Improving efficiencies with financial reporting on business performance
Providing analysis and insight to drive decision-making and business strategies
Maintaining and creating new management information to aid Operations
Ensuring that key operational, commercial and financial targets are met through effective commercial procedures
Track performance against KPIs
Attending senior management meetings to discuss business performance and building relationships and partnerships with senior management
Taking a key personal interest in this business and its optimal performance
Driving excellence and setting and expecting high standards at all time
The ideal person would be:
Patient and determined
Ambitious and competitive a healthy, building way
Possesses strong inter-personal and high EQ skills
Able to cope in a highly-pressured, tough environment with internal strength and professionalism
Consistent and clear in their approach to people and situations
Personally invested in ensuring this company’s grand success story
Someone that thrives on ambition and exciting new horizons
An individual ready to step up their career to the next level whilst being willing to throw themselves at this opportunity a 1000%!  - the reward, both career-wise and financial, will be sweet and just
 
 
Let us assist you with your career. Connect with us on www.------ and Register your CV to create a profile, view Finance jobs and apply.
 
If you have not had any response in two weeks, please consider your application unsuccessful. Your profile will be kept on our database and we will connect with you with any other suitable roles or positions.
We also invite you to contact us to discuss other exciting career opportunities in our niche area!
For more information please call, MONIQUE SWANEPOEL on 021 -----, quoting the Ref: CTF006839.






 
 
This job is now closed. You can apply for other jobs by uploading your CV.

title: Senior Electrical Engineer (LV and MV)
description:
Job & Company Description:
The company is a global solutions provider in the Electrical industry where they maintained a reputation as a premium supplier. In this role you will lead the electrical team by taking the department to the next level. Technically you will be the lead the electrical engineer function in:  ensuring that top quality is met and adhered to at all times; provide expert solutions on various projects; and participate in strategic decision making, with both the company and clients. If this opportunity meets the next step in your career then apply today. Additional elements of the position will be discussed with the shortlisted candidates.
 
Job Experience & Skills Required:

Registered Professional Engineer
7 – 10 Years Electrical Engineering experience
Experience as a Lead Electrical Engineer in the project management environment
Experience in LV and MV systems will highly advantageous

 
If you are interested in this opportunity, please apply directly.  For more engineering jobs, please visit ---------------->
 
If you have not had any response in two weeks, please consider the vacancy application unsuccessful. Your profile will be kept on our database for any other suitable roles / positions.

title: Electrical Power Systems Engineer
description:
Qualification:
NDip in Electrical Engineering
 
Skills & Experience:
Designing Low Voltage up to 1.4MW panels and Power Control Systems
Control and distribution panel experience
AutoCAD and Inventor (essential)
Manage a small draughting team
Carry out commissioning on site
Strong technical and communication abilities
Driver’s License (essential)
Projects or production environment experience
Minimum 7 years’ experience in a project environment
 
Job Description:
Be responsible for the designing, commissioning on site and liaising of various Engineering products for the Industrial and Mining Niches. Designing of LV panels, control and distribution panels. Motivate and manage a small draughting team that will provide aid in achieving deadline delivery. Proactive management within a project environment dealing with Power Control Systems. Conduct and participate in production meetings to formulate constructive engineering solutions. Ability to execute and commission all installations and planning whilst conducting site visits. Deal with costing and provide input to assist with any projects.
 
 
Let us assist you with your career. Connect with us on www.communicate.co.za and Register your CV to create a profile, view Electrical Engineering, Mechanical Engineering, Electronic Engineering jobs and apply.
 
If you have not had any response in two weeks, please consider your application unsuccessful. Your profile will be kept on our database and we will connect with you with any other suitable roles or positions.
We also invite you to contact us to discuss other exciting career opportunities in our niche area!
For more information please call, JANI KRIEL on 021 -----, quoting the Ref: CTE016656.

description:

Claim Analysis and provide professional and legal advice on status of the claim and strategy
Financial – CCS, Reporting and Forecasting

Good communication skills
Own transport

title: CONTRACT: Accountant
description:
KEY PERFORMANCE AREAS

Preparation of reconciliations
Preparation of journals
Responsible for the debtors and creditors cycle
Responsible for allocation correctly GL codes to purchase orders
Assisting in compiling all statutory returns for the group
Assist with cash flow forecasting for all entities
Preparation of tax schedules
Preparation of BEE reports
Preparation of month-end management pack and financial analysis
Responsible for intercompany confirmation
Offer direct support to the financial/management accountant
Adhoc requirements

KNOWLEDGE, SKILLS AND ATTRIBUTES:

Good writing skills
Computer literate and highly proficient in the use of MS Excel
Problem-solving skills
A positive work attitude and willingness to work longer hours during peak periods
Attention to detail and strong administrative ability
Very organised and structured approach to completion of tasks
Exceptional communication skills
Ability to adopt to change

MINIMUM QUALIFICATIONS, COMPETENCIES AND EXPERIENCE:

BCom Accounting/ National diploma in accounting
Minimum 6 years relevant experience in a similar position
Systems knowledge – SAP & PASTEL will be an advantage
Ms Excel
