title: Senior merchandise planner
description:
To ensure the management of the quantitative allocation of inventories in order to achieve sales budgets, targets, gross profit and gross profit percentage. To effect appropriate stock turn levels and increase market share and to ensure balanced stock and product assortment in stores. Manage portfolio finances: financial planning, OTB and re projections, profitability incl. markdowns, quantify product/store grids merchandise assortment plan (MAP). Manage location side of portfolio: implement store profiling, develop and execute monitor packs for new stores/refits/remodels, implement availability (store allocations, RPL, size curve, fixtures, SKVI's – Super key value items), monitor store imbalances, support key RPL supplier relationships.
 
Financial Ratio - Merchandise: 




Analyse and evaluate key performance indicators (KPIs) (i.e. sales plan, gross profit, cost reductions, stock turns, and closing stock) to assess and highlight areas of positive performance and identify areas where improvement is required, and implement appropriate action
Extract historical data using relevant systems, analyse and interpret such data for future sales plans and for making recommendations to relevant  stakeholders      
Conduct financial planning and projections using appropriate systems  
Monitor product performance and emerging trends and take appropriate action to maximise sales, minimise markdowns and ensure correct stock allocation to stores. Conduct re-projections in line with changing business demands as necessary                                                         
Analyse and evaluate assortment forecast information, ensuring that assortment forecasts are in line with the strategic intent of the Chain




Product Portfolio and Assortment: 
 




Analyse and evaluate a range of historical data and past performance trends so that a balanced assortment plan is developed aligned to current portfolio strategy     
Plan a balanced assortment in line with overall sales plan and ensure that criteria such as pricing,  styling, colours, fabrics, units (volumes), sizes, options per store, stores and locations are considered  
Monitor and analyse competitor activities and consumer demands and initiate and implement appropriate actions to reduce or increase assortments as required                                 
Continually analyse, research and identify the appropriate assortment to be procured in line with portfolio strategy  
Identify and capture all  tasks, events, activities and milestones required to achieve specific objectives, deliverables or outcomes (e.g. negotiate improved delivery dates with suppliers, propose new ranges, effect changes in volumes and replenishment styles)




Balanced Stock:
 




Analyse and evaluate Key Performance Indicators (i.e. sales plans, cost reductions, forward covers, Chain Sales to Stock Ratio (CSS) and stock turn). Consider trends, supplier efficiency, lead times and store profiles when making recommendations for future buying plans
Utilise appropriate systems to finalise and implement agreed store plans, grading and merchandise allocation plans 
Achieve balanced assortment through monitoring, analysing and executing progressive markdown strategies, correcting seasonal flow and ensuring continual store stock balancing                                                                                                                      
Pro-actively monitor product performance and react accordingly (i.e. taking markdowns; reacting to best sellers)         
Monitor tasks so that agreed service levels are met within specified  timeframes and communicate all required changes and appropriate  interventions to relevant parties                                                                                                      




Market Intelligence – Merchandise: 
 

Research and evaluate local and international service levels and trends for measuring business performance and identify opportunities for aligning own portfolio with best practice standards.  Liaise with relevant parties to determine if current and future plans incorporate current/emerging trends and react timeously to develop and  implement an action plan to align future plans with such trends
Conduct ongoing research of local stores and markets/trends/competitor activities, as well as changes in retailing practice, making relevant recommendations where required and align  own business in order to maintain a competitive edge and to ensure that future requirements are aligned with emerging trends and best practice quality standards    
Conduct a thorough evaluation of current Key Performance Indicators (KPIs) and use findings as the basis for the development of future business plans
Utilise technology effectively so that data is accurately captured for use as reference when justifying the need for developing measurement systems to enhance best practice      
Monitor own department's and competitors' performance regularly and re-negotiate deliverables as required

Process Improvement and Efficiency: 




Familiarise self with, and utilise, standard analytical and execution processes (e.g. Company way of Merchandising)
 Utilise technology and relevant systems to extract and analyse historical and current financial and sales information to assist in developing buying plans and to achieve correct stock inventory management levels                                                                                                      
 Recommend changes and enhancements to processes based on day to day interactions and experiences within area of responsibility and  participate in projects to develop and implement systems for  measuring service levels in each area of the business     
 Suggest and  implement improvements on the range by examining competitor information and market trends and implement improvements on allocation trends to maximise stores' stock holding profitability
Develop and implement a process to monitor work in progress, allowing sufficient lead time between sourcing of merchandise and delivery and initiating appropriate actions when out of line situations occur, ensuring deliveries are effected within stipulated deadline




 Talent Management: 




Encourage, implement and reinforce IDEALS Values, Leadership principles and Employer of Choice (EOC) strategies and initiatives
Ensure an open, motivated and harmonious work environment in line with company Leadership philosophy
Manage the performance of self  and all direct reports (if any) (formally and informally), ensuring that regular feedback is given/received, coaching and mentoring on performance is given/received to enable continuous improvement     
Be actively involved in own Individual Development Plan (IDP), develop such plans for all direct reports and ensure that the agreed development interventions are delivered                                                                                                                                                                                                       
Ensure that talent reviews are conducted on all staff to identify the appropriate talent management  strategy and drive implementation

title: Senior Systems Developer
description:
Responsibilities / Outputs

Interpret written business requirements and technical specification documents.
Consult with business analysis and architecture teams to ensure alignment to the business requirements and architecture guidelines.
Perform impact assessments for projects and initiatives.
Participate in Peer Reviews on code and documentation.
Participate in design sessions with the solutions architect and/or application architecture
Perform development tasks in accordance with written technical specifications as per the project or agreed timelines
Investigate, analyse and document reported defects.
Create, document, and implement unit test plans, scripts, and test harnesses.
Create and maintain technical documentation using defined technical documentation templates.
Provide production support for a specific application or group of applications. Activities include problem analysis, fixing, testing and promotion to the production environment, as well as Technical testing when required;
Support deployment and implementation process to the production environment as per the agreed deployment window
Report status to the relevant team leaders  - Identifying problems and bringing them to supervisor’s attention with sufficient lead time to avoid crisis;
Work effectively as part of a team and seeks to support the team’s goals;
Engage in formal and informal knowledge transfer;
Effective user interaction as and when required

 
Experience:

4yrs +  C# and SQL server development
Strong JSON, Angular and ASP.NET MVC experience;
Documentation delivery and interpretation skills, with a detailed knowledge of SDLC documentation requirements and appropriate SDLC methodology;
Appropriate skill in TFS;
Detailed understanding of Application Management Delivery procedures;
Time Management and Project Reporting skills, focussing on deadlines;
Quality Management principles;
Solid understanding of relational database designs / concepts;
Good oral and written communication skills; and
A distinct advantage would be a candidate who possesses the following knowledge:

Knowledge of Financial Markets



 
 Skills:

Appropriate and recognised formal IT training/experience (i.e. MS Certifications); and
3 to 5 years programming experience in OOP – C# .NET/Java and Web Development (ASP.NET MVC).
An advantage would be:

An appropriate and recognised formal IT training (a BComm Information Systems or BSC Computer Science or IT Diploma are preferable); and
Experience in the financial sector.

 Role Description: 
Service Delivery Manager
Samrand
Salary: R800k - R900k
My client is looking for a Service Delivery Manager to run their Hosting and Support Services division. This is an EE position.
Salary: R800k - R900k
Your responsibilities will include:

Client Relationship Management
Vendor Management
People Management
Incident and Problem Management
Change and Release Management
IT Service Management
Software Product Management
Service Design Monitoring
SLA Compliance
Service Catalogue
Commercials
Cost Management
Business Development

Skills and Experience: 
Requirements: 

Tertiary Qualification; certifications (ITIL / COBIT an advantage)
Minimum 10 years working experience - 4years of which must be relevant to the position
Client centricity
Technical proficiency
People Management

To apply click on the link below
For more information contact Riana van Zyl at Please upload your CV here--------/-----

title: Financial Manager - CA(SA)
description:
Banking giant seeking a qualified CA(SA).




 Banking giant seeking a qualified CA(SA).
 
Job & Company Description:
 
A leading bank is currently recruiting for a Financial Manager for their credit division. The incumbent would be responsible for the monthly management and statutory reporting, financial compliance and analytics, as well as supporting the Financial Director with various projects, including an IFRS 9 roll-out. This role offers exposure to a large number of divisions and products in the bank, which makes it the ideal opportunity for a Chartered Accountant looking to further their career in financial services. Apply today to ignite your career at one of the top employers!
 
Job Experience & Skills Required:

CA(SA)
2 to 4 years post article experience
Banking and/or credit experience essential
Ability to adapt quickly in a changing environment
Report writing skills
Excellent communication skills
Previous exposure to various accounting software packages

 
If you are interested in this opportunity, please apply directly.  For more finance jobs, please visit ---------------->
 
If you have not had any response in two weeks, please consider the vacancy application unsuccessful. Your profile will be kept on our database for any other suitable roles / positions.
 
For more information contact:
Pierre du Plessis
Senior Specialist Consultant: Chartered Accountants and Tax






 
 
This job is now closed. You can apply for other jobs by uploading your CV.

CA(SA)

title: Technical Sales Representative (Mining)
description:
Minimum requirements for the role:

Previous sales experience selling into the mining industry is essential.
Must have some technical bias.
Must have a strong sales persona and be results driven.
Excellent communication skills in both English and Afrikaans is essential.
Must be willing and able to do extensive travel.
Computer Literacy is essential with proficiency in Microsoft packages is essential.
Must be a team player with good people skills.
Must have the ability to work well under pressure.
Ability to communicate effectively across all levels is essential.
Must have a valid driver’s licence.

The successful candidate will be responsible for:

Gaining competent knowledge and understanding of product features, advantages and benefits to be able to professionally represent them to customers.
Building and maintaining strong relationships with customers and stakeholders.
Providing active customer care comprising of technical sales advice to customers, customer profiling, processing of customer orders and following up on customer queries.
Preparing, submitting and monitoring sales forecasts and budget reports, customer reports, monthly progress reports and sales statistics.
Maximising profitable sales, finding a product that meets the customers’ needs whilst presenting the offer in a professional manner.
Attending monthly sales meetings to discuss customer reports.
Understanding and attending to customers’ requirements.
Ensuring that all quarterly and annual sales targets are met.

Salary package is negotiable based on level of experience. Other benefits include: Company Vehicle + Cell Phone + Provident.

title: Business Development Manager
description:
Minimum Requirements:

Must have a Bachelor's Degree or post-graduate qualification in Business Management, Mathematics or Science
Minimum 15 years business analysis and at least 5 years development experience in the Pharmaceutical Industry

 
Job Description:

The Business Development Manager is required to expand the business of the company by developing a portfolio of new products the company. 
This is to be achieved by identifying, sourcing and acquiring dossier for submission for registration of the identified products

 
Let us take your CAREER to the next level!

title: Technical Product Manager - Seed Enhancement
description:
Minimum requirements for the role:

Tertiary qualification in Agriculture or Chemistry or Microbiology or Plant Pathology is essential.
Must be able to speak Afrikaans and English fluently.
Should be in possession of AVCASA and BASOS certificates or be willing to obtain it within one year.
Previous experience in technical sales or marketing experience within agrochemicals is essential.
Previous seed treatment, biological crop protection or crop protection experience is essential.
Computer literacy is essential with good working knowledge of Microsoft packages.
Sound ability to communicate effectively across all levels.

The successful candidate will be responsible for:

Providing technical advice and general sales support to Technical Marketing managers and Agents regarding product use on various crops.
Working with the product development team to design and develop new innovative products.
Providing support to agents and marketing products effectively to producers.
Developing and implementing approved business plans that include strategies for achieving area objectives for new business regarding nutrition products.
Arranging and performing demonstration trials as well as providing training to agents on market products.
Keeping detailed insight with regard to company products and services at all times.
Ensuring accurate annual and monthly forecasting.

Salary package is highly negotiable depending on experience gained.

title: Management Accountant
description:
Minimum requirements for the role:

Suitable accounting qualification is essential – CA(SA) preferred.
Must have worked as a Management Accountant in a manufacturing environment.
Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
Computer literacy is essential with working knowledge of Microsoft packages and Caseware with advanced Excel skills.
Must have the ability to work well under pressure.
Must have energy and drive and be deadline-driven.

The successful candidate will be responsible for:

Aiding managerial planning and commercial decision-making tasks by providing appropriate financial information and undertaking related accounts administration.
Providing reliable information to the General Manager in order to anticipate problems and variances affecting the profitability.
Assisting in the mentorship and management of the business.
Analysing and improving internal control systems and procedures.
Analysing variances and proposing and developing corrective measures and identifying solutions.
Preparing monthly Management Accounts, Fixed Asset Management as well as managing the cash flow.
Compiling monthly analytical reviews and petty cash reconciliations.
Completing SARS Audits as they arrive, preparing VAT reconciliations and submitting on SARS e-filing.
Processing monthly journals ensuring set procedures are followed and adhered to.
Reporting and presenting monthly financial statements to senior management.
Processing EFT requisitions and EFT allocations.
Assisting with queries and/or regulatory bodies.
Assisting Financial Auditors at year end with regards to debtors, creditors, fixed assets and issuing Auditors with information to conduct the audit.
Overall inventory management in respect of physical stock count, material usage, material purchasing, discrepancy problem solving and monthly stock reconciliations.
Ensuring budgetary and regulatory compliance.  
Managing the accounts through to costing inventory.
Liaising with logistics companies with regards to the status of the products being transported and planning around this.

Salary package is highly negotiable depending on experience gained.

title: Professional Mechanical Engineer
description:
Qualification:
BEng / BSc / BTech in Mechanical Engineering
Pr. Eng / Pr. Tech (essential)
 
Skills & Experience: 
Piping design
Pump Station design
Network Analysis
Design Pipe networks
BOQ
Hydraulic design
Pump Sizing
PipeFlo package will be beneficial
AutoCAD and Plant 3D experience
Minimum 5-10 years’ experience
 
Job Description:
Duties include Piping design and Pump Station design as well as the design of pipe networks along with pipe and pressure analysis. Hydraulic design. Pump Sizing and water network design. Guide the Draughtsman in the creation of GA drawings, ISO drawings and BOQs. Good commissioning experience will be a huge benefit. Minimum 5-10 years’ experience.
 
 
Let us assist you with your career. Connect with us on www.communicate.co.za and Register your CV to create a profile, view Electrical Engineering, Mechanical Engineering, Electronic Engineering jobs and apply.
 
If you have not had any response in two weeks, please consider your application unsuccessful. Your profile will be kept on our database and we will connect with you with any other suitable roles or positions.
We also invite you to contact us to discuss other exciting career opportunities in our niche area!
For more information please call, JANI KRIEL on 021 -----, quoting the Ref: CTE016654.

description:

CA(SA)

Skills/ Experience Required:

3-5 years commercial experience
Strong financial, commercial and analytical skills 
Group consolidations is non-negotiable
The ability to work in a pressured environment

SAP experience would be beneficial

Job description will include but is not limited to:

Analyzing accounts and business plans
Assist with the audit process
Group consolidations
Reporting
Budgets
Forecasts
Tax
Financial statements
Costing

title: HR Director
description:
Minimum requirements for the role:

Tertiary qualification in Business Administration or related is essential.
Post graduate studies in Human Resource Management is preferred.
Extensive experience in Human Resources, with 3 – 5 years in a managerial position is essential.
Proven track record working in a Senior Human Resources role.
Previous experience working with a multinational organisation preferred. 
Excellent communication, report writing and presentation skills is essential.
Fluency in English is essential.
Strong knowledge of organizational development and compensation and benefits practices.
Must be analytical and have excellent problem-solving skills.

The successful candidate will be responsible for:

Managing daily HR operational activities including Payroll, HRIS, C&B, legal and employee documentations.
Providing expertise regarding the execution of strategies.
Liaising with management regarding employee relations matters and performance.
Providing knowledge and insight on problem solving, dispute resolution, complying with regulations and avoiding litigation.
Supporting the goal of establishing the human capital of the organisation in order to achieve business goals.
Maintaining awareness and knowledge of contemporary HR practices and providing suitable interpretation to manager and staff within the organisation.
Working within a team to effectively implement processes for performance management, training and development as well as organisational development.
Managing and implementing policies and procedures relating to people and organisational development.
Facilitating communication among employees and management.
Liaising with management on performance and employee relations matters.

Salary package is negotiable based on experience gained.

title: Portfolio Manager
description:
Main purpose / objective of the position:To ensure the effective and efficient management of an allocated portfolio of buildings in orderto maximize the return on investment for the company’s clients.To manage a specified strategic business unit within the company so as to achieve maximumprofitability for the strategic business unit.To contribute towards the development and training of staff within the company.Decision making authority:Interprets strategy paid out by Senior Management by applying resources to achieve theobjectives outlined in the strategy. Operates within budget parameters and Decision framework.Experience / Education:At least 5 years experience in the property / centre management industry. Minimum qualificationGrade 12. A Business (marketing) or a property related tertiary qualification or equivalentrelevant experience.Skills required:People Management; Budgeting and Financial Management; IT Literacy – MS Office, MS Excel,Nicor / MDA / SAP; database; Negotiation; Planning, Co-ordination and Organising; Networking;Presentation skills; Drivers License.Knowledge required:Advanced Property / Centre management; Technical knowledge; Contract management;Financial management; In-depth knowledge of lease agreements; Understanding of costbudgeting; Statutory requirements; Business acumen; Common law principles applicable toleasing; basic labour relations.Competencies required:Problem Solving; Decision Making; Customer Relationship Building; Communication; TeamLeadership; Assertiveness; Negotiation; Analytical Thinking; Tolerance for Stress; Resilience;Financial and Business Acumen.Major drivers of work volume:Vacancies; geographical spread of portfolio; grading and complexity of buildings; lease renewalscycle; tenant / client requirements; profile of centres/buildings; number of owners; publicrelations and community involvement.Interface / relationships with:Internal: Portfolio Director; Portfolio Manager; Operations Manager; Lease Administrator;Debtors Administrator;External: Clients; Tenants; Service Contractors; Local Authority; Emergency Services;Business Forums and Chambers.

The risk team must ensure a risk based approach to risk management across and must ensure that potential risks are considered and understood by business leaders when making decisions as well as 




 Our financial services client currently has the above vacancy that is responsible for assisting the business in the development and implementation of best practice operational risk management frameworks. 
 
The risk team must ensure a risk based approach to risk management across and must ensure that potential risks are considered and understood by business leaders when making decisions as well as a have a good understanding of the business, it’s processes and possible weaknesses so that you are able to provide the necessary guidance within the Operational Risk framework.

title: ACCOUNTANT / BOOKKEEPER
description:
Located just outside Rawsonville and part of the Breedekloof Wine Valley, this cellar currently offers an exciting half / full day position.
 
The incumbent will report directly to the owners and be responsible for the full bookkeeping function. 
 
This includes:
• data capturing
• completion of statutory returns
• accounts receivables and payables
• SAWIS & Excise returns
• salaries and wages
• preparation of monthly management accounts
• general office administration.
 Appointment requires at least two year’s bookkeeping experience and a relevant education will strengthen your application.
 
If your background matches the requirements and you would like to apply or receive more information, please:

click on the "Apply" button or
apply online at ----------------> 

 
Please forward a comprehensive CV to ---------------- with “ACCOUNTANT / BOOKKEEPER” in the subject line, should you have trouble uploading it online.
 
Thank you for taking the time to explore this opportunity!

title: Agriculturist / Cultivator
description:
Requirements

A relevant diploma/degree in agricultural science or Horticulture.
5 years managerial experience in the agricultural or similar industry
Knowledge of ISO, HACCP and OSH Act.
Knowledge in MS Office and Syspro
Mechanically orientated will be an advantage. 

Key Performance

Developing and implementing appropriate growing techniques and strategies
Monitor incoming raw materials and production processes
Manage and maintain electronic data base of the process
Identify and control diseases in line with the IPM program
Managing the growing teams to ensure that production is kept to schedule.
Managing all processes of the production process from raw materials receiving to harvesting.
Forecasting and reporting on growing figures and quality
Benchmarking growing against farming best practice
Maintaining regulatory safety and quality certifications 
Implement, monitor, and report on KPIs and budgets

title: HR Officer
description:
Minimum requirements:

Completed Matric
Completed or still studying towards BA/B.Com HR Degree
2 – 3 years relevant working experience
Must have a passion for Industrial relations.
Computer Literate - MS Office.
VIP experience will be an advantage.
Must be strong, confident, flexible, organised and dynamic person.

 
Job Description:

Compilation of employee contracts and policies for all new employees.
Administration of HR systems (loading new employees on HR system).
Presenting of induction programme to new employees.
Send out new appointment email.
Compiling of all relevant requested training material.
Assessment of training needs within the company.
Updating clock-in system on a daily and weekly basis.
Leave administration.
General administration, scanning and filling.
Industrial relations.
Attend to relevant disciplinary steps if and when needed.
Payroll administrations.
Employment equity.
General queries and complaints.
Liaising between different departments.
Ensure Health and Safety plan is up to date.
Monthly reporting.

 
If you meet all the requirements, apply now!

title: Accoounts Controller (Temp)
description:
I specialize in professionals interested in temporary roles and contract positions.
 
A start up company within the logistics industry that doubled they revenue in more or less two years is rapidly expanding their teams and looking for an Accounts controller to join them on a contract basis.
 
This role will enable you to add value in the rapid growth of the company and also broaden your exposure as you will be responsible from A-Z.
 
You will mostly be working independently and will be required to have solid experience with completing the full financial function.
 
You will be responsible for the following:

High volumes reconciliations
Balance sheet reconciliations
Debtors book
Creditors book
Cash flow management
Financial statements

 
  
This position will require advance Excel experience as you would be required to run all the reconciliations of        large accounts.
 
If you feel ready to make that move to allow you to get back on track with the full financial function - Apply directly to 
 
Qualifications:

Completed B. Com degree
Articles will be advantageous

 
Experience:

2 - 4 years’ experience within a full financial function role
Advanced excel experience

 
Skill:

People skills
Communication skills

 
If you are interested in this opportunity, please apply directly.  For more finance jobs, please visit ---------------->
 
If you have not had any response in two weeks, please consider the vacancy application unsuccessful. Your profile will be kept on our database for any other suitable roles / positions.
 
For more information contact:
Rochelle Willemse
Consultant

title: Analyst
description:
Responsibilities:

Analysing systems and areas identified for development
Implementing and developing LEAN Six Sigma solutions within a warehouse, managing and using system problem investigation
Continuous improvement, solution implementation and project management
Investigating the root cause of the problem and work with system owners, controllers and maintenance team to resolve problem

 
Requirements:

BEng (Industrial Engineering) / BCom (Applied Mathematics / Operations Research / Quantitative Analytics)
3 year working experience within an Industrial Engineering role in the Logistics industry
Software / System experience
Good excel skills

 
Please note that, if your skill and experience do not match the requirements of this job, we will place your CV on our database and contact you as soon as a suitable position becomes available. It is not necessary to apply for more than one position as your CV will automatically be loaded onto our database where it will be available to all consultants for future opportunities.
 
Simphiwe Nhlangulela
Specialist Researcher

title: Electronic Building Services Draughtsperson
description:
Qualification:
Certificate in AutoCAD
Certificate in Revit MEP (or equivalent Accreditation)
 
Skills & Experience: 
Experience in Electrical or Electronic Building Services
An understanding of Fire Detection layouts
Creation of BOQ’s (advantageous)
Multi-disciplinary co-ordination of services
A good understanding of BIM
Minimum 3 years’ experience in an Engineering Consulting Firm
Minimum 1-year Revit MEP Modelling experience
 
Job Description:
As an Electronic Building Services Draughtsperson you will be working in a dedicated Electronic Design Department to ensure that projects within the consultancy stay at the forefront of innovation in engineering. With Electronic technology advancing at an unprecedented rate you will be incentivized to apply solutions from both a Modelling and with time, a Design perspective.
 
 
Let us assist you with your career. Connect with us on www.------ and Register your CV to create a profile, view Electrical Engineering, Mechanical Engineering, Electronic Engineering jobs and apply.
 
If you have not had any response in two weeks, please consider your application unsuccessful. Your profile will be kept on our database and we will connect with you with any other suitable roles or positions.
We also invite you to contact us to discuss other exciting career opportunities in our niche area!
For more information please call, MARK HENDRICKS on 021 -----, quoting the Ref: CTE016653.






 
 
This job is now closed. You can apply for other jobs by uploading your CV.

title: Financial Reporting Analyst
description:
Job & Company Description:
My client is a multinational organisation based in Johannesburg CBD and are in need of a Newly Qualified CA (SA) to join their dynamic team. The incumbent will take responsibility of compiling management reports at corporate level to assist senior management in financial decision-making procedures. The Financial Reporting Analyst will also take responsibility of, but is not limited to, the conducting financial reporting on the business performance related to the budgets and forecasts, managing and maintaining financial reporting systems, CAPEX reporting as well as assisting in the company medium term plan development. The individual will also need to possess a very strong personality, is willing to contribute their own ideas to enhancing the financial running of the organisation, has excellent interpersonal skills, open to a high pressured environment and is looking to gain a world of knowledge from the Financial Manager.
 
Job Experience & Skills Required:

CA(SA) is non – negotiable
No commercial experience is needed
Strong financial reporting skills
Able to work overtime when needed
TM1 exposure is an advantage

 
If you are interested in this opportunity, please apply directly.  For more finance jobs, please visit ---------------->
 
If you have not had any response in two weeks, please consider the vacancy application unsuccessful. Your profile will be kept on our database for any other suitable roles / positions.
 
For more information contact:
Kimberly Van Der Walt
Specialist Recruiter: General Finance and Chartered Accountants

title: Mechanical Engineer
description:
Qualification:
BSc / BEng / BTech in Mechanical Engineering
 
Skills & Experience: 
Basic process design and understanding of PFDs and P&IDs
Piping design
Pressure Vessel design
Tank design
HVAC design
Knowledge of different pump systems and applications, pump curves and pressure drop calculations
Stress Analysis
Materials handling
Basic machine design
Material selection
Basic Heat Transfer and Thermodynamics
Minimum 5 years’ experience being involved in design and overseeing the complete Project Life Cycle
 
Job Description:
You will be required to do the full Project Life Cycle from detailed design, compiling and issuing of tender documentation, through to the overseeing of installation and commissioning. Minimum 5 years’ experience being involved in design and overseeing the complete Project Life Cycle.
 
 
Let us assist you with your career. Connect with us on www.communicate.co.za and Register your CV to create a profile, view Electrical Engineering, Mechanical Engineering, Electronic Engineering jobs and apply.
 
If you have not had any response in two weeks, please consider your application unsuccessful. Your profile will be kept on our database and we will connect with you with any other suitable roles or positions.
We also invite you to contact us to discuss other exciting career opportunities in our niche area!
For more information please call, CLAUDIA WORSHIP on 021 -----, quoting the Ref: CTE016663.






 
 
This job is now closed. You can apply for other jobs by uploading your CV.

title: Commercial Financial Accountant
description:
Job & Company Description:
Being a leader in the market when it comes to finance roles, we can send you on your good way. With over 30 years experience in this field, ongoing markets and trend analysis and solid relationships built on trust over the years with our clients, this makes for the perfect combination to best assist you in securing your future. If you are skilled at pricing, commercial accounting and have solid ERP experience but your current position has become a glass ceiling you just cannot break through, apply today to discuss the road ahead.
 
Job Experience & Skills Required:
Completed BCom degree
ACMA will be advantageous
3 - 5 years in a Manufacturing or FMCG Commercial role
Solid ERP experience
 
If you are interested in this opportunity, please apply directly.  For more finance jobs, please visit ---------------->.
 
If you have not had any response in two weeks, please consider the vacancy application unsuccessful. Your profile will be kept on our database for any other suitable roles / positions.
 
We also invite you to contact us to discuss your next career move in finance!
 
For more information contact:
Alma Delport on 012 -----
Executive Consultant: General Finance & Chartered Accountants






 
 
This job is now closed. You can apply for other jobs by uploading your CV.

title: Millwright
description:
Qualification:
Trade Tested Fitter
Trade Tested Millwright 
 
Skills & Experience: 
Perform maintenance on machinery
Wiring and faultfinding
Experience with shrink wrappers, palletizers/depalletizers, Labelers, bottling and conveyors
Experience working on high speed lines
Attend to breakdowns
Commissioning
Extensive travelling 
Min 7-10 years’ experience as a millwright within a FMCG Environment (non-negotiable)
 
Job Description:
You will be required to do maintenance schedules, planned maintenance, attend to breakdowns, and ensure a high standard of quality work at all times. Other duties will include wiring, faultfinding and commissioning. 
Please visit our website, ----------------> to submit your CV directly or to view other Engineering jobs. 
If you have not had any response in two weeks, please consider your application unsuccessful. Your profile will be kept on our database for any other suitable roles / positions.
 
 
We also invite you to contact us to discuss other exciting career opportunities in our niche area!
For more information, please call, Claudia Worship on 021 -----, quoting the Ref: CTE016641.

title: MILLWRIGHT (MPUMALANGA)
description:
Requirements: 

Matric / Grade 12 Certificate
Qualified Section 13 Millwright
Must be medically fit
Must have a valid driver’s license and own vehicle
5 - 10 Years’ experience as a Millwright in a manufacturing environment
Thorough knowledge of computer controlled scanning and cutting systems
Maintain and repair on all electrical and mechanical systems
Electrical fault diagnosis and testing on a wide variety of plants
Must be able to carry out installation, maintenance and repairs on electrical and mechanical equipment
Performing routine maintenance on equipment and determining when and what kind of maintenance is needed
Advanced Assembling skills of mechanical equipment
Advanced Technical insight into Mechanical Equipment
Draw up a parts list to ensure the correct repair is done
Estimate the time to be used on repairs
Must be able to install electrical accessories and ancillary (VSD) equipment 

Candidates must reside in the MPUMALANGA or surrounding area. 
Please take note: if you have not been contacted within 14 days, please consider your application unsuccessful. 
Please visit our website ----------------> to upload your CV or for more information.

title: Commissioning Technician x3
description:
Minimum Requirements:

Millwrights may be considered pending abilities & experience
Strong electrical / automation understanding and experience
Hands-on mechanical knowledge and abilities
Customer interaction & liaison
Commissioning of machinery

Minimum Required Key performance areas and Technical Skills (but not limited to):

Machine automation and control
Ability to read technical drawings (part & assembly drawings
Ability to do mechanical setup on a machine
Mechanical fitting and assembly
Good all round computer skills

Minimum Required Knowledge (but not limited to):

AC Motors and drives
servo systems
pneumatic systems
hydraulic systems
Strong fault finding / problem solving capabilities

We specialize in placing top individuals in your industry.  Call a specialist at HI-TECH today for a confidential discussion about your next career move.  
CALL US FIRST!! Contact Letisha on JHB -----. Or visit our website Hi-Tech.co.za to see more hot jobs, and upload your CV. Look forward to hearing from you.
If you have not had any response in two weeks, please consider the vacancy application unsuccessful. Your profile will be kept on our database for any other suitable roles / positions

title: Assistant Corporate Controller
description:
Job & Company Description:
Based in the north of Johannesburg, a commodity trading entity needs the assistance of an experienced Assistant Corporate Controller. A global entity based in more than 20 countries, the group services both industrial and commercial clients. You will be required to assist the Corporate Controller on a daily basis with performing monthly variances analysis, reviewing the accuracy of the accounting records, reviewing monthly ageing for debtors and creditor in order to ensure accuracy as well as reviewing fixed asset registers and calculating depreciation /impairment charges, reconciling intercompany loan balances and interest, preparation of monthly local reporting packages to the Corporate office, furthermore prepare monthly management financial accounts as well as assisting with the monthly consolidation process. This handon’s operational role, may require long hours and travel from time to time. If you are looking to gain great exposure within an organisation and be mentored by a dynamic leader. My client is working exclusively with me, so contact me today to secure an interview next week!
 
  Job Experience & Skills Required:
  BCom or BCompt Degree
  SAICA articles is essential
  5 years’ experience
  Caseware experience
 
  Please note only candidates who meet the minimum requirements for this role will be considered!
 
If you are interested in this opportunity, please apply directly.  For more finance jobs, please visit ---------------->
 
If you have not had any response in two weeks, please consider the vacancy application unsuccessful. Your profile will be kept on our database for any other suitable roles / positions.
 
For more information, contact:
Jetaime Rathbone
Senior Specialist Recruitment Consultant: General Finance and Junior Finance

title: Junior Financial Controller
description:
Job & Company Description:
This renowned retailer, established for their unique and success driven mind-set is looking to take their team to new heights by adding a junior financial controller to take the lead on the full financial function. This unique market leader is focused on promoting strong and lasting relationships through delivering results. They are a company that focuses on delivery quality, performance and developing skills to the next level.
 
As junior financial controller reporting analyst you will be tasked to complete the full financial function, which includes:

Financial Reporting
Statutory controls
Compliance
Forecasting and budgeting
Implementing systems

So if you are driven to succeed and to build the next step in your career, apply today!
 
Job Experience & Skills Required:
Qualifications:

Qualified CA(SA)

Experience:

1 to 3 years relevant experience in the commercial sector

If you are interested in this opportunity, please apply directly.  For more finance jobs, please visit ---------------->
 
If you have not had any response in two weeks, please consider the vacancy application unsuccessful. Your profile will be kept on our database for any other suitable roles / positions.
 
For more information contact:
Raelene Rautenbach  Senior Specialist Consultant: General Finance 012------






 
 
This job is now closed. You can apply for other jobs by uploading your CV.

title: Financial Accountant
description:
Requirements:

B.com Accounting degree.
Completed articles.
1-3 years post article experience.
Knowledge of IFRS, TAX, VAT act knowledge of FSB regulation skills.
Case ware, ACCPAC and advanced knowledge of excel.

Responsibilities:

Responsible for complete accurate and timely accounting records on a monthly basis.
Responsible for preparation of monthly and annual financial statements for management and auditing.
Responsible for effective daily cash management of the company.
Preparation and submission of monthly, quarterly and annual statutory returns.
Responsible for the preparation of a month end file with reconciliations and documentation to support the trial balance.
Ensuring compliance with internal and external deadlines set by business and regulating bodies.
To manage and coordinate the daily tasks of junior and supervisory staff to deliver accurate and timely financial records.
To establish and maintain professional relationships with internal and external business partners on a daily basis.

 
If you are looking for the opportunity to grow your career and have the requirements that we are looking for, don’t waste any more time and send us your CV now!
 
Please apply directly to  or visit www.communicate.co.za for more exciting Finance jobs.  If you have not had any response in two weeks, please consider your application unsuccessful. Your profile will be kept on our database for any other suitable roles / positions.  We also invite you to contact us to discuss other exciting finance career opportunities in our niche area!
For more information, please contact on: -----
Recruitment Consultant: Jaymal Nagar or email: ---------------->

title: Credit Manager
description:
With over 35 years’ industry experience and more than 13 000 employees world-wide. They operate in over 15 countries across four different continents with continuous growth. They set themselves apart from their competitors by providing customized services to their clients. 
As Credit Manager, you will be involved within the assessment of the credit worthiness and credit reviews.
Preference will be given to previously disadvantaged individuals.
Duties will include:

Manage and up-skill staff
Measure department performance with appropriate metrics
Meet set deliverables
Identify, draft, develop and implement operational processes, policies and guidelines.
Devise risk management strategies
Monitor credit granting
Monthly reporting on group financial performance to the board of directors

 
Qualifications:
B. Com
Preferably, five to eight-years post article experience.
Skills:
Advanced Excel
Pastel Evolution
Previous experience within a manufacturing, retail or mining industry would be beneficial
If you are interested in this opportunity, please apply directly.  For more finance jobs, please visit ---------------->.
If you have not had any response in two weeks, please consider the vacancy application unsuccessful.
We also invite you to contact us to discuss your next career move in finance!
For more information contact:
Angelique Van Rooyen on 012 -----
Specialist Consultant Chartered Accountant

title: BI Developer
description:
Utilising the latest versions of technologies, successful applicants will be involved in full cycle development projects
 
Description:

Interpretation of business requirements and functional specifications as provided by business analyst into BI solution designs
Able to follow a discipline agile approach which include to BI systems development
Design of the extract, transfer and load (ETL) function using appropriate technology and set of tools to get data into a data warehouse or data mart
Apply appropriate master data management and data quality tools and techniques to ensure that consistent and quality data is provided to the data warehouse
Design and develop reports, graphs, analytics and key performance indicators (KPIS) on the desktop and mobile platforms for analysis purposes in line with the business requirements
Generate actions or tasks flowing from exceptions in the analytical process

 
Education: 

BSc degree or IT Related qualification

 
Skills:

Minimum 5 years’ experience
Understanding of software development lifecycle (SDLC) methodologies
Knowledge and experience in SSIS, SSRS and SSAS
Ability to create advanced data models using computerised tools
Ability to cull data and extrapolate data patterns
Ability to design and implement meaningful reports and dashboards using computerised tools
Additional experience of power bi would be advantageous
Experience of banking & the financial industry

 
Please visit our website  to submit your CV directly or to view other I.T related jobs.   If you have not had any response in two weeks, please consider your application unsuccessful. Your profile will be kept on our database for any other suitable positions.  
We also invite you to contact us to discuss other exciting career opportunities in our niche area! For more information, please call Mandisa Xulu on ----- or email on ---------------->

title: IT Graduates
description:
The ideal skills and experience needed for this role:
• Undergraduate degree in Informatics or equivalent. Recently graduated between 2015 and due to complete mid-2017.
• Basic knowledge of the software development lifecycle
• Basic knowledge of requirements extraction
• Experience required for this role is limited to work experience in a software development role or project experience gained through working on university assessment tasks (University IT projects).
• An interest in a range of technologies
• Customer service experience is desirable
• A customer service mentality
• A desire to learn and grow with the organization
• Excellent written and verbal communication skills
• Excellent personal presentation
• Ability to anticipate and solve problems
• Ability to work alone or as part of a team
• Excellent planning skills
• Process driven
 
NOTE: All short-listed applicants will be required to come through to our offices for an assessment and interview.

title: Inventory Manager
description:
Responsibilities:

Monitoring inventory levels and the replenishment of stock at optimum levels
Ensuring logistics and operational processes are being adhered to by doing regular audits and checks
Ensuring performance and compliance of internal systems and practices as well as achieve business objectives
Identifying obsolete stock to recover cost and remove from the warehouse and the system
Optimizing distribution and warehouse costs

Requirements:

Tertiary bachelors’ degree preferably in Supply Chain, Finance or Logistics
Experience managing operational staff
4-5 years’ experience in a similar role
Financial and business acumen is a necessity for this role

 
Please note that, if your skills and experience do not match the requirements of this job, we will place your CV on our database and contact you as soon as a suitable position becomes available.   It is not necessary for you to apply for more than one position as your CV will automatically be loaded onto our database where it will be available to all our consultants for future opportunities.
 
Nelisa Makhaza
Recruitment Consultant

The company consists of over 18 subsidiaries which together manufacture and deliver quality products all over the country. Duties include but not limited to: Monthly and annua…

title: Financial Reporting Analyst
description:
Brief Description (Attention Grabber): (do not copy heading into placement partner) 
A JSE listed distributions organisation is currently in pursuit of a Financial Reporting Analyst, who can support the Financial Manager with management reporting on a corporate level. Based in the central suburbs of Johannesburg the main purpose of this role will be to report on the business performance relating to budgets and forecasting.
 
Job & Company Description:
A market leading distributions organisation is currently looking to employ an exceptional Financial Reporting Analyst who will be responsible for the management and control of financial data including the financial reporting systems, run monthly reports, variance analysis as well as the delivery of financial forecasts and annual budgets. This role further requires the training of financial staff and the management of the business performance of the entire organisation. In addition, the Financial Reporting Analyst will further be responsible for the planning and forecasting of the corporate performance as well as the enhancement of financial business processes relating to budgets and forecasts. If you are ready to make that next step in your career advancement, apply now.
 
Job Experience & Skills Required:

Newly qualified CA(SA)
Ability to manage a team
TM1 experience is highly advantageous
Willing to go the extra mile

 
If you have not had any response in two weeks, please consider the vacancy application unsuccessful. Your profile will be kept on our database for any other suitable roles / positions.
 
We also invite you to contact us to discuss your next career move in finance!
 
For more information contact:
Kirsten Groutsch
Specialist Recruiter: General Finance and Chartered Accountants

title: Maintenance Technician - Welding
description:
Requirements:

Have a National Nated Diploma/ National Diploma/ BTech Mechatronics in Electrical Engineering with relevant maintenance experience.
Have recognized Tucker, Nimak, Sierra, Bosch Welding Training.
Have a minimum of 3 years Body Shop maintenance experience.
Have an understanding of electrical/electronic and pneumatic schematic diagrams.
Have strong analytical, diagnostic capabilities and problem solving ability.
Be willing to work shifts, overtime, weekends, public holidays, plant shut down, whenever necessary and/or required.
Be willing to be on standby arrangements. 

Responsibilities:

Repair and maintenance of electronically and mechanically controlled machinery and equipment.
Maintain, program and manage all stud welding equipment in plant, which includes Stud Welding, Projection Welding, Weldfast Welding Equipment.
Implement Maintenance program on all Tucker, Nimak, Sierra, Bosch Welding Equipment. 
Upgrade of all stud/nut weld equipment with new technology by researching new welding technology.
Keep track and make sure all welding systems’ spares are available at all times.
Document welding maintenance, testing and troubleshooting procedures.
Maintain Group standards with respect to stud/nut welding equipment installations.
Fault Find on all Body Shop Tucker stud welding systems in the event of a break down.
Install, commission, program and maintain all new welding systems in Body Shop.
Operate and optimise KUKA VKCR2/4 Robots programmes.

title: Maintenance Technician - Laser
description:
Requirements:

Have a National Nated Diploma/ National Diploma/ BTech/ BEng in Electrical/Mechatronics required. 
Have certified training on Laserline Generators and Scansonic optic heads.
Have certified training on Kuka Robotics Operation, Maintenance and Programming.
Have a minimum of 3 years Body Shop maintenance experience.
Have an understanding of electrical/electronic and pneumatic schematic diagrams.
Have working experience on Trumpf and/or Laserline Laser Generators.
Have high proficiency with Laser monitoring software applications.
Have strong analytical, diagnostic capabilities and problem solving ability.
Be willing to work shifts, overtime, weekends, public holidays, plant shut down, whenever necessary and/or required.
Be willing to be on standby arrangements. 

Responsibilities:

Acting as a Laser Safety Officer as an when required and perform the duties of an LSO as stipulated in Hazardous Substances Act, 1973 (Act 15 of 1973).
Ensuring compliance to all laser safety standards.
Modifying and optimizing of laser equipment settings and parameters to eliminate laser quality problems such as pin holes, thin seam, wavy seam, half welds, etc. Fault find and troubleshoot on High Yag/ Scansonic Optics.
Setting up and optimising Scansonic AL03 Optic heads.
Fault find and troubleshoot on Trumph/ Laserline Laser Generator.
Performing basic preventative maintenance on the laser; weld equipment, and robots to prevent unscheduled downtime.
Document all laser parameter changes and ensure proper change point management is followed.
Keep Records and Update all Laser Parameters as required to ensure laser quality and also to ensure that auditable records are maintained.
Modifying of existing robot and laser equipment to the latest technologies ie. Fronius/Binzel feeder, Laserline Generator, Scansonic Optic Head, LLK’s, etc.
Provide Laser Training to other Technicians.

title: Financial Reporting Analyst
description:
Job & Company Description:
My client is a large is a large manufacturing firm based in Johannesburg central and are looking to take on a Newly Qualified CA (SA) to take responsibility of providing senior management with corporate level reporting. The candidate will also take responsibility of, but is not limited to, managing and controlling the financial control systems, managing and enhancing the financial business processes, present report findings to senior management as well as implementing system enhancements. The incumbent will need to possess a strong passion to work professionally and is looking to take on a position that will take their career to the next level.
 
Job Experience & Skills Required:

CA(SA) is a non – negotiable
Completed SAICA articles
No commercial experience needed
Reporting, forecasting and budgeting experience in articles

 
If you are interested in this opportunity, please apply directly.  For more finance jobs, please visit ---------------->
 
If you have not had any response in two weeks, please consider the vacancy application unsuccessful. Your profile will be kept on our database for any other suitable roles / positions.
 
For more information contact:
Kimberly Van Der Walt
Specialist Recruiter: General Finance and Chartered Accountants

title: Accountant
description:
Job & Company Description:
My client an accounting firm within an industry leading conglomerate seeks a Specialist Accountant.  The incumbent will be responsible for the following, but not limited to, full function bookkeeping, creditors, debtors, payroll, management accounts and audit packs.  Will have about 20 – 30 clients, must be able to work independently and thrive under pressure.  You will be incentivised by procuring active clients.
 
Job Experience & Skills Required:
Completed BCom degree in Accounting or relevant accouting field
2 – 3 years experience within a full function accounting role
Pastel experience
Microsoft Excel advanced
 
If you are interested in this opportunity, please apply directly.  For more finance jobs, please visit ---------------->
 
If you have not had any response in two weeks, please consider the vacancy application unsuccessful. Your profile will be kept on our database for any other suitable roles / positions.
 
For more information contact:
Mandy de Beer on 012 -----
Specialist Consultant: Chartered Accountants and General Finance

title: Financial Reporting Analyst
description:
Job & Company Description:
A market leading distributions organisation is currently looking to employ an exceptional Financial Reporting Analyst who will be responsible for the management and control of financial data including the financial reporting systems, run monthly reports, variance analysis as well as the delivery of financial forecasts and annual budgets. This role further requires the training of financial staff and the management of the business performance of the entire organisation. In addition, the Financial Reporting Analyst will further be responsible for the planning and forecasting of the corporate performance as well as the enhancement of financial business processes relating to budgets and forecasts. If you are ready to make that next step in your career advancement, apply now.
 
Job Experience & Skills Required:

Newly qualified CA(SA)
Ability to manage a team
TM1 experience is highly advantageous
Willing to go the extra mile

 
If you have not had any response in two weeks, please consider the vacancy application unsuccessful. Your profile will be kept on our database for any other suitable roles / positions.
 
We also invite you to contact us to discuss your next career move in finance!
 
For more information contact:
Kirsten Groutsch
Specialist Recruiter: General Finance and Chartered Accountants
-----

title: Foreman
description:
Minimum Requirements:

5 years’ experience as a Foreman

Civil projects on bridges and roads
Concrete experience
Complete Quality Assurance checklists
SHEQ Assurance, compliance & implementation

Attending management meetings

title: Intermediate C# Developer
description:
You will need to show business and company insight, ability to perform under pressure, core technical skills as well as the ability to promote yourself and your work.
 
Description:

Collaborate with team members in all phases of the SDLC including requirements gathering, analysis, design, testing, and implementation.


Write business requirements from end-user input and execute requirements into software systems.
Assist in defining software development project plans
Design, run, and monitor performance tests on new and existing programs
Provide end user training and maintain user documentation.
Plan, design, develop, implement, and maintain moderately complex databases which are both internal and client facing

Education: 

degree or diploma in Information technology or computer Science
additional certification would be advantageous

 
Skills:

5+ years’ experience working with .Net framework and C#
C#, MS SQL Server, MVC, WCF, Web API services, JavaScript, JQuery, Angular JS, HTML, CSS, Microsoft Azure, JSON
additional technologies would be advantageous
experience working in an agile environment

title: Legal Researcher
description:
In respect of Speeches, Presentations and Papers to be delivered by the Director:

Conduct Research into relevant topics such as Case Law and related; Existing Legislation &Amendments;
Labour Market matters; Economic Indicators; Collective Bargaining.
Ascertain the research topic, methodology and tools to be employed in the research.
Conduct sampling and data collection through the Case Management
System (CMS), External Agencies (National and International), Labour
Market and Stakeholder Research, as well as other tools and media.

Key Requirements:

Relevant Degree in Law.
Proven track-record in researching Legal and related topics, uplifting relevant substance and preparing PowerPoint Presentations.  A formal qualification in Research would be an added advantage.
Exceptional Writing Skills in the English medium.
Strong Project Management Skills. A formal qualification in Project Management would be an added advantage.

title: Credit Controller (Temp)
description:
This recognized company in the retail industry that specializes in delivering excellence to all customers is currently looking for an individual that will join their team and form part of the family they have been growing on a contract basis.
 
They are looking for an experienced individual that will come in and hit the ground running as their Debtors Controller. 
 
The ideal individual for this role must have the will to take challenges hands-on, on a daily basis.
 
The main responsibilities of this role will include:

Collections
Debtors Age Analysis
Policies and Procedures
Submissions
Ad – hoc projects

 
 
Does this sound like the right opportunity, if yes - apply with Rochelle today!
 
The requirements:
Qualification:

Completed B. Com accounting degree/ Ndip in Accounting Sciences

Experience:

1 - 2 years’ experience within the commercial sector
Industries: Retail will be advantageous

 
Skills Required:

Motivated
Advanced Excel experience

 
If you are interested in this opportunity, please apply directly.  For more finance jobs, please visit ---------------->
 
If you have not had any response in two weeks, please consider the vacancy application unsuccessful. Your profile will be kept on our database for any other suitable roles / positions.
 
For more information, contact:
Rochelle Willemse
Consultant

title: Revenue Controller
description:
My client will offer you the ability to expose your skill set in over 80 different countries, giving their clients opportunity to be unique key players within a variety of markets. With their years of experience and a wealth of knowledge, you will become a professional in spotting new business influencers within the media and marketing arena.  
As a Revenue Controller, you will should understand the revenue process as well as revenue recognition.
Duties will include:

Capturing, accounting and reporting for all entities
Maintenance of general ledger
Prepare and maintain ledger accounts, product annual financial statements and fiscal reports
Loading payments
Maintenance of accounts payable, fixed asset register.
Reconciliations
Prepare monthly reporting packs
Overseeing income tax compliance

Qualifications:
B. Com
Five to ten years post article experience.
Skills:
Advanced Excel
Previous experience within a multi-national or telecommunications environment would be beneficial.  
If you are interested in this opportunity, please apply directly.  For more finance jobs, please visit ---------------->.
If you have not had any response in two weeks, please consider the vacancy application unsuccessful.
We also invite you to contact us to discuss your next career move in finance!
For more information contact:
Angelique Van Rooyen on 012 -----
Specialist Consultant Chartered Accountant

title: Financial Planner
description:
As a leading South African financial services provider, Liberty serves individual, business and institutional clients and we have developed a unique platform to continue to strengthen our leadership position. It is important for everyone to have a financial plan in place that leads us towhere we want to be in life. To secure 2nd appointment.To give objective professional advice on client’s needs.To portray the appropriate propriety in their target market.To meet all legislative requirements.To remain accredited and up to date with relevant market & industry related subjects.To remain adequately equipped and knowledgeable regarding the latest technology.To build a long-term professional, profitable practice



Candidate Requirements

Minimum Requirements Must be a SA citizen or Permanent Resident, must have a valid 13 digit ID number that is checked by MIE.A minimum matric/ grade 12 qualification or equivalent as defined by SAQA.If the individual has 5 years' experience in the industry - as per DOFA date, then the relevant NQF 5 qualification appliesIf the individual has 2 years' experience in the industry - as per the DOFA date, the RE qualification applies.Valid SA drivers licenseReliable motor vehicleSA income tax number.No criminal recordNo credit listings/No debt review/Judgements or sequestrationLaptop (according to the Liberty specification).
